job_text: ['', 'Company Overview\xa0\xa0', '1+ year of experience in scripting, Python', 'Qualifications:\xa0', '- Continually improve ongoing reporting and analysis processes, automating or simplifying self-service support', '- Assist in all aspects of the development life cycle, including architecture, requirement gathering, development, testing, training, implementation, and support\xa0', '- Drive the collection of new data and the refinement of existing data sources to continually improve data quality and implement business logic using efficient transformations.', 'Ability to work independently and problem solve with little to no direction.', '- Analytical skills: Collects and researches data; uses intuition and experience to complement data', 'Impeccable customer service focus with a demonstrated desire to exceed expectations.', '- Medical Insurance Plan\xa0', 'Build robust and scalable data integration pipelines using SQL and Python.', '\xa0', '- Creates Ad Hoc reports, queries and/or analyses upon request\xa0', '- Demonstrated knowledge of Data Visualization best practices', 'Technical Skills (required):\xa0', '- Provides day to day support to the division as required to ensure the availability and performance of systems, users interface and dashboards\xa0', '- Pregnancy Disability Leave / Paid Parental Leave\xa0', '- Paid vacation & holidays\xa0', 'Company Overview\xa0', '- Supplemental Benefits (Life, Disability, Accident Insurance)\xa0', 'Key Responsibilities:\xa0', 'Qualifications & Key Competencies:\xa0', '\xa0Key Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0', '- Interface with other teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources.', '- Responsible for improving data quality to increase data accuracy, viability, and value', '- Experience with relational databases\xa0', 'Attention to detail; you prioritize multiple tasks simultaneously without sacrificing the ability to dive deep.', 'We are seeking a creative and analytical individual to join our Business Intelligence Team. As a member of this team, you will be responsible for designing and implementing data solutions. The successful candidate knows and loves working with business intelligence tools, is comfortable accessing and working with data from multiple sources, and passionately partners with the business to identify strategic opportunities and deliver results. You should have an internal drive to answer “why?” questions, excellent analytical abilities, strong technical skills, as well as superior written and verbal communication skills. Position is office-based in Charleston, SC.\xa0', 'Qualifications & Key Competencies:\xa0\xa0', '- SQL knowledge\xa0', '- Assist in quality control and validation processes and testing efforts, providing guidance and supervision to end users to ensure adequate and thorough testing\xa0', 'Founded in 1970, Mediterranean Shipping Company (MSC), S.A of Geneva, Switzerland, is the second largest shipping line in the world. Offering a worldwide network of 500 offices in 152 countries, employing a team of 70,000 dedicated individuals, MSC prides itself on delivering a global service with great local knowledge. We have an established fleet of 500+ container vessels with an intake capacity of circa 2.6 million TEUs. The shipping line sails on 200 trade routes, calling at 315 ports and has established landside services, delivering a door-to-door intermodal service, almost anywhere in the world. With a streamlined management structure in Geneva, MSC has become a leading customer focused and cost-effective global transportation solution for many shippers. Providing an unparalleled service network via dedicated own offices throughout the world, MSC remains a truly independent and private Company that is able to respond quickly to market changes.\xa0', '- Oral Communication: Speaks clearly and persuasively; Listens and gets clarification; Responds well to questions; Demonstrates group presentation skills.', 'Technical Skills (required):\xa0\xa0', 'What we offer:\xa0', '1+ year of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly-optimized SQL queries across large data sets.', '- 1-2 years’ experience with Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Looker or any other data visualization tool\xa0', '- Ability to own the full cycle of dashboard development from requirement gathering and design through development and launch/support', '- 401K Plan – effective Day One\xa0', '- Life Insurance – one-time annual salary up to $50,000 / Separate Business Travel Insurance\xa0', '- Short Term / Long Term Disability\xa0', '- Ability to manage multiple priorities and adjust quickly', 'What we offer:\xa0\xa0', '- Partner Discount Programs - effective Day One\xa0', '- Strong data visualization skills', '- Dental/Vision Insurance Plan\xa0', '- Create and maintain training materials and train business end-users and power users as necessary\xa0', '- Wellness Programs - effective Day One\xa0', '- Build and deliver high quality data architecture to support business analyst, data scientists, and customer reporting needs', '- Annual bonus', '- Bachelor’s degree, preferably in a math, science, or technology related field of study\xa0']

job_title: Data Analytics Engineer – Business Intelligence Analyst
job_text: ['', ' Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', ' 3+ years of experience working with data collection, data mining, data exploration, data transformation, processing tools and techniques.', ' 3+ years of experience designing and building data visualization, business insights development, statistical models, conducting predictive or prescriptive analytics, advance analytics.', 'Understand when and how to wear appropriate personal protection (i.e., goggles when using compressed air).', ' Contribute in raw data collection, data transformation, cleansing and data mining process. Primary data sources involve various factory automation systems, engineering and production applications, SAP ERP, SAP Business Warehouse, various databases, file systems, and various cloud SaaS applications.', ' Familiarity with compliance and security processes (e.g. FDA, GDPR, ISO). Ability to support audits.', ' Exposure to data warehouse / lake platforms – Azure (preferred), Snowflake, Hadoop.', ' Exposure to ETL, data collection or formatting tools – SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), MuleSoft, informatica.', ' Technical Skills (hands-on). Data exploration solutions like – Altreryx, Knime, or RapidMiner Statistical computing and data mining – Python, R, SQL. Data visualization – Power BI (preferred), Tableau. Data Modeling tools like – erwin, SQL server management studio. Source code management like – Azure DevOps services (preferred), git. Exposure to ETL, data collection or formatting tools – SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), MuleSoft, informatica. Exposure to data warehouse / lake platforms – Azure (preferred), Snowflake, Hadoop. Exposure to tools related to master data management, data governance, data security. Understanding of data formats like – XML, JSON, YAML, CSV. Knowledge of manufacturing data solutions like OSISoft, Braincube is advantageous. Functional skills Maintain a professional demeaner that portrays integrity and respect for others. Strong analytical, statistical mindset with good problem-solving skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Fast learning, applying learnings into the job, and coaching other team members. Ability to drive requirement gathering process, summarize, articulate ideas, present results, communicate status. Significant depth of knowledge and track record of accomplishments in multiple data analytics and technology areas, focusing on manufacturing and operations. Familiarity with industry standards, such as ANSI/ISA-95 and ANSI/ISA-88. Familiarity with compliance and security processes (e.g. FDA, GDPR, ISO). Ability to support audits. Ability to collaborate with team members in architecture, business analyst, Project management, infrastructure, and operations to construct analytics solutions and support it. Knowledge of development environments and support tools. Safety Responsibilities:Understand when and how to wear appropriate personal protection (i.e., goggles when using compressed air).Use proper lifting techniques.Understand dust explosion hazards.Understand emergency evacuation routes and evacuation procedures.Understand and follow Behavior Based Safety programs. Quality Assurance/Product Safety:Adhere to all GMP requirements and quality programs.', ' Works with data and integration architect, business analysts, business units, infrastructure engineering, and information technology teams to build, deploy and support data analytics and business intelligence solutions. Participate in requirement gathering process, analyze data related requirements, determine statistical calculations, patterns and algorithms, create requirements specification documents and use cases. Determine and create efficient conceptual, logical and physical data models to enable efficient data integration, storage, transformation and analysis. Contribute in raw data collection, data transformation, cleansing and data mining process. Primary data sources involve various factory automation systems, engineering and production applications, SAP ERP, SAP Business Warehouse, various databases, file systems, and various cloud SaaS applications. Determine data visualization requirements, conduct proof of concepts, recommend appropriate tools and techniques, create and maintain data visualization outputs (e.g. reports, charts, apps). Conduct data exploratory analysis, identify patterns, perform predictive and prescriptive analytics, and come up with actionable business insights. Contribute building and maintaining data warehouse, data lake, data catalogs, data services using concepts like big-data, cloud services, containers. Drive establishing data governance process for structured and non-structured data. Implement data lifecycle, data security and data compliance processes across manufacturing business units. Contribute in vendor selection, tools selection, candidate interviews process.', " A bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Information Technology, Applied Mathematics, Statistic or other related discipline. Relevant experience will be considered.", ' Statistical computing and data mining – Python, R, SQL.', ' An experience working with Machine Learning, image or sound analytics, Artificial Intelligence is advantageous.', 'Primary Responsibilities', 'Use proper lifting techniques.', ' Determine data visualization requirements, conduct proof of concepts, recommend appropriate tools and techniques, create and maintain data visualization outputs (e.g. reports, charts, apps).', 'Adhere to all GMP requirements and quality programs.', ' Functional skills', 'Skills', ' Quality Assurance/Product Safety:', 'Understand dust explosion hazards.', ' Strong analytical, statistical mindset with good problem-solving skills.', 'Job', ' Contribute building and maintaining data warehouse, data lake, data catalogs, data services using concepts like big-data, cloud services, containers.', ' Works with data and integration architect, business analysts, business units, infrastructure engineering, and information technology teams to build, deploy and support data analytics and business intelligence solutions.', 'Primary Location', 'Experience', ' Maintain a professional demeaner that portrays integrity and respect for others.', ' Safety Responsibilities:', ' Experience developing ETL (Extraction Transformation Load), data flows, or data interfaces with on-premise or cloud applications is desirable.', ' Data Modeling tools like – erwin, SQL server management studio.', ' Contribute in vendor selection, tools selection, candidate interviews process.', 'Organization', ' Exposure to tools related to master data management, data governance, data security.', ' Detailed understanding of data governance, master data management, data security and compliance related processes.', 'Understand and follow Behavior Based Safety programs.', ' 5 to 7 years of experience in previous data analytics, data engineer, business intelligence, or statistical analyst roles. Working experience with CPG manufacturing, engineering or production related data domains is preferred.', ' 2+ years of building and/or supporting data warehouse, data lake, data mart, Big data, data catalogs using cloud services or on-premise platforms.', ' Ability to drive requirement gathering process, summarize, articulate ideas, present results, communicate status.', ' Significant depth of knowledge and track record of accomplishments in multiple data analytics and technology areas, focusing on manufacturing and operations.', ' Familiarity with industry standards, such as ANSI/ISA-95 and ANSI/ISA-88.', ' 2+ years of experience developing efficient data models (relational, hierarchical, conceptual, logical, and physical)', ' Source code management like – Azure DevOps services (preferred), git.', ' Knowledge of development environments and support tools.', ' Participate in requirement gathering process, analyze data related requirements, determine statistical calculations, patterns and algorithms, create requirements specification documents and use cases.', ' Ability to collaborate with team members in architecture, business analyst, Project management, infrastructure, and operations to construct analytics solutions and support it.', ' Determine and create efficient conceptual, logical and physical data models to enable efficient data integration, storage, transformation and analysis.', ' Data visualization – Power BI (preferred), Tableau.', 'Understand emergency evacuation routes and evacuation procedures.', 'Unposting Date', ' Drive establishing data governance process for structured and non-structured data. Implement data lifecycle, data security and data compliance processes across manufacturing business units.', ' Data exploration solutions like – Altreryx, Knime, or RapidMiner', ' Technical Skills (hands-on).', 'Foods people love. Brands people trust. And a career that nourishes your future like no other. ', ' Conduct data exploratory analysis, identify patterns, perform predictive and prescriptive analytics, and come up with actionable business insights.', ' Knowledge of manufacturing data solutions like OSISoft, Braincube is advantageous.', ' Understanding of data formats like – XML, JSON, YAML, CSV.', 'Schedule', 'Position Summary', ' Fast learning, applying learnings into the job, and coaching other team members.', 'Requirements And Minimum Education Level', ' 5 to 7 years of experience in previous data analytics, data engineer, business intelligence, or statistical analyst roles. Working experience with CPG manufacturing, engineering or production related data domains is preferred. 3+ years of experience working with data collection, data mining, data exploration, data transformation, processing tools and techniques. 3+ years of experience designing and building data visualization, business insights development, statistical models, conducting predictive or prescriptive analytics, advance analytics. 2+ years of experience developing efficient data models (relational, hierarchical, conceptual, logical, and physical) 2+ years of building and/or supporting data warehouse, data lake, data mart, Big data, data catalogs using cloud services or on-premise platforms. Detailed understanding of data governance, master data management, data security and compliance related processes. An experience working with Machine Learning, image or sound analytics, Artificial Intelligence is advantageous. Experience developing ETL (Extraction Transformation Load), data flows, or data interfaces with on-premise or cloud applications is desirable.']

You'll work closely with our Data Scientists, Engineers, and Dev Ops specialists as a technical leader and resource. You will help investigate new technologies and select the right tool for the job, with an eye toward robust, scalable, and flexible architectures that facilitate teamwork and ensure high quality data. developing and communicating business plans and priorities; removing barriers and obstacles that impact performance; providing resources; identifying performance standards; measuring progress and adjusting performance accordingly; developing contingency plans; and demonstrating adaptability and supporting continuous learning.', 'Uses modern tools, techniques, and architectures to partially or completely automate the most common, repeatable and tedious data preparation and integration tasks.', 'Architect, implement and deploy new data models and data processes', 'Reviews and provides guidance and inputs on all data modeling activities to team members.', 'Minimum Qualifications...', 'OR', 'Updates knowledge of current and emerging big data analytics and data science trends and techniques.', 'Serves as an interpreter and conduit to connect business needs with tangible solutions and results.', 'Programming in Python or Java + SQL', 'Provides supervision and development opportunities for associates by selecting and training; mentoring; assigning duties; building a team-based work environment; establishing performance expectations and conducting regular performance evaluations; providing recognition and rewards; coaching for success and improvement; and ensuring diversity awareness.', 'OR ', 'Understands the priority order of requirements and service level agreements.Defines and identifies the most suitable sources for required data that is fit for purpose, referring to external sources as required.Performs initial data quality checks on the extracted data.Reviews the deliverables of junior associates and provides guidance.', 'Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. ', 'Reviews and ensures all code documentation is complete and updated periodically.', 'Builds complex logical and conceptual models and provides guidance to team on physical data models.', 'Assists in defining data modeling standards and foundational best practices.']

['', '3+ years of experience working on Linux environment, and proficient with cloud environment (AWS, GCP)', 'Build intelligent monitoring over data pipelines and infrastructure, to achieve early and automated anomaly detection.', 'Experience coding in one or more of the following programming language: Python, Java (mandatory), or Scala', 'Work with peer SREs to roll out changes to our production environment and help mitigate data-related production incidents.', 'About Us', 'A bonus - you have some experience in data warehousing and data engineering', 'A passionate bias to action and passion for delivering high-quality data solutions', 'You have production experience with distributed datastores, e.g. Hbase, zookeeper, Kafka (alternative experience such as RabbitMQ, Cassandra, elasticsearch, etc would be also relevant) ', ' You have production experience with distributed datastores, e.g. Hbase, zookeeper, Kafka (alternative experience such as RabbitMQ, Cassandra, elasticsearch, etc would be also relevant)  Own, manage, monitor and optimize the reliability and overall health of our development and production environments Detailed problem-solving approach, coupled with a strong sense of ownership and drive A passionate bias to action and passion for delivering high-quality data solutions 3+ years of experience working on Linux environment, and proficient with cloud environment (AWS, GCP) Experience coding in one or more of the following programming language: Python, Java (mandatory), or Scala 3+ years of hands-on experience in Reliability Engineering for high-performant, scalable and distributed data systems with a focus on automation Experience in a config management systems like chef, puppet, Ansible, or terraform. Deep understanding of CI/CD principles, familiar with source control systems (Git) Work with peer SREs to roll out changes to our production environment and help mitigate data-related production incidents. Experience with a Change Data Capture system, such as Debezium, is a plus. Attention to detail and quality with excellent problem solving and interpersonal skills A bonus - you have some experience in data warehousing and data engineering ', '3+ years of hands-on experience in Reliability Engineering for high-performant, scalable and distributed data systems with a focus on automation', 'You will collaborate with engineering teams to improve, maintain, performance tune, and capacity plan for Vimeo’s data platforms and infrastructure.', 'Participate in an on-call rotation.', 'Attention to detail and quality with excellent problem solving and interpersonal skills', 'Experience with a Change Data Capture system, such as Debezium, is a plus.', 'Detailed problem-solving approach, coupled with a strong sense of ownership and drive', 'You will drive the incident management process for our data platform working with our partner teams to perform incident post-mortems, root cause analysis, and prevent recurring incidents.', " You will collaborate with engineering teams to improve, maintain, performance tune, and capacity plan for Vimeo’s data platforms and infrastructure. Design business continuity and disaster recovery plans and processes, work with the engineering team in implementation. You will drive the incident management process for our data platform working with our partner teams to perform incident post-mortems, root cause analysis, and prevent recurring incidents. You will lead the standard change and release management process, automate and promote related best practices across engineering teams and help Vimeo to meet and maintain legal compliance status. Build intelligent monitoring over data pipelines and infrastructure, to achieve early and automated anomaly detection. job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Pipeline & Tools R&D
job_text: ['', 'Experience with Java or Scala programming languages.', 'Assist in the development of deployment automation and operational support strategies.', 'Experience working in a Linux environment.', 'Experience with Python and shell scripting.', '5+ years of experience with the Hadoop ecosystem (Map Reduce, Spark, Spark-Streaming, Oozie, Impala, etc.) and big data ecosystems (Kafka, Cassandra, etc.).', 'Implement and support big data tools and frameworks such as HDFS, Hive, and Impala.', 'Deliver near-real time and non-near-real-time data and applications to a team of analysts and data scientists who create insights and analytics applications for our stakeholders.', 'Knowledge of the video game industry.', 'Experience in Lambda architecture.', 'A passion for technology.', 'Set the standards for warehouse and schema design in massively parallel processing engines such as Hadoop and Snowflake while collaborating with analysts and data scientist in the creation of efficient data models.', 'Experience with CI/CD.', ' The Rockstar Analytics team provide insights and actionable results to a wide variety of stakeholders across the organization in support of their decision making. We work together with several departments to design and implement streamed and batched data pipelines. We collaborate as a global team to develop cutting-edge data pipelines serving data products, data models, reports, analyses, and machine learning applications. ', 'Implement and support streaming technologies such as Kafka and Spark-Streaming.', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience with Artifact Repositories.', ' Experience with event processing frameworks. Experience in Lambda architecture. Experience with Java or Scala programming languages. Experience with CI/CD. Familiar with Restful APIs. Experience with Artifact Repositories. Knowledge of the video game industry. ', 'Skills', 'Qualifications', 'Experience working with Real-Time, Near-Real-Time streaming pipelines.', 'Maintain and extend our CI/CD processes and documentation.', 'Assist in the development of a big data platform in Hadoop using pipeline technologies such as Spark, Oozie, and more to support a variety of requirements and applications.', 'The Rockstar Analytics team provide insights and actionable results to a wide variety of stakeholders across the organization in support of their decision making.', 'Familiar with Restful APIs.', ' Deep understanding of advanced data warehousing concepts and track record of applying these concepts on the job. Ability to manage numerous requests concurrently and strategically, prioritizing when necessary. Good communication skills. Dynamic team player. A passion for technology. ', 'Expert in at least one SQL language such as T-SQL or PL/SQL.', 'PLUSES', ' Implement and support big data tools and frameworks such as HDFS, Hive, and Impala. Implement and support streaming technologies such as Kafka and Spark-Streaming. Deliver near-real time and non-near-real-time data and applications to a team of analysts and data scientists who create insights and analytics applications for our stakeholders. Assist in the development of deployment automation and operational support strategies. Assist in the development of a big data platform in Hadoop using pipeline technologies such as Spark, Oozie, and more to support a variety of requirements and applications. Set the standards for warehouse and schema design in massively parallel processing engines such as Hadoop and Snowflake while collaborating with analysts and data scientist in the creation of efficient data models. Maintain and extend our CI/CD processes and documentation. ', 'We collaborate as a global team to develop cutting-edge data pipelines serving data products, data models, reports, analyses, and machine learning applications.', 'How To Apply', 'What We Do', 'Good communication skills.', 'Ability to manage numerous requests concurrently and strategically, prioritizing when necessary.', 'We work together with several departments to design and implement streamed and batched data pipelines.', ' 5+ years of work experience with ETL, data modeling, and business intelligence big data architectures. 5+ years of experience with the Hadoop ecosystem (Map Reduce, Spark, Spark-Streaming, Oozie, Impala, etc.) and big data ecosystems (Kafka, Cassandra, etc.). Expert in at least one SQL language such as T-SQL or PL/SQL. Experience developing and managing data warehouses on a terabyte or petabyte scale. Strong experience in massively parallel processing & columnar databases. Experience working with Real-Time, Near-Real-Time streaming pipelines. Experience with Python and shell scripting. Experience working in a Linux environment. ', 'Experience developing and managing data warehouses on a terabyte or petabyte scale.', 'Dynamic team player.', '5+ years of work experience with ETL, data modeling, and business intelligence big data architectures.', 'Experience with event processing frameworks.', 'Deep understanding of advanced data warehousing concepts and track record of applying these concepts on the job.', 'Strong experience in massively parallel processing & columnar databases.']

['', '3+ years of work experience.', 'Building fast, reliable, scalable data pipelines that process over billions of historical data points collected from tens of thousands of retail stores across the US which power our machine learning models.', 'Maintaining, augmenting, and helping architect our data platform and data warehouses to ensure that our data and ML teams can efficiently process and access the data they need.', 'What skills and experience do you need?', 'Building fast, reliable, scalable data pipelines that process over billions of historical data points collected from tens of thousands of retail stores across the US which power our machine learning models.Integrating, analyzing, finding issues with, and solving shortcomings in the critical lifeblood of our system–the data our customers send us–that powers every aspect of our system.Maintaining, augmenting, and helping architect our data platform and data warehouses to ensure that our data and ML teams can efficiently process and access the data they need.Collaborating with an interdisciplinary team of experts in machine learning, data scientists, design, software engineering, and business process optimization', 'We encourage all highly-qualified candidates to apply, even if they do not fulfill all the listed criteria.', 'Collaborating with an interdisciplinary team of experts in machine learning, data scientists, design, software engineering, and business process optimization', 'Strong programming and problem-solving skills.', 'Expert-level knowledge of using SQL and data warehouses, data lakes, or databases.', 'Experience with Apache Spark or other Big Data frameworks; The Data Scientist’s primary role is to support the development, validation and maintenance of decision scoring models across the areas of Marketing, Operations, Profitability and Risk.\xa0The Data Scientist will lead the root cause analysis, issue resolution, and technology development regarding modeling and analytical infrastructure and associated tools and processes.\xa0\xa0This individual will be responsible for supporting scorecard implementations, cut-off strategies, oversight of scorecards monitoring and related recommendations regarding scorecard re-alignment or re-development. ['', 'Proficiency with and experience with SQL', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills', 'About the position: As a Data Scientist you will become a core member of the AI team and execute on ambitious milestones, taking ownership of your own projects.', '\xa0', 'M.S./PhD in Maths, Statistics, Computer Science or related field.Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience as Data Scientist performing statistical analyses and/or building out data pipelinesStrong software development skills including testing (Python)Experience with data analysis / visualization libraries (pandas, matplotlib)Proficiency with and experience with SQLStrong communication and collaboration skillsProactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'You will be able to contribute and grow your technical skills by building end to end highly impactful software medical devices that will ultimately impact the lives of millions of people. Your contributions will play a key role in building a great company from an early stage. We provide a competitive compensation package.', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience as Data Scientist performing statistical analyses and/or building out data pipelines', 'Strong software development skills including testing (Python)', 'Process and Analyze large and diverse medical datasets to understand and improve patient diagnostics and treatment', 'Define, implement, perform and interpret quantitative performance assessments of AI models', 'Efficiently sample representative datasets and inform annotation decisions', 'You will have a unique opportunity to be hands on and shape all stages of a complex ML data pipeline. This includes a large variety of tasks for which your analytical skills coupled with solid technical knowledge are a key requirement.', 'Summary: Join VideaHealth as key member of our Artificial Intelligence team to develop data pipelines and evaluate complex ML systems that eventually improve dental health of millions of people.', 'M.S./PhD in Maths, Statistics, Computer Science or related field.', 'Experience with data analysis / visualization libraries (pandas, matplotlib)', 'Perform statistical analysis and hypothesis testing', 'Proactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'Process and Analyze large and diverse medical datasets to understand and improve patient diagnostics and treatmentPerform statistical analysis and hypothesis testingEfficiently sample representative datasets and inform annotation decisionsConsolidate, prepare and inventory datasets for model training and evaluationDefine, implement, perform and interpret quantitative performance assessments of AI models', 'Consolidate, prepare and inventory datasets for model training and evaluation', 'Summary: ', 'About us: ', 'You will work closely with ML Engineers to inform model improvements in a data-driven way. You will also collaborate with our clinical team to support the design of efficient annotation protocols and to understand, analyze and reduce the risk of potential biases in datasets. We are looking for an individual with a strong analytical background who is not shy to take proactive responsibilities. ', 'About the position: ', 'About us: VideaHealth is a venture-backed startup developing artificial intelligence to automatically detect diseases in dental x-ray imaging. Spun out of MIT in 2018, our prior research has shown that dentists miss up to 50% of dental diseases. VideaHealth helps dentists detect these conditions and effectively communicate treatment recommendations to patients. Our product increases revenue for dentists and has the potential to reduce health risks for over 210 million patients every year in the US alone. In addition, we are helping dental insurance companies streamline their claims review process with AI. We have a strong core team and advisors, have raised over $6.5M\xa0in seed funding so far. Our investors include Pillar VC (invested in Path AI), Zetta Venture Partners (invested in Tractable), and angel investors like Frederic Kerrest (Co-founder of Okta), Avid Larizadeh Duggan (Former Google Ventures Partner), and Bradley Armstrong (Vice President at Slack). Our work has been featured at Techcrunch and the Wall Street Journal. We have great momentum and are now looking for ambitious talent to join our team!']

['', 'A career with MilliporeSigma is an ongoing journey of discovery: our 56,000 people are shaping how the world lives, works and plays through next generation advancements in healthcare, life science and performance materials. For more than 350 years and across the world we have passionately pursued our curiosity to find novel and vibrant ways of enhancing the lives of others. MilliporeSigma is a business of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany.', 'In this role you will often collaborate with other Data Engineers, SWE’s/SRE’s, Data Analysts/Scientists/Owners, Business Owners, and other internal and external stakeholders.\xa0Knowledge of other open source tools like Apache products Beam/Kafka/SOLR and/or additional languages like go or java is a plus. Knowledge of security standards OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, TLS/mTLS, encryption, hashing, etc. is a plus.', 'Demonstrated ability to design and build services with complex functionality.', 'The Company is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. No employee or applicant for employment will be discriminated against on the basis of race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, ancestry, disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, gender identity, transgender status, marital status, or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state, or local law. This policy of Equal Employment Opportunity applies to all policies and programs relating to recruitment and hiring, promotion, compensation, benefits, discipline, termination, and all other terms and conditions of employment. Any applicant or employee who believes they have been discriminated against by the Company or anyone acting on behalf of the Company must report any concerns to their Human Resources Business Partner, Legal, or Compliance immediately. The Company will not retaliate against any individual because they made a good faith report of discrimination.', 'You will utilize Big Data management and analytic debugging skills which are a plus for data quality assurance for our customers and the B2B team. Knowledge in data management, serialization, system architecture, SWE/SRE, and familiarity in working with cloud platforms like GCP and AWS is required.', 'Familiar with Node frameworks such as NestJS, KoaJS, etc.', '\xa0', '2+ years of experience with E-Commerce technology stack – Node, SOLR, Cassandra, API, REST, JSON, SOAP, etc.', 'Curious? We trust you with responsibility early on and support you to draw your own career map that is responsive to your aspirations and priorities in life. Join us and bring your curiosity to life!', 'Team player and self-starter with excellent interpersonal, problem-solving and presentation skills. You will be instrumental to enhancing the reliability, speed, and accuracy of our product data that we deliver to our customers. Additionally, you will interact with a variety of data sources in a service-oriented architecture, ranging from legacy databases, to API endpoints and cloud resources.', 'Experience working in agile methodologies (Git), and scrum teams.Experience building/managing data pipelines/messaging on premise and cloud: SQL, BigQuery, Redshift, Redis, Kafka, Cloud Dataflow, Pub/Sub, etc.Demonstrated ability to design and build services with complex functionality.Ability to understand and parse XML, JSON and data serialization.Working experience with cloud platforms in GCP and AWS and their solution offerings.Coding competency in data management in Redis, App Engine, Apache products, etc.Working knowledge of web protocols RESTful APIs, gRPC, JSON and SOAP.Familiar with security standards such as OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, two-way TLS/mTLS (1.2), encryption algorithms, hashing with SHA-256, etc.Familiar with Node frameworks such as NestJS, KoaJS, etc.Team player and self-starter with excellent interpersonal, problem-solving and presentation skills. ', ' Built features like granular file recovery leveraging managed Kubernetes Service in AWS for elastic compute ', ' Identify and solve for bottlenecks within our software stack. ', 'Built features like granular file recovery leveraging managed Kubernetes Service in AWS for elastic compute', 'Rubrik provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Rubrik complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team. We believe in giving engineers responsibility, not tasks. Our goal is to motivate and challenge people to do their best work. To do that, we have a very fluid structure and give people flexibility to work on projects that they enjoy the most. This develops more capable engineers, and keeps everyone engaged and happy.', 'Experience with Google Cloud Platform/AWS/Azure or other public cloud technologies is a plus', 'Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve the software.', ' Manage individual projects priorities, deadlines and deliverables with your technical expertise. ', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree or equivalent in computer science or related field', 'This team owns the end to end development of Rubrik’s data management suite for commercial public clouds - AWS, Azure and GCP. Our objective is to bring the simplicity of Rubrik’s on-prem data protection and management offerings to our customers in the cloud through a solution designed from ground up to be highly scalable, available & secure and yet optimized to minimize our customer’s cloud costs. We achieve this by taking a cloud-first approach to design - leveraging technologies built for the scale, elasticity and automation needs of the cloud; and deploying on our brand new SaaS platform called Polaris.', ' Built policy based backup and recovery for Virtual Machines in AWS, Azure and GCP and managed databases in AWS. job_title: Staff, BI Analyst, Data Scientist - Business Intelligence
job_text: ['', ' Experience with data warehousing and/or ETL processes, and distributed computing (Hive/Presto) and Snowflake. ', '  7+ years of professional experience in analytics and data science or similar fields, in a fast paced industry and 2+ years of people management experience.   Ability to think strategically and initiate, refine and complete projects proactively with minimal guidance and to supervise junior BI analysts with their projects.   Expert level knowledge in SQL and relational and multidimensional database schemas and designs.   Strong in python (e.g. pandas, numpy, scikit-learn) or R for data manipulation and analysis.   Strong in advanced analytics and machine learning, such as predictive analytics, regression, hypothesis testing, causal analysis.   Experience in BI tool architectures, functions and features.   Familiar with Tableau and Looker (LookML) including cloud server management, user access management, site and group management.   Experience with data warehousing and/or ETL processes, and distributed computing (Hive/Presto) and Snowflake.   Experience with compliance, audit, user access control process and data governance.   Demonstrated leadership and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques.   Experience project management and Agile delivery methods.   Data Scientist/Analytics Background is a MUST.  ', ' Wear the Customer’s Shoes: Be a true partner, understand real questions behind requests and solve the problem with the best method for the problem. ', ' Experience in BI tool architectures, functions and features. ', ' Expert level knowledge in SQL and relational and multidimensional database schemas and designs. ', ' Strong in python (e.g. pandas, numpy, scikit-learn) or R for data manipulation and analysis. ', 'About Us', ' Be Inclusive: Partner with business stakeholders and embedded analysts in different areas to help think through and plan the right solution for their problems. ', 'Where?', ' Familiar with Tableau and Looker (LookML) including cloud server management, user access management, site and group management. ', " Be An owner and Write It Down: Motivated to do or achieve something because of one's own enthusiasm or interest, without needing pressure from others. Document knowledge to enable other analysts. Develop and document processes and make sure everyone complies. ", 'What?', ' Demonstrated leadership and self-direction. Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques. ', "  Draw the Owl and Be Bold: Proactively find improvement areas, develop solutions, drive execution and deliver value.   Wear the Customer’s Shoes: Be a true partner, understand real questions behind requests and solve the problem with the best method for the problem.   Be An owner and Write It Down: Motivated to do or achieve something because of one's own enthusiasm or interest, without needing pressure from others. Document knowledge to enable other analysts. Develop and document processes and make sure everyone complies.   Be Inclusive: Partner with business stakeholders and embedded analysts in different areas to help think through and plan the right solution for their problems.   Empower Others: Help create a data-driven culture within Twilio by enabling the teams to be self-sufficient around a single source of truth.  ", ' Data Scientist/Analytics Background is a MUST. ', 'Why?', ' Strong in advanced analytics and machine learning, such as predictive analytics, regression, hypothesis testing, causal analysis. ', ' 7+ years of professional experience in analytics and data science or similar fields, in a fast paced industry and 2+ years of people management experience. ', ' Ability to think strategically and initiate, refine and complete projects proactively with minimal guidance and to supervise junior BI analysts with their projects. ', ' Experience project management and Agile delivery methods. ', 'The Who, What, Why And Where', ' Draw the Owl and Be Bold: Proactively find improvement areas, develop solutions, drive execution and deliver value. ', ' Empower Others: Help create a data-driven culture within Twilio by enabling the teams to be self-sufficient around a single source of truth. ', 'Who?', ' Experience with compliance, audit, user access control process and data governance. ']

both simulated and live experiments (A/B and multivariate tests) to drive KPI improvementContinuously improve the quality and accessibility of our analytical capabilities and framework as well as data reporting infrastructure\xa0Assist in data requirements gathering and data validations to improve data platforms\xa0', 'Continuously improve the quality and accessibility of our analytical capabilities and framework as well as data reporting infrastructure\xa0', 'Bring a proven ability to think creatively, solve problems, learn quickly, work independently, handle ambiguity, and adapt to change in a fast-paced environment\xa0', "At Shelf Engine, you will join a small, powerful Product team that’s hungry for change in an untapped industry. Our founders are well versed in the food industry, and have successfully built Product and Engineering teams. We’re not only solving complex technical problems at scale, but tackling key initiatives with large environmental impacts a well. We're a tight-knit and passionate team,\xa0determined to disrupt an industry with wide-ranging impact, and creating a significant commercial opportunity.\xa0", 'Make a big contribution across our entire product in this small, passionate team', 'Data Scientist ', 'We are hiring a Data Scientist to join our growing Engineering and Data team. You will be spearheading projects across the organization to determine what data we collect and how, and which other sources we passively utilize to improve our day to day business processes. Your background in mathematics, statistics, and business logic will directly impact the accuracy of our forecasting, striking a fine balance between reducing customers food waste, and avoiding understocking situations. Help us solve critical problems related to the following areas: time-series analysis, demand forecasting, predictive modeling and machine learning, feature identification & pattern recognition, model segmentation & aggregation, constrained optimization.', 'At Shelf Engine, we’re harnessing the power of AI to provide real-time, intelligent forecasting for food retailers like grocery stores, food service, and cafes across the United States. We’re able to drastically reduce the amount of shrink (food waste) which in turn drives profit for retailers, lowers costs for consumers, and reduces the ecological impact of waste. We’re using technology to solve a globally-relevant problem that both creates a positive environmental impact and an exciting (and potentially massive) commercial opportunity.']

job_text: ['', 'Lead, coordinate, and execute a coherent vision for storage and data infrastructure that supports and enables Reddit’s growth into new product capabilities. ', 'Coach and mentor engineers on the team to further their professional development.', ' 3+ years experience of managing a team of software engineers. 5+ years of experience developing internet-scale software, preferably in data infrastructure roles. Professional experience and capability with cloud infrastructure systems (Kuberrnetes, AWS, GCE). Design, engineer and deliver the core data infrastructure services used by all of Reddit’s products.  Be responsible for setting and maintaining availability, scalability, latency, and efficiency SLOs. Lead, coordinate, and execute a coherent vision for storage and data infrastructure that supports and enables Reddit’s growth into new product capabilities.  Coach and mentor engineers on the team to further their professional development. Set and support a culture of metrics driven quality, with efficient processes and strong transparency.  ', 'Software development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages; Python, Go, Rust, Java, C++.', 'Set and support a culture of metrics driven quality, with efficient processes and strong transparency. ['', ' Bring the best of engineering practices and culture to ML product development. ', 'Support for you, professionally and personally', '  Professional growth : We hire people we trust, and we give team members autonomy to do their best work. We also support professional development with training, coaching, and regular feedback.   A connected team : Grammarly builds a product that helps people connect, and we apply this mindset to our own team. We have a highly collaborative culture supported by our EAGER values. We also take time to celebrate our colleagues and accomplishments with global, local, and team-specific events and programs.   Comprehensive benefits : Grammarly offers all team members competitive pay along with a benefits package that includes superior health care. We also offer ample and defined time off, catered lunches, gym and recreation stipends, admission discounts, and more.  ', ' Has passion for quality in system design and building internal tools to boost productivity. ', ' Help make Grammarly’s diverse array of machine learning systems maintainable by providing a common set of infrastructure, orchestration, and monitoring. ', ' Understands data structures and algorithms at a level sufficient to write performant code when working with large datasets or large incoming data streams. ', ' Collaborate with a wide range of internal feature development teams to deliver delightful product offerings to our customers. ', ' Professional growth : We hire people we trust, and we give team members autonomy to do their best work. We also support professional development with training, coaching, and regular feedback. ', 'We encourage you to apply', '  Embodies our EAGER values—is ethical, adaptable, gritty, empathetic, and remarkable.   Demonstrates perseverance when faced with tough technical issues that have not been solved before.   Understands data structures and algorithms at a level sufficient to write performant code when working with large datasets or large incoming data streams.   Brings experience translating product requirements into scalable and performant code that involves interactions with databases, caching layers, or other services and/or APIs.   Is comfortable with data warehousing, data pipelines, ETL, best practices for moving data around, and real-time vs. offline compute options.   Is fluent in any of the JVM languages and associated production cloud ecosystems.   Has passion for quality in system design and building internal tools to boost productivity.   Has experience and a well-formed perspective on production support and processes for live consumer and enterprise product offerings.   Is generally interested in machine learning and deep learning algorithms in the NLP space.  ', ' Embodies our EAGER values—is ethical, adaptable, gritty, empathetic, and remarkable. ', 'In This Role, You Will', ' Collaborate with cloud and data platform teams to build state-of-the-art solutions to automate model training, validation, production testing, and monitoring. ', ' Demonstrates perseverance when faced with tough technical issues that have not been solved before. ', '  Collaborate with a wide range of internal feature development teams to deliver delightful product offerings to our customers.   Bring your experience and creativity to identify opportunities as well as to design and implement solutions toward building infrastructure, tools, and sustainable processes for deploying ML models to production environments.   Collaborate with cloud and data platform teams to build state-of-the-art solutions to automate model training, validation, production testing, and monitoring.   Build and own your vision and roadmap for ML feature scalability and maintainability, guide the team and lead operational support for product features, and establish best practices.   Help make Grammarly’s diverse array of machine learning systems maintainable by providing a common set of infrastructure, orchestration, and monitoring.   Bring the best of engineering practices and culture to ML product development.  ', ' Is comfortable with data warehousing, data pipelines, ETL, best practices for moving data around, and real-time vs. offline compute options. ', ' Brings experience translating product requirements into scalable and performant code that involves interactions with databases, caching layers, or other services and/or APIs. ', ' Comprehensive benefits : Grammarly offers all team members competitive pay along with a benefits package that includes superior health care. We also offer ample and defined time off, catered lunches, gym and recreation stipends, admission discounts, and more. ', ' Bring your experience and creativity to identify opportunities as well as to design and implement solutions toward building infrastructure, tools, and sustainable processes for deploying ML models to production environments. ', ' Build and own your vision and roadmap for ML feature scalability and maintainability, guide the team and lead operational support for product features, and establish best practices. ', ' Is generally interested in machine learning and deep learning algorithms in the NLP space. ', 'The opportunity ', 'Your impact', ' A connected team : Grammarly builds a product that helps people connect, and we apply this mindset to our own team. We have a highly collaborative culture supported by our EAGER values. We also take time to celebrate our colleagues and accomplishments with global, local, and team-specific events and programs. ', ' Has experience and a well-formed perspective on production support and processes for live consumer and enterprise product offerings. ', 'We’re looking for someone who', ' Is fluent in any of the JVM languages and associated production cloud ecosystems. ']

This engineer’s duty is to monitor the existing metrics, analyze data, and lead partnerships with other Data and Analytics teams in an effort to identify and implement systems and process improvements. This engineer also designs, architects, implements, and supports key datasets. job_text: ['The\xa0Sr. BI Software Engineer position has core responsibilities for the architecture, design, development, maintenance, optimization and operations of Business Intelligence applications produced by the Web Applications department.\xa0', '', 'Masters or Bachelors in Computer Science from an accredited College', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0SQL Server BI skills (SSIS, SSRS, SSAS) in a SQL Server 2008/2012 environment.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0At least five years of hands on software development and BI report development experience. Individual will work to maximize application availability by minimizing database and application downtime. They will assist with and advise in the ongoing development, testing, integration, maintenance, and support of all Firm systems that rely on SQL Server.', 'Able to manage and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously.', 'Act as a team leader and coach and advise more junior staff members.', 'Proactively manage and monitor SQL Server infrastructure and assist teams to tune performance and remediate any issues utilizing the Database infrastructure.', 'Monitor and maintain all SQL instances and databases in order to maximize system availability. principles such as key selection, relationships, normalization, etc.', 'Configuration and installation of Microsoft SQL Server (including log shipping, database mirroring, and AlwaysOn Availability Group setup)', 'Experience with scripting / programing languages such as PowerShell, .Net and C# will be a plus.\xa0\xa0', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with an ability to communicate effectively with people of varying technical expertise.', 'Manage projects independently, adhering to and helping to establish timelines and budget limits.', 'Support the firm’s financial applications and support any related tasks.', 'Self-motivated with good time management and project management skills.', 'My client, a top-tier global firm, is looking for a Sr. Database Engineer to add to their outstanding team.', 'Strong working knowledge of SQL Server business intelligence tools (SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, etc.).', '5+ years of experience administering Microsoft SQL Server in an enterprise environment.Familiarity with Windows server operating systems, and an understanding of server hardware as it relates to SQL Server, especially in the areas of CPU, RAM, and I/O subsystems, as well as an understanding of basic networking concepts.Extensive experience writing advanced SQL queries and stored procedures and troubleshooting their performance.Thorough understanding of relational database design principles such as key selection, relationships, normalization, etc.Strong working knowledge of SQL Server business intelligence tools (SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, etc.).Able to work well under minimal supervision.Able to manage and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously.Self-motivated with good time management and project management skills.Excellent verbal and written code and add monitoring for everything you develop', 'Systems architecture, design, implementation, and support of the following platform areas and capabilities:', 'We capture and analyze device, usage, sentiment, and assessment data, attention, and engagement data based on spatial (gaze, hand) and voice data over tens of millions of in-headset immersive learning and training sessions. We are developing a streaming analytics platform that will allow us to process, join, aggregate, reform, and query data across these very large structured and unstructured datasets to produce immersive analytics with deep insights on learning sessions. Consumers include customers and external users for insights on their learning and training performance, and internal users like Data Scientists and Analysts who need access to raw and processed data from pipelines using notebooks and machine learning frameworks to develop, experiment with, and train learning models.', 'Be a visible technical leader in the organization. Influence engineers by advocating for and practicing a culture of engineering excellence. Mentor and coach lesser experienced engineers to make a positive impact on their career development', 'Real-time and batch processing pipelines to process data into logical data sets in data lakes and analytical databases', 'Your responsibilities:\xa0', 'Experience with development and operationalization of large-scale data pipelines and distributed services for structured and unstructured data using streaming frameworks and systems like Kafka, Beam, Spark', 'Tooling and infrastructure for machine learning frameworks, notebooks, and pipelines for querying raw and processed data for training and experimentation', 'At Strivr, our engineering teams develop immersive experience software and a cloud-based software platform that powers the creation, management, and experience of immersive learning with a unique level of insights and predictive analytics. The platform is scalable, secure, and compliant which is critical to making our customers and users successful on our platform. The engineering team is distributed and supports a culture of remote work. In addition to the five company\xa0values\xa0of teamwork, grit, transparency, impact, and passion, we index on strong communication skills, a growth mindset, responsibility and ownership, and a collaborative and respectful work culture.', 'We are hiring software engineers who are passionate about data engineering, analytics, and developing secure, scalable, and reliable data pipelines and platforms. As an engineer working on Strivr’s data platform, you will have the opportunity to own the full cycle development of distributed services, data pipelines, and infrastructure that needs to scale to process petabytes of data and deliver insights and immersive analytics to hundreds of thousands of users and devices, all in real-time access. You will be expected to prioritize scalability, reliability, and security in your designs and implementation. You will work cross-functionally with other engineering teams, Product Managers, and Data Scientists to deliver end-to-end user-facing functionality and experience.', 'Experience developing on public cloud platforms (Google Cloud, AWS, or Azure) including experience with orchestration using Kubernetes and Docker', 'APIs for querying raw and processed data for consumption by user-facing visualizations and dashboards in web applications', 'Strivr was founded in 2015 out of Stanford University’s Virtual Human Interaction Lab, using the football field as our proving ground. Since then, we have quickly expanded from the athlete to the enterprise, partnering with leading Fortune 500 companies including\xa0Walmart,\xa0Verizon, and\xa0Fidelity\xa0to innovate and elevate employee development.', 'Experience developing secure and scalable API services based on GraphQL or REST for web applications', 'You will also: ', 'Strivr does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.\u200b', 'Bachelors in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience', 'Experience developing secure and scalable API services based on GraphQL or REST for web applicationsExperience developing on public cloud platforms (Google Cloud, AWS, or Azure) including experience with orchestration using Kubernetes and DockerExperience with one or more of the following: Natural Language Processing, text understanding, classification, pattern recognition, or similar', 'At the intersection of technology, science, business, and sports, Strivr offers an end-to-end, VR-based immersive learning platform that changes the way people around the world train, learn, and perform. With a mission to elevate performance through immersive experience, we are redefining an industry in real-time and shaping the future of learning.', 'Minimum Qualifications:\xa0']

['', 'We care about each other, our company and our community', 'How we work at Octopus:', '2-4+ years of professional software development and engineering experience', 'Adtech experience - working with VAST based Programmatic ad servers, SSPs and DSPs', 'DevOps and CICD experience with AWS Cloud', 'Experience developing APIs and cloud services with a focus on continuous performance optimization', 'Experience working with MDM platforms', 'Agile development process', 'Experience in native Android mobile application development (Java / Kotlin)', 'Health benefits, 401(k), commuter benefits and healthy snacks', '\xa0', 'Octopus Interactive is an EOE/Veterans/Disabled/LGBT employer.', 'We’re searching for a Software Engineer who can collaborate with a team of developers, designers, and business units to architect, develop, and maintain various applications to support our growing platform.', 'Experience integrating third-party APIs and SDKs', 'Required Skills/Experience:', "Apply now! We're looking to fill this role immediately.", 'Octopus Interactive equips Uber® and Lyft® drivers with high-definition screens to engage riders.', 'You will be working with a team of engineers and developers responsible for building new and supporting existing applications. You must ensure that coding standards are followed, and documentation is maintained. It would be best if you were obsessed with coding, sharp with logic, appreciative of business goals and workflows, and able to communicate with a wide variety of team members. ['', ' We were the first movers to a cloud-based platform that has caused mass disruption within our market. Our CEO is a true market visionary. He graduated with a computer science degree at the age of 15 and followed with a JD from Harvard Law School at the age of 19. His unparalleled insights into the fundamental issues in legal and the potential of technology and artificial intelligence to change our market at its core provide the guiding light for DISCO’s long-term strategy. We believe that product delivery professionals including product managers, product designers and engineers differ from one another by at least a factor of 10. At DISCO, we only hire the top 1%, pay them well, and with equity, everyone has effectively been getting a raise each and every day. Given our product first mindset, product professionals are very much stars of the show. Our logo, the circle and square, represents the best lawyers and the best product professionals in the world. We measure product delivery velocity by dollars of revenue per line of code, vs simply lines of code. This drives a very thoughtful and deliberate product design and development process that ensures we’re going to make money when we ship products. We hire many more product managers and designers per engineer than most companies to ensure that our engineers have a disambiguated product intent when they are building. As a rule, we don’t commit to external product delivery dates as we believe that unnecessarily constrains our creativity from both a product and technology point of view. At DISCO respect isn’t earned at DISCO it is assumed. Good humans inherently treat everyone respectfully. This is a very important concept at DISCO. Given the high caliber of talent, the cutting-edge cloud-based technology stack, and thoughtful and novel product and design approach, you’ll find yourself learning at a rate you’ve not likely experienced in your career. Given that we only hire professionals that are passionate about their craft, you’ll truly enjoy building a great software product and get in the best “career shape” of your life. Over the next 4 years, we’ll be growing our product delivery organization. There will be incredible growth opportunities along the way. We use the “2 Pizza Team” organization design where small autonomous teams own a piece of a product or platform and ship software at rates comparable to a very lean and scrappy startup. We achieve consistency across these teams in the areas of design, product-wide use cases and technical concerns through a strategically focused set of overlay functions. Finally, while we’re an incredibly fast-growing organization, as a rule, we do not work crazy long hours. We believe in continuous product delivery, continuous product planning and design, continuous regular sleep schedules, continuous regular vacation, and continuous fun if you’re passionate about your craft. One of those problems was that the process for renting an apartment hadn’t evolved at the same pace as technology. Our mission was to improve the experience for both apartment renters and managers.\xa0', 'To be successful and recognized as a high performer at Knock, you should naturally encompass our core values: Determination, Excellence, Trust and Community. We take these behaviors seriously and expect everyone to bring a positive Knockstar attitude with them to work every day.', 'Experience standing up databases and BI reporting tools such as Tableau', 'Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS', 'Demonstrated ability to quickly learn new technologies and skills', 'Develop requirements and system design for integrations and applications that scale and perform with reliability', 'Help shape systems engineering and BI practices to meet the needs of the business', 'In May 2020 we announced we raised a $12m Series B round to continue on the path of growth, led by Madrona Venture Group, with partners from Lead Edge Capital and Seven Peaks Ventures:\xa0https://bit.ly/2WfllsX', 'You are comfortable taking risks and thinking outside the box.', 'Day - to - Day', 'Experience as an Business Systems Engineer with proven BI solution design and developmentExperience integrating multiple enterprise systems, such as CRM, CXM, ERP, and data warehousesSoftware development or automation experience; especially ETLSQL development experienceKnowledge of cloud platforms such as AWSExperience standing up databases and BI reporting tools such as TableauDemonstrated ability to quickly learn new technologies and skillsAbility to work independently & effectively, who also enjoys collaboration\xa0Demonstrated ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders with varying degrees of technical proficiency', "You'll join a category-creating company that has enthusiastic customers, an ambitious roadmap, and industry leading products.", 'Demonstrated ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders with varying degrees of technical proficiency', 'Parental leave program', 'Stock options', 'Experience as an Business Systems Engineer with proven BI solution design and development']

job_title: Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston
job_text: ['', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratch', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0\xa0', 'Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston', 'In this role, you will architect and implement AWS, Big Data, and streaming solutions to massively increase the scale of data that the quantitative research, analytics, and trading teams are able to leverage. This team has already identified AWS, Big Data, and HPC technologies to build their initial POCs, but you will be asked to introduce new technologies as development progresses.', '\xa0', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0', 'Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0', "One of Boston's top Hedge Funds has had an elite track record of success over the past 4.5 years; they have doubled their AUM, and now have $100+ Billion in AUM. They are building out a new cloud team to redefine the scope and performance of their data processing systems and infrastructure. ['', 'Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call with one of our recruiters', 'Existing Secret, TS preferred clearance', 'We look at Descartes Labs as a work environment where people are included, treat their colleagues with professional regard and respect, and thrive as a result', 'Contribute your own ideas to our machine learning team', 'Top Reasons To Work At Descartes Labs', 'The Company', 'Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call with one of our recruitersDepending on the outcome of the screening call, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-60 minute interview with our Engineering Hiring ManagerAfter that, candidates will be invited to schedule an additional 30-60 minute technical interview with an additional member of our Engineering teamFinally, candidates are invited to a virtual onsite with ~5 members of the Technical team', 'Our Interview Process', 'You belong here! If your experience and interests match with some of the above, we want you to apply. Nobody is an expert on all or even parts of our stack. When you join our team you will deepen and widen your knowledge as your grow with us over the next few years.', 'Descartes Labs is committed to building a diverse community and we embrace equal opportunity in a serious way. We strive to be a team with a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. Scientific discovery is in our DNA and the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be; diversity fuels innovation!', 'The Role', 'We’re using the world’s top technology to solve the world’s largest problems with a strong focus on sustainability, environment, and impact science', 'What You Bring', 'Familiarity with cloud systems (AWS/Google Cloud) and cloud infrastructure is a plus', 'Diverse problems require a diverse group of individuals and mindsets which is why we strive to build an inclusive culture and community. We strive to empower our teams to tackle the world’s largest problems for good and for profit. Join us at Descartes Labs where we’re helping people see the world in a different way.', 'We strongly encourage and enjoy a flexible work environment', 'Work with our science team to build a system that allows them to focus on analysis', 'After that, candidates will be invited to schedule an additional 30-60 minute technical interview with an additional member of our Engineering team', 'We pride collaboration over ownership, iteration over perfection, principles over rules, and discussion over directives', 'Accommodations will be provided as requested by candidates during all aspects of our interview process.', 'We’re a highly collaborative company that constantly promotes success through teamwork', 'Proficiency with git and modern distributed version control system practices is required', 'Depending on the outcome of the screening call, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-60 minute interview with our Engineering Hiring Manager', 'Keep our data ingest and processing pipelines up-and-running within security parameters of federal partners in classified and unclassified environments', 'Make our data storage and access faster and more scalable', 'Code examples (preferably on github / bitbucket / etc) are required', 'Your Impact', 'Undergraduate degree in a relevant technical area', 'Keep our data ingest and processing pipelines up-and-running within security parameters of federal partners in classified and unclassified environmentsMake our data storage and access faster and more scalableWork with our science team to build a system that allows them to focus on analysisContribute your own ideas to our machine learning team', 'Experience with geospatial, planetary, or astronomical datasets is valuable', 'Real-world software experience in Python is required; experience in other languages is also valuable', 'We pride collaboration over ownership, iteration over perfection, principles over rules, and discussion over directivesWe’re using the world’s top technology to solve the world’s largest problems with a strong focus on sustainability, environment, and impact scienceWe look at Descartes Labs as a work environment where people are included, treat their colleagues with professional regard and respect, and thrive as a resultWe’re a highly collaborative company that constantly promotes success through teamworkWe strongly encourage and enjoy a flexible work environmentDescartes Labs offers a generous compensation package including a competitive salary; choice of medical plan; dental, life, and disability insurance; a 401K plan; paid holidays and flexible paid time off', 'Experience with high performance or large scale computing infrastructure', 'Descartes Labs is a software and analytics company that enables organizations to understand their relationship with the physical world and use actionable insights to create positive change. We provide a unified modeling platform for spatial, market, sensor, and customer data that generates scientifically validated analytics at a global scale. Headquartered in Santa Fe, New Mexico, Descartes Labs has offices across the United States serving customers globally. We are seeking a talented cleared Geospatial Data Engineer to join our\xa0growing government team!', 'Strong familiarity with Linux systems', 'We need a cleared geospatial data engineer with strong experience building processing pipelines and familiarity with earth observation data. This role will help us build our cloud based supercomputer that currently ingests 10 Terabytes of near real-time geospatial data per day within the requirements of our Federal partners. Our microservices-based platform is developed from the ground up cloud-native, and we see a peak load of nearly billion API calls a day. We aim to supercharge machine learning scientists to ask geospatial and temporal questions not previously possible to understand the changing physical world better.', 'Undergraduate degree in a relevant technical areaStrong familiarity with Linux systemsReal-world software experience in Python is required; experience in other languages is also valuableProficiency with git and modern distributed version control system practices is requiredCode examples (preferably on github / bitbucket / etc) are requiredFamiliarity with cloud systems (AWS/Google Cloud) and cloud infrastructure is a plusExperience with high performance or large scale computing infrastructureExperience with geospatial, planetary, or astronomical datasets is valuableExisting Secret, TS preferred clearance', 'Descartes Labs offers a generous compensation package including a competitive salary; choice of medical plan; dental, life, and disability insurance; a 401K plan; paid holidays and flexible paid time off', 'Finally, candidates are invited to a virtual onsite with ~5 members of the Technical team']

['', 'Work with business stakeholders and product managers to define ETL pipeline requirements', 'Design data schemas to efficiently stores data that support various BI reporting needs', 'About mParticle', 'Desired Experience', '*At this time, mParticle is unable to sponsor visas for this role, unfortunately.', 'Here at mParticle we embrace the differences that make us unique. We are dedicated to building an inclusive environment that fosters respect and celebrates an array of backgrounds and perspectives.', 'Ability to learn quickly and display solid analytical/engineering thinking', '3+ years of proven success working in backend of large-scale software development', 'Work with business stakeholders and product managers to define ETL pipeline requirementsDesign data schemas to efficiently stores data that support various BI reporting needsBuild, maintain, and document automated ETL pipelinesContinuously monitor and optimize the pipelines and data schemasBuild automated alerting to improve efficiency of our team’s operations, including but not limited to time series forecasting, anomaly detection, text classifications, etc.', 'Responsibilities', 'Continuously monitor and optimize the pipelines and data schemas', "We're looking for a talented and technically well-rounded person who loves to tackle complex problems and is passionate about building scalable and reliable data pipelines that serve as foundations to various applications, e.g., BI reporting, data transformations/integrations, machine learning, etc.", 'Able to design and develop quality cloud-based systems and operate them in an automated fashion', 'Expertise in SQL-like languages and tools', 'We are seeking someone who wants to be a contributor in a small, dynamic work environment, loves a challenge, and has a strong balance of technical and people skills.
