You will help evaluate and choose service protocols and architectures, write high quality, maintainable code in a fast-paced startup environment with tight schedules, and be fully responsible for ensuring quality and proper deployment of the written software.', 'Founded in 2013, mParticle is the leading customer data platform that unlocks the full power of data for businesses. The company empowers brands to accelerate their growth strategy to keep pace with their customers by providing the most advanced data platform for web and apps across all devices in the marketplace. A trusted partner among renowned brands such as Airbnb, Foursquare, Hulu, King, and Spotify among many others, the mParticle platform has grown to manage over 1 billion mobile users each month, capturing over $5 billion in ecommerce transactions and processes over 250 billion API calls. Recognized as one of Crain’s 100 Best Places to Work in New York City and named to Gartner’s “Cool Vendors in Mobile App Development” list, mParticle has 45 employees and is headquartered in New York City with offices in San Francisco, Florida, Seattle and London.', 'Build automated alerting to improve efficiency of our team’s operations, including but not limited to time series forecasting, anomaly detection, text classifications, etc.', '3+ years of proven success working in backend of large-scale software developmentBS/MS in Computer Science or related fieldExpertise in SQL-like languages and toolsAbility to learn quickly and display solid analytical/engineering thinkingExperience in building scalable and distributed ETL pipelines for analytics processes and/or training machine learning modelsAble to design and develop quality cloud-based systems and operate them in an automated fashionDemonstrable experience in taking projects from spec to releaseWorking knowledge of Druid, Fivetran, Redshift, Looker, Spark, Luigi/Airflow, etc.', 'Experience in building scalable and distributed ETL pipelines for analytics processes and/or training machine learning models', 'Working knowledge of Druid, Fivetran, Redshift, Looker, Spark, Luigi/Airflow, etc.', 'Here at mParticle, everyone is equal. We\xa0believe strongly in our values\xa0and are looking for someone who demonstrates empathy and sincerity to all roles and teammates. Our clients include marketing and engineering functions for some of the largest apps in the world and our platform processes nearly one-third of the world’s smartphone traffic.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science or related field', 'Demonstrable experience in taking projects from spec to release', 'Employment opportunities are available to all applicants without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Build, maintain, and document automated ETL pipelines']

Excellent written and verbal communication skills are essential.This position requires US Citizenship or Permanent Residence in order to meet ITAR requirements.', 'Contributing to open source python packages for the above capabilities.', 'This position requires US Citizenship or Permanent Residence in order to meet ITAR requirements.', 'Additional responsibilities include:']

job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working with and evaluating existing data-centric applications and tools', 'Position will be remote with occasional travel post-COVID', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical skills', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cloud experience is desired - AWS preferred', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mentoring more junior developers to allow them to grow their data career', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Building tools and APIs to enhance Data Lake security with an eye to continuing our policy of keeping personal data completely secure using the most up-to-date guidelines', 'Are you a Data Engineering enthusiast with a wide variety of experience across the data lifecycle and with multiple technology stacks? Do you love to organize data and figure out all of the ways it can be used? Do you enjoy mentoring junior and future engineers? We are\xa0looking for an innovative Senior Data Engineer to help us build the future. If you want to put your skills to use to help find and create future developers, come talk to us! You will be working with a variety of technologies and helping to design and build applications and tools with a data and analytics-driven focus.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0At least 3 years experience with Python', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Automating data pipelines and ensuring that a robust CI/CD process is in place', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on Agile application teams to build high quality and modular back-end data structures\xa0', 'Qualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborating with our Data Science team on data and metrics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure to data security regulation and enforcement - GDPR, HIPAA, etc', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working with stakeholders to help ensure that business needs are met', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0At least 5 years working in a Data Developer, Engineer or Architect role with a broad focus on data movement, querying (SQL), analytics, storage and processing', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A “can do” attitude and a passion for innovation', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Building and maintaining a dashboard solution and dashboards to enable self-serve business analysis', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Curiosity about data and the ideal way to structure it to extract meaning from it', 'Sr. Data Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building pipelines in a modular, scalable way', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Building data ingestion pipelines to ensure timely and quality data into our Data Lake', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent skills in both RDBMS (SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL technologies']

['', 'Here are some of the technologies used by our teams, you don’t have to have experience with all of these, but you should have experience with some of them and an interest to learn others:', 'OS: Linux, preferably Debian derived distributionsCoding Languages: Go, Python, Perl, Bash, CInfrastructure as Code: Docker, Kubernetes, SaltStack, Vault, TerraformVersion Control: GitVirtualization: KVM, QEMU, general VM architectureDatabase: MySQLFrameworks: SQLAchemy, FlaskNetworking Protocols: TCP/IP, UDP, IPSEC, HTTP/S, and BGP', 'Frameworks: SQLAchemy, Flask', 'Knowledge in API design with Python: SQLAlchemy, Flask', 'Writes consistently good and maintainable code, and needs little syntax/convention feedback.', 'Infrastructure as Code: Docker, Kubernetes, SaltStack, Vault, Terraform', 'TECHNOLOGIES', 'Linode is working to simplify the way people work in the cloud. We currently host hundreds of thousands of virtual machines and petabytes of data for our customers around the world. In this role, you will work on some of our most interesting challenges and help us bring new products to the market. You will be able to identify and eliminate performance bottlenecks, be the Linux guru of the product development team, and intimately understand the overall software stack that makes us tick - including a deep understanding of the Linux kernel, KVM, QEMU, and networking.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent working experience", 'Networking Protocols: TCP/IP, UDP, IPSEC, HTTP/S, and BGP', 'Equal Employment, Equal Treatment, No Judgment', 'Prior working experience in software development and/or systems engineeringWrites consistently good and maintainable code, and needs little syntax/convention feedback.Ability to work on multiple small-to-medium-sized projects concurrently with little oversight and a high level of autonomy.Possesses most key proficiencies required for the role in addition to real-world experience to be independently productive; strong ability to learn and grow in areas which may not be presentEffective in communicating progress, asking for and implementing feedback about self, takes ownership and accountability of assigned projectsTakes responsibility for the customer-impacting performance of systems on which they work as well as team practices which may impact productivity; ability to communicate recommendations to the leadership team effectively.', 'Contributions to open-source projects as well as your own projects', 'Knowledge of servers, switches, and various infrastructure management solutions', 'Nice-to-haves:', 'Version Control: Git', 'Coding Languages: Go, Python, Perl, Bash, C', 'Virtualization: KVM, QEMU, general VM architecture', 'Effective in communicating progress, asking for and implementing feedback about self, takes ownership and accountability of assigned projects', 'Database: MySQL', 'Experience in a hosting environment or other IAAS or SAAS provider', 'Possesses most key proficiencies required for the role in addition to real-world experience to be independently productive; strong ability to learn and grow in areas which may not be present', 'Knowledge in using distributed products like Ceph, Galera, Kubernetes', 'Ability to work on multiple small-to-medium-sized projects concurrently with little oversight and a high level of autonomy.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent working experienceContributions to open-source projects as well as your own projectsExperience designing system architectureKnowledge of servers, switches, and various infrastructure management solutionsExperience in a hosting environment or other IAAS or SAAS providerKnowledge in API design with Python: SQLAlchemy, FlaskKnowledge in using distributed products like Ceph, Galera, Kubernetes", 'Experience designing system architecture', 'Linode is committed to a culture that creates a sense of inclusion and belonging. We understand that teams perform their best when they include people with diverse backgrounds and differing perspectives, but also that to achieve greatness, people need to feel like they can be themselves; they need to be equal, included, and comfortable in order to perform at their best. Linode stands for equal pay, equal treatment, and equal experiences for all of our people, past, present, and future, regardless of age, race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexuality, socioeconomic class, disability status, or any other differentiating factor. We strive to make sure every last person who we interact with feels like they belong and has the same opportunities as everyone else.', 'Prior working experience in software development and/or systems engineering', 'OS: Linux, preferably Debian derived distributions', 'Takes responsibility for the customer-impacting performance of systems on which they work as well as team practices which may impact productivity; ability to communicate recommendations to the leadership team effectively.', "We're a closely-knit team with a focus on agile development and innovative solutions. We encourage and reward curiosity, ingenuity, and technical excellence. If you enjoy working on ambitious projects that have a big impact, you'll enjoy working at Linode!", 'Since 2003, Linode has been providing cloud computing services to customers around the world. Linode offers compute, storage, and networking services from ten data centers in regions spanning across North America, Europe, Asia, and Oceania. We are committed to making Linode the most simple, powerful and reliable hosting provider that thousands of customers—from the fastest-growing startups to established enterprises—trust. This industry moves fast, but we strive to hire the kind of people who can stay a step ahead and keep us - and themselves - at the top.', 'Expectations:']

['', 'We are passionate about what we do.\xa0Artemis is committed to being compassionate and caring in the way we treat our customers and our employees. iterative problem-solving skills', 'WHY ARTEMIS?\xa0', 'You Will', 'WHO YOU ARE', 'OUR MISSION', "Artemis is a young SaaS company in the heart of downtown Salt Lake City.\xa0We are well funded and We analyze healthcare claims data to identify waste, low-quality care, and inefficiencies within the healthcare system.\xa0We suggest solutions to reverse negative trends to help our customers get the most out of their healthcare dollars. By empowering employers to bend their own cost curve down, together we can bring America’s runaway healthcare costs more in line with the rest of the world.', '6+ years of professional experience designing, developing, and shipping high quality software.Excellent design and coding skills, with a strong emphasis on quality and engineering excellenceGood knowledge in Python, SQL, Ansible and ProtractorExcellent collaboration and communication skillsExperience in Data Mining and Mining software repositoriesExcellent creative and iterative problem-solving skillsAbility to work in a well diverse, team-focused environmentExperience with AWS services and cloudExperience with SQL-like querying language', 'In this role you will be part of the backend services team responsible for building creative, scalable, high quality services and solutions that deliver world class customer applications.', '6+ years of professional experience designing, developing, and shipping high quality software.', 'Build and maintain warm and productive working relationships with internal Artemis teams.', 'Experience in Data Mining and Mining software repositories']

['', ' Strong communication skills for interactions with team members.', ' Demonstrated experience building predictive Bayesian models.', ' Manipulate, transform, and perform exploratory analysis on large and diverse agronomic datasets as part of building models.', ' Write robust, well-documented and well-tested research code and code libraries that adhere to community standards and best practices.', ' Demonstrated experience building predictive Bayesian, machine learning, simulation, and/or statistical models.', ' PhD with 1 year of experience or MS with 2 years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or another highly quantitative discipline. Demonstrated experience building predictive Bayesian models. Strong Python coding skills for data analysis and modeling, including experience with standard data science packages (numpy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, sklearn). Ability to learn new quantitative domains and modeling techniques. Self-motivated and able to work independently as well as part of a team. Strong communication skills for interactions with team members.', ' Experience using tools for big datasets, such as SQL and PySpark.', ' Strong Python coding skills for data analysis and modeling, including experience with standard data science packages (numpy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, sklearn).', ' Build and validate predictive models using diverse techniques that include but are not limited to statistical modeling, Bayesian modeling, and machine learning.', ' PhD with 1 year of experience or MS with 2 years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or another highly quantitative discipline.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Passion for writing well-structured, well-tested, maintainable, performant, and well-documented code, with an emphasis on scientific code.', ' Collaborate with team members and across the Science organization to deliver high-quality, reproducible research.', ' Demonstrated experience building predictive Bayesian, machine learning, simulation, and/or statistical models. Passion for writing well-structured, well-tested, maintainable, performant, and well-documented code, with an emphasis on scientific code. Experience translating scientific models into code. Applied experience with agricultural science and/or agricultural datasets. Experience using tools for big datasets, such as SQL and PySpark. Experience using version control systems, e.g. git.', ' Experience using version control systems, e.g. git.', 'Position Description', ' Experience translating scientific models into code.', ' Applied experience with agricultural science and/or agricultural datasets.', ' Manipulate, transform, and perform exploratory analysis on large and diverse agronomic datasets as part of building models. ['', 'JOB RESPONSIBILITIES/', 'tangramflex.com', 'Experience with Air Force or DoD modeling and simulation systems and programs.', 'careers@tangramflex.com', 'Act as the bridge between the product development and product application.Assist in resolving issues or difficulties in a manner that is consistent with the company mission, values, and financial objectives.Provide status of ongoing projects and future projects.Help identify customer needs and opportunities to drive future product capabilities.', 'Experience with Meta programming, compilers, real-time embedded, or control systems.', 'Preferred:', '2+ years of formal experience in software engineering roles working collaboratively on a team.', 'BS or MS in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.', 'Provide design and development support across internal engineering teams.', '\xa0', 'BA/BS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, technical field, or equivalent successful experience in a similar industry role.2+ years of formal experience in software engineering roles working collaboratively on a team.Experience composing technology and architectural documentation.A solid understanding of network communications technology.Strong communication, interpersonal and organizational skills.Possess the ability to obtain a security clearance.', "At Tangram Flex we are on a mission to simplify software integration for mission-critical defense systems. Although every system is unique, the mission is clear: the people on the ground need dependable, adaptable equipment to get the job done. We understand the challenges of security, speed, and safety and our team combines engineering expertise with our customizable toolkit to arm customers with solutions for meeting mission needs. We're creating a new class of software tools to support the intersection of systems engineering and software development with a focus on rapid development, secure deployment, and flexible integration. Come join us!", '607 E 3rd Street, Suite 500, Dayton, OH 45402', 'Strong communication, interpersonal and organizational skills.', 'BENEFITS /', 'POSITION DESCRIPTION /', 'BS or MS in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.Skilled with C, C++, Java, XML, Gradle, Kubernetes.\xa0Interested in DoD Open Architectures.Experience with Meta programming, compilers, real-time embedded, or control systems.Proven technology program delivery experience.Experience with Air Force or DoD modeling and simulation systems and programs.Experience with cloud deployment of DoD software applications.', 'Maintain an expert level of program knowledge and application.', 'Assist in resolving issues or difficulties in a manner that is consistent with the company mission, values, and financial objectives.', 'DESIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE /', 'CONTACT /', 'Experience with cloud deployment of DoD software applications.', 'Interested in DoD Open Architectures.', 'Collaborate with multiple stakeholders to understand requirements and build solutions.', 'Possess the ability to obtain a security clearance.', "Compensation and responsibilities are scaled to the applicant's level of experience.", 'ABOUT TANGRAM FLEX /', 'Experience composing technology and architectural documentation.', 'Additional:', 'Tangram Flex is seeking a Software Engineer with 2-10+ years of software development and/or computer science experience to support Air Force modeling and simulation efforts.', 'EOE', 'A solid understanding of network communications technology.', 'BA/BS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, technical field, or equivalent successful experience in a similar industry role.', 'Required:', 'Assist in the articulation of program features and capabilities.', 'Proven technology program delivery experience.', 'Skilled with C, C++, Java, XML, Gradle, Kubernetes.\xa0', "Software Engineers are the primary technical resource for building Tangram product features and supporting customer engagements. Tangram's engineering organization is responsible for actively driving and managing platform capabilities. As the key capabilities shepherd and specialist, the Software Engineer must be able to identify, scope, prototype, document, develop, and deliver new features supporting customer needs. The Software Engineer must be able to establish and maintain strong relationships with internal and external teams.", 'Act as the bridge between the product development and product application.', 'Tangram Flex offers a highly competitive salary and benefits package.', 'Help identify customer needs and opportunities to drive future product capabilities.', 'Maintain an expert level of program knowledge and application.Assist in the articulation of program features and capabilities.Provide design and development support across internal engineering teams.Assist in the design and development of new features and integrations.Collaborate with multiple stakeholders to understand requirements and build solutions.', 'Provide status of ongoing projects and future projects.', 'Assist in the design and development of new features and integrations.', 'Primary Responsibilities:']

['', 'Agile / Lean', 'We are moving a legacy desktop application, Alteryx Designer, to the cloud. This is a huge and exciting initiative at Alteryx and we’re looking for a motivated self-starter to get the ball rolling on our many pipelines needs and cloud deployment.', 'Alteryx is an equal opportunity employer. Please let your recruiter or coordinator know if you need an accommodation during the interview.', 'Alteryx will not provide sponsorship for work visas or other employment authorization for this position.', 'Build and maintain highly available systems.', 'Experience with TypeScript', 'Major cloud provider tooling (AWS, Azure, GCP)', 'We are looking for a Software Engineer that will help our team establish DevOps best practices. Security in the cloud will be a primary concern. ', 'Required Skills', 'Docker / Kubernetes', 'Node.js + Express.js design patterns', 'About Us', 'Interested? Learn more and apply today at alteryx.com/careers !', 'Alteryx, Inc. is the leader in self-service data analytics. Alteryx Analytics provides analysts the unique ability to easily prep, blend, and analyze all their data using a repeatable workflow, then deploy and share analytics at scale for deeper insights in hours, not weeks. Analysts love the Alteryx Analytics platform because they can connect to and cleanse data from data warehouses, cloud applications, spreadsheets, and other sources, easily join this data together, then perform analytics – predictive, statistical, and spatial – using the same intuitive user interface, without writing any code. Thousands of companies and data analysts worldwide rely on Alteryx daily.', 'Nice to Have’s', 'CI/CD (Gitlab preferred)', 'Implement and improve monitoring and alerting.', 'Experience with a cloud container service (ECS, AKS)', 'You will automate our infrastructure, implement continuous integration and deployment, and be able to contribute to the micro-services architecture and implementation.', 'Environment scripting like Terraform, Ansible, Chef”', 'Implement and improve monitoring and alerting.Experience with a cloud container service (ECS, AKS)Build and maintain highly available systems.Environment scripting like Terraform, Ansible, Chef”Node.js + Express.js design patternsExperience with TypeScript', 'Overview', 'We’re looking for an engineer to help us build the next generation of the flagship Alteryx product, Alteryx Designer.', 'CI/CD (Gitlab preferred)Docker / KubernetesMajor cloud provider tooling (AWS, Azure, GCP)Agile / Lean']

['About Splash', '', '3+ years of experience with professional software development.\xa0', 'Competency in Python, Golang, Ruby, or similar.', '3+ years of experience with professional software development', 'If you’re interested in joining our growing team, please send us your resume. We can’t wait to meet you!', '\xa0', 'Experience with Infrastructure as Code using Terraform, Helm, Kustomize, Ect.', 'Successful implementation and rollout of microservices’ architecture and infrastructure', 'Responsibilities', 'Kubernetes & Docker', 'High-level objectives, maintaining, developing infrastructure to support more efficient release cycle.', '3+ years of experience with professional software development.\xa0Production level Kubernetes & Docker experience.High-level objectives, maintaining, developing infrastructure to support more efficient release cycle.Experience with Infrastructure as Code using Terraform, Helm, Kustomize, Ect.Experience with AWS, GCP, and/or Azure experienceFamiliar with Ansible, SaltStack, Chef, Puppet etc.Competency in Python, Golang, Ruby, or similar.', 'We offer a competitive salary, company equity, flexible PTO, employee resource groups, unlimited sick time, and mental escape days (we call them ME days for short!). This position will be 100% remote as we are embracing a fully distributed working environment.', 'Job Qualifications', 'Successful implementation and rollout of microservices’ architecture and infrastructureOptimize engineers’ software development throughput and performance.Help implement an international strategy across our infrastructure and services.Decouple older architectural, monolithic systems and update with modern approaches.Directly contribute to increasing platform uptime and SLA metrics.Provide engineers with scalable and safe service management.', 'About the Team and Position', 'Provide engineers with scalable and safe service management.', 'Optimize engineers’ software development throughput and performance.', 'What we Offer', 'Decouple older architectural, monolithic systems and update with modern approaches.', 'At Splash, we believe that big ideas and great communities come from a team that celebrates diversity of all kinds. We are committed to being an equal opportunity workplace and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply.', 'We believe the most powerful marketing happens in-person. Our mission is to develop the most innovative event technology on the planet to help marketers reach and engage their target audiences in-person. From simplifying event asset creation to capturing attendee insights and measuring event impact, Splash enables marketers to efficiently scale event programs and connect event-driven engagement to business results. More than half of the Fortune 500 use Splash to streamline event marketing execution and optimize performance.', 'Experience with AWS, GCP, and/or Azure experience', 'Join our growing engineering team as we extend Splash into brand new markets.\xa0Our modular software and scalable cloud infrastructure allow us to be stable and flexible as we provide SaaS features to our free and paid clients. We deal in workflow, efficiency optimization, and bulk data manipulation.\xa0We are building out an API-driven service-oriented architecture using PHP, Go, Nodejs, and more. Our vision for the future is continuously evolving, with plans to introduce microservices into our infrastructure this year. Our roles not only involve understanding and contributing quality code to our existing architecture, but also being a key part of the initiatives that will lead us forward.', 'Help implement an international strategy across our infrastructure and services.', 'Directly contribute to increasing platform uptime and SLA metrics.', "The development and product teams are at Splash's core and contribute directly to the success of our team and company. We're proud to belong to a company where we continuously challenge each other to level up our skills and techniques - and we expect all our engineers to be inspired and evolve our conventions and tools.", "You’ll be responsible for assessing the complexity, design solutions for new features, implement, and iterate on your product. You'll have the opportunity to become the leader of your projects and other critical initiatives that are important to you and Splash.", 'At Splash, we believe that big ideas and great communities come from a team that celebrates diversity of all kinds. We are committed to being an equal opportunity workplace and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply.\xa0', "What's Next?", '*We collect personal information (PI) from you in connection with your application for employment with Splash, including the following categories of PI: identifiers, 8 personal records, 9 commercial information, 10 professional or employment information, 11 non-public education records 12 and inferences drawn from your PI. 1314 We collect your PI for our purposes, including performing services and operations related to your potential employment. For additional details or if you have questions, contact us at [privacy@Splash.com].\xa0', 'Production level Kubernetes & Docker experience.', 'Salary commensurate with experience. We offer a full suite of benefits, medical, dental and vision.', 'Familiar with Ansible, SaltStack, Chef, Puppet etc.']

['', '● Lead design and code reviews.', 'Traditional manual maintenance is dangerous, slow and reactive. Gecko’s solutions improve safety and speed (10x) while gathering more data (1000x) to predict infrastructure failures before they happen.', '● Use critical thinking skills to debug problems and develop solutions to challenging technical problems.', "The Data Processing team develops the software that analyzes, transforms, and visualizes our robotic data so that our customers can minimize their shutdowns and get their assets repaired and back online. Software engineers on the Data Processing team are responsible for the services that make up our data processing pipeline: ingestion, preprocessing, filtering, cleaning, validation, API's, etc. Our team is currently designing for scale as Gecko continues to push the boundaries on big data.", '● Interact with other engineers from multiple disciplines in a team environment.', '● 5 + years experience with building fullstack software applications (Python, SQL, Javascript)', '● Dedication to test-driven development and designing production-ready systems', '● Familiarity with Computer Science fundamentals and ability to apply those fundamentals to code', '● Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree in Computer Science, or equivalent experience', '● Interact with frontend engineers and data analysts to design robust web application API’s.', '● Awareness of best practices for scaling backend architectures and databases', "Gecko Robotics (Gecko) is focused on protecting and maintaining civilizations' most critical infrastructure, with machines and platforms.", '● Experience working with data applications and corresponding languages (Python, R, Spark, Hadoop, etc.)', 'Job At A Glance', 'Who We Are:', 'What Gecko Is Looking For', 'Gecko services customers across the USA and internationally primarily in the Oil & Gas, Power Generation and Pulp & Paper markets.', '● Demonstrated ability in writing performant, scalable code', '● Design, implement, and verify new features in a continuous integration environment.', 'What You Will Do', '● Deep understanding of a backend web development framework (Django, Flask, Node.js, Spring, Ruby, or Laravel)', '● Develop tests to ensure the integrity and availability of the application.', '● Provide and review technical documentation.']

job_title: Principal Software Development Engineer, Batch Data Platform - Remote Position
job_text: ['', 'Experienced in establishing and promoting high standards in DevOps, Security, CI/CD, monitoring, data validation, testing, etc.', 'You have deep experience in applying automation to data engineering (DataOps)', 'About The Team', '7+ years software development experience with very high proficiency in Python or another language.', 'Experience with Spark, Presto, Airflow, Docker, and/or Kubernetes a plus.', 'Passionate about data, analytics, and distributed systems.', 'Zillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.', '7+ years software development experience with very high proficiency in Python or another language.Led the design/implementation of config driven, scalable, reliable services and workflows/pipelines using AWS or other cloud services.Experienced in establishing and promoting high standards in DevOps, Security, CI/CD, monitoring, data validation, testing, etc.You have deep experience in applying automation to data engineering (DataOps)Passionate about data, analytics, and distributed systems.Excellent interpersonal skills and passionate about collaborating across organizational boundaries.Comfortable distilling informal customer requirements into problem definitions, resolving ambiguity and balancing challenging objectives.Passionate about mentorship and coaching/onboarding/leading teammates.Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or a related discipline. Experience with Spark, Presto, Airflow, Docker, and/or Kubernetes a plus.', 'Led the design/implementation of config driven, scalable, reliable services and workflows/pipelines using AWS or other cloud services.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills and passionate about collaborating across organizational boundaries.', 'Comfortable distilling informal customer requirements into problem definitions, resolving ambiguity and balancing challenging objectives.', 'About The Role', 'Passionate about mentorship and coaching/onboarding/leading teammates.', 'Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or a related discipline. ']

['', "We're passionate about building consumer products that make kids, parents, and educators safer, happier, and healthier.", 'You have designed, built, and maintained production mobile web applications with using React, React Native (frontend) and Ruby/Rails or similar for the backend. Experience with AWS is a plus.', 'You care deeply about building high quality software and take pride in your craft.', 'About us.', 'You are comfortable owning and driving the development of the product.', "Bansho is a team of educators, technologists, content creators, and entrepreneurial spirits looking to build learning products for the next generation. We're tired of products and media that ignore the needs and preferences of today.", "We're a diverse, distributed team with big dreams for the future of learning. Join us on our mission to make learning FUN.", "You care more about solving customers' problems and building a delightful experience than about using some particular technology to do that.", "You'll be joining a remote team of six, with three engineers - one full-stack engineer that focuses on the web application and backend and two mobile engineers who build using cross-platform methodology (primarily React Native, with Swift, Kotlin as needed).", "You will lead and manage a team of developers to build, strategize, and deliver to the product roadmap.As an early team member, you will not only get the opportunity to set the foundations of our engineering and product culture, but also the culture of our company as a whole.You'll be joining a remote team of six, with three engineers - one full-stack engineer that focuses on the web application and backend and two mobile engineers who build using cross-platform methodology (primarily React Native, with Swift, Kotlin as needed).You will work closely with the CEO to execute on product strategy, translate product requirements to the development team, and manage timelines to launch amazing products.We are fully remote and willing to hire from anywhere within the United States and Canada.You will receive competitive compensation, equity, and healthcare.", "You care deeply about building high quality software and take pride in your craft.You have designed, built, and maintained production mobile web applications with using React, React Native (frontend) and Ruby/Rails or similar for the backend. Experience with AWS is a plus.You are comfortable manipulating data at scale, working with data structures and custom APIs to create an efficient, clean engineering foundation.You enjoy building end-to-end features and are comfortable moving across the stack when necessary.You are comfortable owning and driving the development of the product.You are excited about working on a small team and helping us set the long term vision for our engineering organization.You care more about solving customers' problems and building a delightful experience than about using some particular technology to do that.", 'You are comfortable manipulating data at scale, working with data structures and custom APIs to create an efficient, clean engineering foundation.', 'We are fully remote and willing to hire from anywhere within the United States and Canada.', 'You will receive competitive compensation, equity, and healthcare.', 'As an early team member, you will not only get the opportunity to set the foundations of our engineering and product culture, but also the culture of our company as a whole.', 'You will work closely with the CEO to execute on product strategy, translate product requirements to the development team, and manage timelines to launch amazing products.', 'About you.', 'The future of learning is changing rapidly before our eyes. The way we will consume, learn, and teach each other through media will look a lot different in the next 10 years than it does now. We want to play a part in building this future.', 'You will lead and manage a team of developers to build, strategize, and deliver to the product roadmap.', 'You enjoy building end-to-end features and are comfortable moving across the stack when necessary.', 'About the role.', 'You are excited about working on a small team and helping us set the long term vision for our engineering organization.']

['', 'Active Department of Defense (DoD) Top Secret clearance.', 'Ability to work in fast-paced environment prioritizing multiple concurrent tasks.', 'Nuclear systems software, NSCCA, NSATE experience preferred.', 'What We Offer', 'Active Department of Defense (DoD) Top Secret clearance.5 – 10 years of software design, test, or evaluation work experience.Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, electrical engineering, or other relevant field.Ability to work in fast-paced environment prioritizing multiple concurrent tasks.Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong interpersonal skills with an emphasis on cooperation and teamwork.Nuclear systems software, NSCCA, NSATE experience preferred.Nuclear Certification experience preferred.', 'Nuclear Certification experience preferred.', 'Provide software design, test, and evaluation solutions to support the team’s mission. Perform assessments for the software group to determine logical information flows, discover cyber-physical vulnerabilities within nuclear systems, and other vulnerabilities during the design, manufacture, and sustainment of nuclear weapons.Determine cyber security and safety posture of the weapon system during design, manufacturing, and sustainment.', 'Your Opportunity', 'What You Will Need', '5 – 10 years of software design, test, or evaluation work experience.', 'Provide software design, test, and evaluation solutions to support the team’s mission. ', 'We know employee benefits are important to you. Therefore, we offer full-time employees an attractive suite of benefits including medical, dental, and vision insurance, generous paid time off, and superior paid holidays. Full-time employees also are eligible to contribute to a health savings account and flexible spending accounts, and TechSource provides full-time employees with paid life insurance benefit of 2x salary up to a maximum of $150,000.\xa0Furthermore, all employees are eligible to participate in our 401k plan, which TechSource enhances with a generous matching contribution. ', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, electrical engineering, or other relevant field.', 'Determine cyber security and safety posture of the weapon system during design, manufacturing, and sustainment.', 'What You Will Do', 'Perform assessments for the software group to determine logical information flows, discover cyber-physical vulnerabilities within nuclear systems, and other vulnerabilities during the design, manufacture, and sustainment of nuclear weapons.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong interpersonal skills with an emphasis on cooperation and teamwork.', 'You will work for TechSource and support the Air Force Nuclear Weapons Center’s (AFNWC) Nuclear Certification Team at Kirtland Air Force Base (KAFB), in the southeast area of Albuquerque, NM. job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Exchangeange Software Team
job_text: ['', 'Excited about all stages of the product life cycle including design, experimentation, implementation, testing, release, deployment, monitoring, troubleshooting, maintenance and iteration.', 'Experience working on software serving the financial industry specifically Securities Exchange or a member firm that interfaces with an Exchange.', 'People. Work in a mission-based company with skilled, committed, and supportive teammates who share your desire to create a new kind of public market, and have a commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion.Excellent medical, dental and vision benefits.A commitment to a sustainable work environment, including an unlimited vacation policy that requires team members take a minimum of three weeks vacation per year.401k.Cell phone reimbursement.Computer and home office setup.', 'A deep understanding of how data flows through a Securities Exchange and the performance characteristics of an Exchange Platform.', 'Excellent medical, dental and vision benefits.', 'The role:', 'The Senior Exchange Software Engineer will lead development of core components of the Exchange Software Platform ranging from Matching Engine to the FIX Gateways to SIP connectivity with high familiarity of the performance profiles and best development practices.\xa0This individual will be joining a small team and have the opportunity to establish efficient processes that enforce accountability and well-oiled collaboration.\xa0This is a great opportunity to have lasting impact on a project central to the company’s operation.', 'You already embrace Lean Startup methodology, experimentation and feedback-oriented development.', 'About:', 'Cell phone reimbursement.', '401k.', 'Experience working on software serving the financial industry specifically Securities Exchange or a member firm that interfaces with an Exchange.A deep understanding of how data flows through a Securities Exchange and the performance characteristics of an Exchange Platform.Exposure to sending and/or managing orders sent to or received from a securities exchange.', 'A strong preference for simplicity, readability and maintainability over cleverness.', 'LTSE supports companies in all stages of growth committed to long-term value creation, and the investors who share their values. We offer software and services for company-building and pursuing a path to the public markets, a U.S. national securities exchange for new and existing public companies, and a coalition for the exchange of ideas between companies and like-minded investors.', 'Proficient at multithreading and performance-oriented programming.', 'You are:', 'Experienced coding in Java and understand the performance characteristics that are key for high-throughput applications.', 'Benefits include:', 'We believe in the power of a public market that supports continuous success for all stakeholders, including employees, investors, and their communities. We’re facilitating innovation and value creation so companies can flourish now and far into the future through long-term investment, experimentation, and sustainable scaling.', 'LTSE is deeply committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity workplace. We believe the work of building a welcoming and representative culture is a team effort, and every team member is expected to participate in it.', 'People. Work in a mission-based company with skilled, committed, and supportive teammates who share your desire to create a new kind of public market, and have a commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion.', 'Experience participating in small, diverse teams that prioritize people over process, working software over documentation and responding to change over following a plan.', 'You have aesthetic preferences for code and want to be part of a small team devoted to evolving quality software together.', 'A commitment to a sustainable work environment, including an unlimited vacation policy that requires team members take a minimum of three weeks vacation per year.', 'Adept with clearing, trading, and/or managing risk.', 'Looking to continuously grow in an environment that allows for experimentation and learning.', 'Exposure to sending and/or managing orders sent to or received from a securities exchange.', 'We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal and regulatory requirements.', 'A strong preference for simplicity, readability and maintainability over cleverness.Experience participating in small, diverse teams that prioritize people over process, working software over documentation and responding to change over following a plan.You already embrace Lean Startup methodology, experimentation and feedback-oriented development.You have aesthetic preferences for code and want to be part of a small team devoted to evolving quality software together.', 'We’re looking for someone who has:', 'Nice to haves:', 'Lead LTSE investors include Founders Fund, Collaborative Fund, Andreessen Horowitz, Obvious Ventures, Uprising, and Initialized. LTSE was founded by Eric Ries, an entrepreneur, New York Times-bestselling author, and the creator of the Lean Startup methodology.', 'Computer and home office setup.', 'We make necessary accommodations to our application and interview processes for candidates with disabilities.', 'Experienced coding in Java and understand the performance characteristics that are key for high-throughput applications.Proficient at multithreading and performance-oriented programming.Looking to continuously grow in an environment that allows for experimentation and learning.Adept with clearing, trading, and/or managing risk.Excited about all stages of the product life cycle including design, experimentation, implementation, testing, release, deployment, monitoring, troubleshooting, maintenance and iteration.']

Java', 'Cohesity\xa0eliminates mass data fragmentation with one web-scale\xa0data management platform that radically simplifies the way companies protect, control and extract value from their data. This software-defined platform spans across Clouds and data centers, can be managed from a single GUI, and enables independent apps to run in the same environment.\xa0', 'You have worked on large scale engineering challenges.\xa0', 'This is for experienced and senior level candidates only. We are looking for\xa0Engineers/Leads who bring the experience of building LARGE distributed systems and leading projects.\xa0', 'You have worked on and understand any of:', 'About our Team', 'We are looking for exceptional Engineers/Leads who bring the experience of building LARGE distributed systems and solving complex problems.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Expert level knowledge in identifying performance bottlenecks and performance optimization', 'Cohesity\xa0Data Management Simplified:\xa0One Platform, One UI', 'Cohesity Data Platform', 'Ability to drive tasks to completion and take ownership of projects', 'Familiarity in distributed filesystems, object storage is a huge plus', 'eliminates mass data fragmentation with one web-scale\xa0data management platform that radically simplifies the way companies protect, control and extract value from their data. This software-defined platform spans across Clouds and data centers, can be managed from a single GUI, and enables independent apps to run in the same environment.\xa0', 'NAS protocols such as SMB, CIFS, NFS or S3', 'There will be a large variety of features to work on including:\xa0hyper-convergence, distributed data path, distributed filesystem, data across thousands of nodes, object storage, cloud services, asynchronous programming, performance optimization, software-defined infrastructure, consensus protocols,\xa0massively parallel and distributed data sets, infinite scalability, snapshots, resiliency, deduplication, compression,\xa0replication, multiple protocols, fault-tolerance, infrastructure and more that we cannot disclose yet.', 'Data Privacy Notice for Job Candidates:', 'Min 7+ years of back-end software development experience', 'Ability to represent operational issues to senior leadership and dive deep into the technical details when required', 'You have worked on and understand large scale, highly available distributed systems', 'BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design', 'As part of this core development team, you will design and build massively distributed systems at web-scale. You will be building the core backend of the\xa0Cohesity Data Platform\xa0and\xa0Cohesity SpanFS\xa0(limitless Filesystem)', 'Experience in building strong, successful technical teams and coaching and mentoring individuals along their career paths', 'Cohesity', 'Cohesity Data Platform\xa0is a limitless scale out system.\xa0It is the industry’s only hyperconverged platform designed to consolidate ALL secondary storage and data services built on web-scale distributed architecture.\xa0\xa0', 'Cohesity\xa0SpanFS\xa0is\xa0the only file system that combines NFS, SMB and S3 interfaces, global deduplication, and unlimited snaps and clones, on a web-scale platform. No more compromising between enterprise and cloud stacks!', 'Ability to give technical feedback and drive quality via code reviews', 'Storage, filers, or file systems']

['', '2+ years of experience writing scalable multi-threaded Web applications and Services', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to continue building our GovCloud SaaS-based platform. Our GovCloud SaaS platform runs a JS/.NET/Java/MS SQL stack. Our application processes critical event data, provides visualization, and the ability to communicate worldwide with impacted users. ['', 'PM20', 'Helm is not a company of individuals. Helm is a team, composed of talented people dedicated to helping brand loyalty strengthen between our clients and their customers. No matter what responsibilities an individual has, each one is supported by and relies upon the strengths of everyone on the team. Through our collective dedication, diligence, professionalism, integrity, grit, and imagination, we help the worlds most recognized brands fit into the everyday lives of their employees, consumers, and franchisees - to build and strengthen affinity. Each member of the Helm team understands and is committed to our philosophy, and is empowered to continually discover new and innovative ways to achieve our mission and vision.', ' excited and encouraged to mentor', 'We offer a culture centered around accountability, integrity, and results; paired with great benefits and competitive salary. Benefits include Health, Dental, and Vision coverage, 401 (k) with company match, PTO, flexible hours and more.', 'Why work for us?', 'key role in creating and advancing the Helm software applications eco-system in a fast-paced, agile environment', 'Helm is a team', 'Senior ', 'Who are we looking for?', 'collective dedication, diligence, professionalism, integrity, grit, and imagination, we help the worlds most recognized brands fit into the everyday lives of their employees, consumers, and franchisees - to build and strengthen affinity.', 'Helm is seeking a Senior level Software Engineer to play a key role in creating and advancing the Helm software applications eco-system in a fast-paced, agile environment. This individual will be responsible for developing extensible enterprise software using cutting edge technology. One must be excited and encouraged to mentor other developers in the use of automated analysis, testing, continuous integration, and continuous deployment tools.', 'Who Is Helm?']

['', '5+ years experience in web application securityKnowledge of web-based security protocols & frameworks.Knowledge of network security, authentication, and cryptography.Knowledge of threat modeling frameworks.Knowledge of AWS infrastructure with a particular focus on security (IAM, Role-based security, etc.)', 'Knowledge of web-based security protocols & frameworks.', 'Knowledge of network security, authentication, and cryptography.', '\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Establish best-practice security policies across the company; including threat modeling & security-focused code reviews.', 'Skills:', 'Knowledge of AWS infrastructure with a particular focus on security (IAM, Role-based security, etc.)', 'Build and maintain detailed and accurate documentation.', 'Design, implement, and support security-focused software to address a variety of business challenges.Excel in a dynamic environment with the ability to multitask and work not only on projects, but also provide operational support.Establish best-practice security policies across the company; including threat modeling & security-focused code reviews.Manage our public bug bounty program.Manage contracts with third party software vendors, including a regular third-party pen-test process.Work proficiently with minimal daily mentorship and bring mature seasoned skills when working with production systems.Build and maintain detailed and accurate documentation.Occasionally travel to meet with peer teams and business stakeholders.', 'Design, implement, and support security-focused software to address a variety of business challenges.', 'Excel in a dynamic environment with the ability to multitask and work not only on projects, but also provide operational support.', 'Knowledge of threat modeling frameworks.', '5+ years experience in web application security', 'Work proficiently with minimal daily mentorship and bring mature seasoned skills when working with production systems.', 'Manage our public bug bounty program.', 'Occasionally travel to meet with peer teams and business stakeholders.', 'Coda is looking for a talented security engineering expert who is passionate about protecting customer data, setting company wide policies, finding practical solutions to difficult problems, and helping make your fellow employees successful. If you have experience in information security, threat modeling, authentication & authorization frameworks, and best-practice security operations, we want to talk with you. This is the first dedicated security hire for us and we intend for you to grow into a leadership position over time as the team expands.', "Documents and spreadsheets have remained relatively unchanged for the last 40 years and yet these paradigms still largely dominate how businesses and people operate.\xa0We're taking a fresh approach and empowering anyone to start with something as simple as a document and easily involve this into a powerful, connected application. We believe this will be game-changing and influence the paradigms of the next 40 years.", 'Manage contracts with third party software vendors, including a regular third-party pen-test process.']

[" You're Experienced. You have professional experience building beautiful & interactive web-based front ends from scratch in JavaScript or TypeScript using a modern framework such as React or Vue. If you have experience with Java or C++, that’s a bonus.  You’re Collaborative. You enjoy collaborating with, learning from, and teaching others so we all can become better.  You’re Analytical. You have built or used analytics products to solve real problems using data. Statistical & data analysis experience is a bonus.  You're Customer-Focused. You have opinions about how users will use the product, and what problem they might run into. Being interested and willing to dive into and understand customers' problems is both helpful and rewarding.  You’re Quality-Focused. You write code that’s well-tested, performs well, and fails gracefully. Experience dealing with large datasets in a highly performant way is a bonus.  You're Self-Motivated. You take initiative and can turn ideas into real features. You enjoy discussing use cases & user flows with product managers & designers, and contributing ideas to those discussions.  You’re Respectful. You treat your colleagues with honesty, kindness, and respect and actively do your part to create a positive work environment.  You’re Humble. You are unafraid to ask questions when you don’t know the answer, and you approach disagreements with the possibility that you might be wrong.  You’re A Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders, and you will be asked to be on constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world! ", 'Educating and advocating for engineering best practices across the larger development organization', ' You’re Humble. ', 'Designing and implementing new capabilities to help people clean, combine, and reshape their data.', 'Accommodations  - ', ' Using the full capabilities of React, Redux, and Typescript to build a state-of-the-art front end. ', ' Working with the entire team in a collaborative environment where all suggestions are welcomed, and all ideas thoughtfully considered. ', 'Salesfore.com', ' Our mission at Tableau is to help people see and understand their data.The Tableau Prep team makes data preparation visual and interactive. Released in 2018, Tableau Prep enables customers to clean, combine, and reshape data for analysis and other applications. This is a powerful application, used with love by Data professionals, and we are seeking a strong UI engineer enhance its capabilities and build a strong team. This is an opportunity to work on a young and fast-moving product from the stability of a large company.As a Principal Member of Technical Staff on our team, you will be responsible for the development of client-side features and application frameworks. ', 'Improving the application framework to ensure we build high quality features for years.', 'Creating beautiful and expressive user interfaces for the Tableau Prep product.Designing and implementing new capabilities to help people clean, combine, and reshape their data. Building performant browser-based data prep software that is snappy while interacting with huge datasets.  Using the full capabilities of React, Redux, and Typescript to build a state-of-the-art front end. Occassionally diving into Java & C++ codebases to connect different parts of the product.Mentoring other engineers in a fun, driven, and highly effective team.Improving the application framework to ensure we build high quality features for years.Educating and advocating for engineering best practices across the larger development organization Working with the entire team in a collaborative environment where all suggestions are welcomed, and all ideas thoughtfully considered. ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Machine Learning Platform
job_text: ['', 'Opportunity to make an impact across hardware and software technologies.', 'here', 'Good understanding and experience of building data and machine learning systems.', 'Experience and understanding of the infrastructure e.g. K8s, CI/CD, Docker, and others.', ' Opportunity to drive the new product initiatives within KT. Opportunity to learn and contribute to computer vision-enabled safety products. Opportunity to learn and grow in computer vision and machine learning technologies. Opportunity to make an impact across hardware and software technologies. ', 'Familiarity with current DL literature and the common types of models and layers, etc.', 'Opportunity to learn and contribute to computer vision-enabled safety products.', ' Ability to train and debug deep learning systems: Defining metrics and datasets, performing error analysis, training models in a modern DL framework (such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.) Familiarity with current DL literature and the common types of models and layers, etc. Strong background in Python development with Linux. You write clean, correct code while iterating on experiments in Python. Ability to understand and contribute to Python/C++ based software is a plus. Experience and understanding of the infrastructure e.g. K8s, CI/CD, Docker, and others. Excellent automation, debugging, and troubleshooting skills. Good understanding of operations and building distributed systems at scale. Good understanding and experience of building data and machine learning systems. Excellent verbal and written skills. You collaborate effectively with other teams and communicate clearly about your work. ', 'Leading and driving from requirements, scoping, design, development, deployment of machine learning systems.', 'Strong background in Python development with Linux. You write clean, correct code while iterating on experiments in Python. Employment is contingent upon successful passing of the background check.', 'These tools are being developed and used for functional proteomic research applications including clinical lab testing, high-throughput cloning, automated clone evaluation, machine learning, biomarker discovery, microarray processing and biomedical advanced research and development projects.', 'Essential Duties', 'Application deadline is 3:00PM Arizona time on the date indicated.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Arizona State University is a VEVRAA Federal Contractor and an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other basis protected by law.', 'Category:', 'Full-Time/Part-Time:', 'ASU does not pay for travel expenses associated with interviews, unless otherwise indicated.', 'ASU Knowledge Enterprise advances research, innovation, strategic partnerships, entrepreneurship, and international development. Our success arises from solutions-focused, interdisciplinary research; an entrepreneurial approach that is embedded in every school and department; and a commitment to transform society in a positive way. http://research.asu.edu/', 'Salary Range:', 'Job Family:', 'Experience in data management.', 'Please include all employment information in month/year format (e.g., 6/88 to 8/94), job title, job duties and name of employer for each position.', 'Resume should clearly illustrate how prior knowledge and experience meets the Minimum and Desired qualifications of this position.', 'Experience with microarray systems, process technology and robotics to support high throughput functional biology and proteomics a plus.', 'Regular activities require ability to manage multiple tasks at one time, to be able to prioritize tasks; and\xa0to interact in a team environment.', 'Campus: Tempe', "Evidence of a\xa0Master's degree in Computer Science, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or related field of study and two or more years of full-time software development experience, preferred.\xa0\xa0", 'Experience in using visualization, analytics and database skills.', 'Experience in graphical user interface.', 'AmeriCorps, Peace Corps, and other national service alumni are encouraged to apply.', 'Systems integration.', "Arizona State University is a new model for American higher education, an unprecedented combination of academic excellence, entrepreneurial energy and broad access. This New American University is a single, unified institution comprising four differentiated campuses positively impacting the economic, social, cultural and environmental health of the communities it serves. Its research is inspired by real world application blurring the boundaries that traditionally separate academic disciplines. ASU serves more than 80,000 students in metropolitan Phoenix, Arizona, the nation's fifth largest city. ASU champions intellectual and cultural diversity, and welcomes students from all fifty states and more than one hundred nations across the globe.", 'Close Date:\xa006-January-2021', 'Category:\xa002', 'This is a grant funded position. Continuation is contingent on future grant funding.', 'Activities are performed in an environmentally controlled office setting and laboratory subject to extended periods of sitting, keyboarding and manipulating a computer mouse; required to stand for varying lengths of time and walk moderate distances to perform work.', 'Close Date:', 'Only electronic applications are accepted for this position.', 'ASU is a tobacco-free university. For details visit\xa0www.asu.edu/tobaccofree', 'Scope of Search:\xa0Open', "Evidence of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or related field of study and two years' work experience developing high quality software.\xa0\xa0Software development and database background with technologies such as MySQL, Python, PHP, Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, XML, Tomcat and Linux is essential.Evidence of a\xa0Master's degree in Computer Science, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or related field of study and two or more years of full-time software development experience, preferred.\xa0\xa0Experience in data management.Experience in graphical user interface.Experience in using visualization, analytics and database skills.Experience with software design, development and technical support of bioinformatics applications.\xa0\xa0Systems integration.Experience with microarray systems, process technology and robotics to support high throughput functional biology and proteomics a plus.Evidence of effective verbal and written communication, teamwork and interpersonal skills.", "Evidence of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or related field of study and two years' work experience developing high quality software.\xa0\xa0", 'ASU conducts pre-employment screening which may include verification of work history, academic credentials, licenses, and certifications.', 'VP Code:\xa0KNOWLEDGE ENTERPRISE DEV', 'Asst Scientific Software Eng', 'Frequent bending, reaching, lifting, pushing and pulling up to 25 pounds.', 'Experience with software design, development and technical support of bioinformatics applications.\xa0\xa0', 'Arizona State University is committed to providing safety and security resources and information for our students, faculty, staff, and visitors. In accordance with the federal Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act (Clery Act), ASU publishes an Annual Security and Fire Safety Report, which includes safety and security policies and procedures, crime and fire prevention information, crime and fire statistics, and numerous resources for current and prospective students and employees. To access the ASU Annual Security and Fire Safety Report online, visit\xa0https://www.asu.edu/police/PDFs/ASU-Clery-Report.pdf.\xa0A hard copy of this report may be obtained, free of charge, by contacting the ASU Police Department at 480-965-3456 or by visiting the ASU Police Department at 325 E. Apache Blvd., Tempe, Arizona, during business hours (M-F, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.).', 'Background Check Statement', 'Instructions to Apply', 'May be required to wear personal protective equipment before entering laboratories such as lab coat, gloves, safety glasses, closed toe shoes, and respirator.', 'Department Name:', 'ASU Statement', 'Regular activities require ability to manage multiple tasks at one time, to be able to prioritize tasks; and\xa0to interact in a team environment.Activities are performed in an environmentally controlled office setting and laboratory subject to extended periods of sitting, keyboarding and manipulating a computer mouse; required to stand for varying lengths of time and walk moderate distances to perform work.Frequent bending, reaching, lifting, pushing and pulling up to 25 pounds.Regular activities require ability to quickly change priorities, which may include and/or are subject to resolution of conflicts.Ability to clearly communicate to perform essential functions.May be required to wear personal protective equipment before entering laboratories such as lab coat, gloves, safety glasses, closed toe shoes, and respirator.', 'The Center for Personalized Diagnostics at the Biodesign Institute at Arizona State University is seeking a highly motivated individual who will be responsible for the design, development, testing and technical support of innovative bioinformatics software for use in scientific research.\xa0\xa0The Bioinformatics Software Developer will design and develop high quality innovative tools and utilities required for Bioinformatics analysis to accelerate scientific research and gain insights into genes involved in human diseases and investigate their biological functions.\xa0\xa0The successful candidate will be a member of the Informatics Team working closely with research scientists, statisticians, and lab staff to create, deliver and support innovative research software applications and databases using bioinformatics, data management, software programming and web development skills.', 'Developing high quality web-based software for database applications', "For the sixth year in a row, ASU has been named the most innovative school in the nation, recognizing the university's culture of groundbreaking research and partnerships, as well as its commitment to helping students thrive in college and beyond. U.S. News and World Report has named ASU as the most innovative university all six years the category has existed.", 'Evidence of effective verbal and written communication, teamwork and interpersonal skills.', 'Scope of Search:', 'The Biodesign Center for Personalized Diagnostics is a research center within the Biodesign Institute that focuses on personalized medicine. Promising advances in the area of personalized medicine have shown us that life-threatening diseases are as distinct in character as the individuals they afflict. The Virginia G. Piper Center for Personalized Diagnostics has been established with an eye toward overcoming the health care challenges posed by disease variance.\xa0Our Center is developing new diagnostic tools to pinpoint the molecular manifestations of disease based on individual patient profiles. The strategy promises not only to improve therapeutic care, but also to greatly reduce treatment costs by allowing for early disease detection.', '64720BR', 'Working Environment', 'VP Code:', 'Department Name:\xa0Biodesign Virginia G Piper PD']

job_title: Data Scientist, ML Evaluation - McD Tech Labs
job_text: ['', 'Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products ', 'Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models ', 'Work with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product ', 'Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. ', '3+ years of Python experience working with big-data ', 'Responsibilities', 'Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. ', 'Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks ', 'Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining ', 'Company Description', 'Provide cross-functional teams and leadership with regular updates and strategic guidance regarding ML model quality through evaluation test framework ', 'Job Description</strongMcD Tech Labs is the recently established Silicon Valley based technology development group within McDonald’s Corporation. Our mission is to deliver advanced technology solutions that address real-world, data-driven needs in the McDonald’s Restaurant environment. We are focused on using state-of-the-art Machine Learning, AI, and related technologies along with McDonald’s unparalleled scale to completely transform the customer experience!We are currently looking for a talented data scientist to work with technology, engineering, and other data scientists to define success of machine learning software and help establish our ML evaluation team at McD Tech Labs. You will be tasked with defining how we evaluate quality of our machine learning algorithms and models that operate with petabyte-scale worth of customer interaction data. What evaluation data sets make sense? How do we craft and curate such data sets? What data mining techniques and systems are necessary to identify such data across diverse regions and stores worldwide?The ideal candidate will have previous experience using advanced analytics techniques and creating ML models to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges.ResponsibilitiesWork with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. Provide cross-functional teams and leadership with regular updates and strategic guidance regarding ML model quality through evaluation test framework Qualifications</strongMaster’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Qualifications</strongMaster’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists 3+ years of Python experience working with big-data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms, and data mining Experience in developing state-of-the-art data science techniques for large-scale machine learning products Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. ', 'Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data design and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction ', 'Master’s or PhD Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field ', 'Work with teams of data scientists in the ML evaluation work of our AI Drive Through Product Collaborate with technology, engineering, and other data science team leaders to define success of machine learning software development lifecycle. Create and own overall ML model and system evaluation datasets, methodology, process and frameworks Craft test cases and regressions suites for ML models operating at petabyte scale. Employ data mining and statistical techniques to tackle diverse and large-scale ML data challenges. ', 'Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science with proven experience leading a team of Data Scientists ', 'Strong understanding of ML data pipelines, from defining, collecting to crafting ground truth and training/testing data sets for ML models ']

', 'Able to quickly consume and understand business strategy and operating models; can apply gap analysis techniques to create long-term technical strategy; can ensure technical and application capabilities match business needs and goals.', '4 years of experience in an engineering, development, or technical delivery position.', 'What Part Will You Play?', ' C# ', 'Must be passionate about creating solutions, and solving complex problems – in the right way, at the right time, and for the right reasons.', 'Our engineering teams utilize industry-leading technologies to solve interesting and complicated challenges for our rapidly expanding global payments market.
