job_title: Senior Data Platform Engineer OR Staff Data Platform Engineer
job_text: ['', 'About The Team', 'Experience in Scala is a plus', " Own, maintain and modernize all aspects of the Developer and Consumer team’s online and offline data systems Develop and maintain Foursquare's event streaming platform and applications for data ingestion Build cost-effective and seamless applications to run across Amazon EMR Collaborate with engineering teams on implementing and deploying large scale data processing applications. Lead cross-team coordination and mentor other engineers on the team. ", 'Experience in building and supporting data systems used by other Engineering teams', 'Lead cross-team coordination and mentor other engineers on the team.', 'Qualifications', 'Collaborate with engineering teams on implementing and deploying large scale data processing applications.', 'Responsibilities Of The Role', 'About The Role', ' 8-10 years of software engineering, 5 years of Big Data engineering, and tech lead experience Experience building and maintaining event streaming platforms ( Kafka, Spark, Security, Producer and consumer API’s) Expert knowledge of Big Data and AWS concepts ( Hdfs, Yarn, Hive, S3, EC2, EMR) Experience working in a fast-paced programming environment with hands on experience in continuous deployment and agile methodologies Experience in building and supporting data systems used by other Engineering teams ', 'Build cost-effective and seamless applications to run across Amazon EMR', 'Expert knowledge of Big Data and AWS concepts ( Hdfs, Yarn, Hive, S3, EC2, EMR)', 'Nice To Have', 'Experience working in a fast-paced programming environment with hands on experience in continuous deployment and agile methodologies', ' Experience with the Luigi scheduler is a plus Experience in Scala is a plus ', 'Experience with the Luigi scheduler is a plus', 'Own, maintain and modernize all aspects of the Developer and Consumer team’s online and offline data systems', "Develop and maintain Foursquare's event streaming platform and applications for data ingestion", '8-10 years of software engineering, 5 years of Big Data engineering, and tech lead experience', 'Experience building and maintaining event streaming platforms ( Kafka, Spark, Security, Producer and consumer API’s)']

['● \xa0 \xa0 Self-starter with history of project ownership', '', 'Summary', '● \xa0 \xa0 Experienced with ARM based micro controllers (STM32 or Teensy)', '● \xa0 \xa0 VxWorks 7', '● \xa0 \xa0 Proficient in C, C++ and Python', '\xa0', '● \xa0 \xa0 Perform and troubleshoot flight hardware bring-up', 'Lighter Than Air is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants are considered without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, marital status, veteran status or any other discriminatory factors prohibited by law.', 'This unique position allows for hand-on contributions through all phases of development, from concept to flight of an experimental aerospace vehicle. We are seeking a high energy, passionate software engineer to help develop the infrastructure, testing tools, and flight software.\xa0', '● \xa0 \xa0 Proficient with Git version control', '● \xa0 \xa0 Comfortable with CMake build tools', '● \xa0 \xa0 Experience with serial data busses such as RS-485 and CAN', '● \xa0 \xa0 Design, code and integrate graphical pilot cockpit displays', 'LTA Research and Exploration, an aerospace start-up, is seeking a motivated senior software engineer to help build an revolutionary ‘lighter than air’ flight vehicle. You will work within a dynamic engineering and design team to help plan, conceptualize, rapidly prototype, test and implement innovative solutions for the design, fabrication and assembly of large experimental flight vehicles. We believe in fast-cycle development and approach to flight systems development with the motto "build a little, test a little, learn a lot.”', '● \xa0 \xa0 Support the development of flight software for the integrated flight computer', 'Qualifications and Skills', ' ', 'Responsibilities and Duties', '● \xa0 \xa0 Linux kernel development experience', '● \xa0 \xa0 Familiarity with NASA’s open source core Flight System (cFS)', '● \xa0 \xa0 Create ICDs and other technical documentation', '● \xa0 \xa0 Develop and extend simulation of hardware components for SIL/HIL', '. All applicants are considered without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, marital status, veteran status or any other discriminatory factors prohibited by law.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Lighter Than Air is an equal opportunity employer', '● \xa0 \xa0 5+ years of experience in a similar role', '● \xa0 \xa0 Experience with Continuous Integration practices and tools', '● \xa0 \xa0 Experience with embedded development, real time operating systems', 'Lighter Than Air offers medical, dental, vision, and retirement benefits.', '● \xa0 \xa0 BS in computer science, computer engineering or related field']

['', 'Must have expertise with Python/R and SQL', 'Data Engineer at Hearts & Science', 'Experience with ETL packages such as SSIS, StreamSets, or related', 'Knowledge of Business Intelligence Tools, Enterprise Reporting, Report Development, data modeling, data warehouse architecture, data warehousing concepts.', '1-2 years of experience as a Database Engineer focused on SQL (preference for PostgreSQL)SQL experience is a must (being able to write and program)Comfortable with AWS cloud (S3, EC2, EMR, Redshift, Lambda, etc.)Must have expertise with Python/R and SQLExperience with ETL packages such as SSIS, StreamSets, or relatedExperience with git version control preferably GitLab.', 'We are for smart engineers who want to work in media. Using data and analytics you will help H&S deliver exceptional marketing for our clients. Your work will impact how billions of dollars of marketing spend are allocated and validated in online, social-media and on TV. You will work closely with other data engineering and data science professionals. ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Integrate data from a variety of data sources using APIs and data feeds.', 'Build reporting workflows to turn the data into usable insights.', 'Create ETL pipelines that transform mountains of raw data into usable aggregations.', 'Integrate data from a variety of data sources using APIs and data feeds.Database design including knowledge of dimensional tables and ETL processes.Familiarity with database design tools such as Erwin, Visual ParadigmCreate ETL pipelines that transform mountains of raw data into usable aggregations.Navigational flow, working with Notebooks, scheduling, integrating with AWS for cloud storage.Build reporting workflows to turn the data into usable insights.Our stack is: Database – Redshift, Scripting – Python and R, UI: Tableau ', 'Comfortable with AWS cloud (S3, EC2, EMR, Redshift, Lambda, etc.)', '1-2 years of experience as a Database Engineer focused on SQL (preference for PostgreSQL)', 'Requirements:', 'Our stack is: Database – Redshift, Scripting – Python and R, UI: Tableau ', 'Designed to inform brand strategies with real-time insights, Hearts & Science is a data-driven marketing agency with expert media planning and buying capabilities, among other services that include shopper marketing, marketing innovation and content activation.', 'SQL experience is a must (being able to write and program)', 'Hearts and Science is An Equal\xa0Opportunity/Affirmative\xa0Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status, age or any other federally protected class.', 'Navigational flow, working with Notebooks, scheduling, integrating with AWS for cloud storage.', 'Preferred Knowledge: ', 'Knowledge of Business Intelligence Tools, Enterprise Reporting, Report Development, data modeling, data warehouse architecture, data warehousing concepts.Experience managing and deploying Postgres in AWS using RedshiftKnowledge and experience in Tableau', 'Database design including knowledge of dimensional tables and ETL processes.', 'Familiarity with database design tools such as Erwin, Visual Paradigm', 'Experience with git version control preferably GitLab.', 'Experience managing and deploying Postgres in AWS using Redshift', 'Knowledge and experience in Tableau']

['', 'We work with over 3,000 teams around the world, empowering coaches, managers and trainers in premier teams in the NFL, NBA, NHL, MLS, EPL, AFL, NRL, NCAA and more. We provide the information they need to optimize athletes’ health, game-day readiness, and performance, as well as in-game tactics.  Our solutions include wearable technology, video analytics, and athlete monitoring solutions, and we are passionate about helping sports organizations at all levels to better scout, recruit, teach, and win. ', 'Build highly scalable and available RESTful apps used for search and retrieval of content from large datasets ', 'RESTful architectures ', "5+ years Web Development experience. 2+ years of experience with advanced UI frameworks like React 2+ years of experience with NodeJS 1+ years of experience with MongoDB or other non-relational databases HTML, CSS, AJAX, JavaScript (including popular frameworks), NoSQL. RESTful architectures Experience working with AWS, or other cloud computing platforms Understanding of test-driven development and testing concepts to participate in unit testing, integration testing, system testing, and load testing CI/CD, build pipelines (jenkins, circleci, etc...) Experience working with Agile methodologies for delivering software A strong base on the fundamentals with the ability to pick up and learn any 'stack' Always open for a discussion and seeking consensus. Willingness to provide and receive feedback Excellent teamwork and communication skills ", 'Contribute to all phases of the software development life-cycle ', 'Excellent teamwork and communication skills ', 'Participate in design meetings and code reviews ', 'We are building the next generation cloud platform that combines digital video assets, wearable data and athlete information to provide insights and analytics to coaching/support staff, sports scientists and athletes to assist in optimizing athlete performance. We believe that our customers deserve the best platform and we are on a mission to address these needs. You could be the one to help us achieve this goal! ', 'WE EXIST TO IMPROVE THE PERFORMANCE OF ATHLETES AND TEAMS', 'Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code ', '1+ years of experience with MongoDB or other non-relational databases ', 'WE WANT PEOPLE WHO ARE PASSIONATE ABOUT TECHNOLOGY', 'In order to build the future of sports performance, we need the brightest talent in order to do so. If you think you can contribute to the empowering, enjoyable and exciting Catapult environment, then we invite you to apply.', 'What You’ll Do', "We have amazing people. We can promise you will work with some of the most ambitious and intelligent people in an exciting industry, and you will do some of the best work of your life. We encourage our people to have constructive, open and honest communication; to make Catapult extraordinary; innovate and create smart solutions; establish a collaborative, yet challenging, environment to develop our performance and the performance of our customers. Our workforce spans more than 20 countries, you'll have the opportunity to work across multiple nationalities and cultures, and build your global awareness and capability even beyond what it is today. We value improvement and development. We are challenging ourselves to continuously grow and become a high-performance company. That means we maintain a growth mindset in everything we do, and our people are always looking for ways to do things better.  There is unlimited opportunity to grow, do more, and do better. We care about you. We offer outstanding paid maternity and paternity leave, a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match. ", 'Experience working with Agile methodologies for delivering software ', 'Create and maintain documentation as required ', "A strong base on the fundamentals with the ability to pick up and learn any 'stack' ", 'Actively participate in agile scrum activities and overall improvement of work processes ', '5+ years Web Development experience. While we have access to many exciting opportunities, we also realise that we are here to do a very important job for our customers. As a result, we aim to work with purpose and intention. We look for people that fit into our team culture, those who actively contribute and individuals who are excited about what they do. ', 'CI/CD, build pipelines (jenkins, circleci, etc...) ', '2+ years of experience with advanced UI frameworks like React ', 'Our engineering teams are focused on building highly reliable, large-scale SaaS solutions. ['An employer in the Seattle, WA area is hiring for a Sr. Data Engineer. This individual will be responsible for foundational data engineering work for the Market Intelligence capability. A new market intelligence tool is needed to surface standardized insights that blend competitive labor market data along with socioeconomic data, applicant data, employee data, and job attribute data to support job optimization, site selection, and labor market selection where current sites may be tapped out. The goal is to have a functioning prototype developed based on 4 starting nodes by the end of the year and then to take the prototype through three cycles of testing and refinement beginning of 2021. The ideal candidate will have an architectural mindset to design data lake strategies that complement broader enterprise data warehouse configurations. The majority of the development will be done using Python. SQL will be one of the tools used to build a net new data lake to integrate internal and external data sources using API’s. AWS experience is highly preferred.\xa0']

['', 'Senior Software Engineer  Python  C++ or Java', 'Experience working with low-latency, high-volume, and highly-availability distributed systems including deployment, monitoring, and building robust fault-tolerant systems', 'This position is fully remote. ', 'Due to client confidentiality please call me for the w-2 and contract rates. ', 'LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/pub/bill-stevens/3/26/687/', 'www.PriTechnology.com', 'Make contributions to Open Source projects', 'This consultant role will be a member of the firms software engineering team to help develop complex workflows in code, build robust microservices, build tools to transform data in a fast-evolving market environment, and scale distributed architectures to handle massive data pipelines.', 'Requirements for this role: ', 'Director of Technical Recruiting', 'Ability to learn new skills and technologies and adapt quickly', '\xa0', 'My name is Bill Stevens and I have a new twelve month plus remote Senior Software Engineering position for a major firm located in Midtown, Manhattan that could be of interest to you, please review my specification below and I am available at any time to speak with you so please feel free to call me. ', 'US citizens and those authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply, sponsorship for this role is not available at this time.', 'Experience in an agile or iterative software development process', 'Bill Stevens', 'Backend and Full-Stack Software Engineers design and implement services and highly distributed workflows that are used across Data License to gather, transform, and deliver data to Enterprise clients for billions of financial data points daily. Workflows are built using Python, RabbitMQ, Celery, PySpark, cloud storage via Ceph developed in Docker containers. The firms teams leverage Semantic Web concepts and open standards such as RDF/CSVW that allows their clients to understand how their data is connected. They expose Self-Service controls using Flask web server and React-based Web Apps.', 'Direct Line: 1-973-732-5454 x21', 'Proficiency with development tools such as debuggers and memory profilers', 'Experience with application monitoring tools or services', 'Demonstrated ability to complete projects that required significant problem solving, communication skills, and the ability to collaborate with multiple teams in a fast-paced environment', '\xa0\xa0', 'Developing software in a Linux environment', 'The interview process will include an initial telephone screening. ', 'Regards', 'Denville, New Jersey\xa007834', 'Please let me know your interest for this position, availability to interview and start for this position along with a copy of your recent resume or please feel free to call me at any time with any questions.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Experience with languages such as Python, C++, or Java', 'Bill.Stevens@PRITechnology.com', '3+ years of experience in software development writing object-oriented code in a high level programming language, designing large-scale applications, and writing high-quality tests', 'BA, BS, MS, PHD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technical field', "The world's largest financial institutions require vast amounts of data to help their clients manage their portfolios, execute their trades and analyze the markets. This major firm provides these institutions a platform to make hundreds of thousands of requests for data spanning the full range of the financial industry each day. Supporting this translates to billions of data points that flow through our system daily, including Equities, Commodities, Bonds, Pricing, Corporate Actions, Regulatory and Reference Data. To meet the demand, the Data License department is responsible for gathering, transforming, and delivering all the data our clients request through a distributed workflow platform, microservices, and web integrations.", 'PRI Technology']

['', 'Platform engineers at Roblox are responsible for the infrastructure that allows our user base to grow quickly while enabling our engineering team to develop features rapidly. They are intimately familiar with all of our technologies and exceptional problem solvers. They understand the balance between agility and stability.', 'Being the coolest adult kids know :)', 'A leader by example: raising the technical bar for your team by identifying processes to improve, technologies to leverage and ways to mentor.', 'Step up to design the interfaces and abstractions between services, building simple but highly leveraged distributed systems for the company.Take the initiative to discover, diagnose and resolve performance bottlenecks at scale before our users notice.Leverage billions of data points to drive your decisions, optimizing your features for fellow engineers, Roblox developers and Roblox players.', '\xa0', 'Roblox is ushering in the next generation of entertainment, allowing people to imagine, create, and play together in immersive, user-generated worlds. We’re the one and only fastest-growing entertainment platform that lets anyone teach themselves how to code, publish, and monetize any experience imaginable—across any device—reaching millions of players across the globe.', 'Curious, passionate and determined to deliver world class software that’s used more than 1 billion hours a month, busting through any walls in your way.', 'Step up to design the interfaces and abstractions between services, building simple but highly leveraged distributed systems for the company.', 'Senior Platform Engineer', 'The opportunity to take on massive responsibility and define your own path to success', 'Comfortable designing, implementing, releasing and monitoring services at large scale, familiar with multiple languages/frameworks you can choose the right tool for the situation.', 'Leverage billions of data points to drive your decisions, optimizing your features for fellow engineers, Roblox developers and Roblox players.', 'You Should Love:', 'You Will:', 'WHY ROBLOX?', 'The impact that you can have at Roblox is powerful. We’re looking for someone who’s eager to take on a meaningful role in the success of Roblox on a massive scale. Someone who takes play seriously, but also isn’t afraid to have some fun either. Someone who’s ready to take Roblox—and their career—to the next level.', 'Take the initiative to discover, diagnose and resolve performance bottlenecks at scale before our users notice.', 'Working with a world class team that will challenge, empower and stand by you', 'Building features that improve the lives of over 150 million players a monthThe opportunity to take on massive responsibility and define your own path to successWorking with a world class team that will challenge, empower and stand by youBeing the coolest adult kids know :)', 'Building features that improve the lives of over 150 million players a month', 'You Are:', 'Comfortable designing, implementing, releasing and monitoring services at large scale, familiar with multiple languages/frameworks you can choose the right tool for the situation.A leader by example: raising the technical bar for your team by identifying processes to improve, technologies to leverage and ways to mentor.Curious, passionate and determined to deliver world class software that’s used more than 1 billion hours a month, busting through any walls in your way.', 'In 2020, we were honored to be recognized as a Certified\xa0Great Place to Work®. We’ve fostered a company culture that empowers people to do the most defining work of their career in an environment that’s made up of the most passionate, team-oriented, visionary, crazy-smart people you’ll ever meet. Join the Roblox team where play rules and the possibilities are endless.']

job_title: Azure AI Engineer, Senior, Tech Consulting
job_text: ['', 'A valid driver’s license in the US; willingness and ability to travel to meet client needs.', 'What We Look For', 'Ability to conduct data profiling, cataloguing, and data mapping for technical design using a use case-based approach that drives the construction of technical data flows.', 'Participating in large-scale client engagements. Fostering relationships with client personnel at appropriate levels. Consistently delivering quality client services. Driving high-quality work products within expected timeframes and on budget. ', " Translating business requirements to technical solutions leveraging strong business acumen. Assisting in the strategy and implementation of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science driven experiences.  Collaborating with Microsoft Cloud Solution Architects and Data Platform Engineers in developing complex end-to-end Enterprise solutions on Microsoft Azure platform. Supporting the strategy, planning, and implementation of AI services, providing sizing and configuration assistance and performing needs assessments. Ability to conduct data profiling, cataloguing, and data mapping for technical design using a use case-based approach that drives the construction of technical data flows. The ability to apply such methods to solve business problems using one or more Azure Data and Analytics services in combination with designing and building AI experiences tailored for a client use case.  Staying abreast of current business and industry trends relevant to the client's business Developing and maintaining long-term client relationships and networks. Participating in large-scale client engagements. Fostering relationships with client personnel at appropriate levels. Consistently delivering quality client services. Driving high-quality work products within expected timeframes and on budget.  Monitoring progress, managing risk and ensuring key stakeholders are kept informed about progress and expected outcomes.  Managing expectations of client service delivery.  Effectively managing and motivating client engagement teams with diverse skills and backgrounds. Providing constructive on-the-job feedback/coaching to team members.  Fostering an innovative and inclusive team-oriented work environment. Playing an active role in counselling and mentoring junior consultants within the organization ", 'Supporting the strategy, planning, and implementation of AI services, providing sizing and configuration assistance and performing needs assessments.', 'Excellent training and development prospects, both through established programs and on-the-job training ', 'Ability to quickly and positively adapt to change.', "Staying abreast of current business and industry trends relevant to the client's business", 'Effectively managing and motivating client engagement teams with diverse skills and backgrounds. Providing constructive on-the-job feedback/coaching to team members. ', 'Independent and able to manage and prioritize workload.', ' Bachelor’s degree, or MS degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Data Science, or Machine Learning.  At least three years of professional consulting experience in AI and data science with specific experience building virtual agents, chatbots, and other AI driven experiences. Experience with data engineering is a plus. Hands-on experience with AI technologies within Microsoft and Azure ecosystems, with experiences in tools such as Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Bot Services (Microsoft Bot Framework), LUIS, QnA Maker, Azure App Service. Knowledge of integrating experiences with Azure Machine Learning service and Azure Databricks is a plus. Experience leveraging a variety of services to act as data sources such as Azure Data Lake, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure SQL, Azure EventHub/IoT Hub, etc. Thorough business understanding of AI-driven applications and the ability to communicate with key decision-makers Deep understanding of statistical modeling, natural language processing, and AI driven experience design Extensive experience connecting to Data Platforms including data lakes, data warehouses, NoSQL databases, and APIs. Fundamental understanding of ETL, data ingestion/cleansing Communication is essential, must be able to listen and understand the question and develop and deliver clear insights. Outstanding team player. Independent and able to manage and prioritize workload. Ability to quickly and positively adapt to change. A valid driver’s license in the US; willingness and ability to travel to meet client needs. ', 'Fostering an innovative and inclusive team-oriented work environment. Playing an active role in counselling and mentoring junior consultants within the organization', 'MS Certifications Azure AI Engineer Associate, Azure Fundamentals', 'Collaborating with Microsoft Cloud Solution Architects and Data Platform Engineers in developing complex end-to-end Enterprise solutions on Microsoft Azure platform.', 'Communication is essential, must be able to listen and understand the question and develop and deliver clear insights.', 'Knowledge of Recommendation engines, scoring systems, A/B testing', 'Developing and maintaining long-term client relationships and networks.', 'The opportunity', 'Outstanding team player.', 'Translating business requirements to technical solutions leveraging strong business acumen.', 'Deep understanding of statistical modeling, natural language processing, and AI driven experience design', 'A collaborative environment where everyone works together to create a better working world ', 'At least three years of professional consulting experience in AI and data science with specific experience building virtual agents, chatbots, and other AI driven experiences. Experience with data engineering is a plus.', ' Knowledge and experience with Model Management, ideally using Azure ML service Knowledge and experience with one or more cloud available Machine Learning frameworks and tools such as Tensor Flow, PyTorch, ONNX, Weka, NumPy, PyMongo, etc. Knowledge of Recommendation engines, scoring systems, A/B testing MS Certifications Azure AI Engineer Associate, Azure Fundamentals ', 'Your Key Responsibilities', 'Thorough business understanding of AI-driven applications and the ability to communicate with key decision-makers', 'Ideally, you’ll also have', 'About EY', ' Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career A collaborative environment where everyone works together to create a better working world  Excellent training and development prospects, both through established programs and on-the-job training  ', 'Knowledge and experience with Model Management, ideally using Azure ML service', 'Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career', 'EY provides equal employment opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, or any other legally protected basis, in accordance with applicable law.', 'If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.', 'Experience leveraging a variety of services to act as data sources such as Azure Data Lake, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure SQL, Azure EventHub/IoT Hub, etc.', 'Hands-on experience with AI technologies within Microsoft and Azure ecosystems, with experiences in tools such as Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Bot Services (Microsoft Bot Framework), LUIS, QnA Maker, Azure App Service. Knowledge of integrating experiences with Azure Machine Learning service and Azure Databricks is a plus.', 'Managing expectations of client service delivery. ', 'What Working At EY Offers', 'Bachelor’s degree, or MS degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Data Science, or Machine Learning. ', 'Make your mark. Apply today.', 'Assisting in the strategy and implementation of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science driven experiences. ', 'Skills And Attributes For Success', 'Monitoring progress, managing risk and ensuring key stakeholders are kept informed about progress and expected outcomes. ', 'To qualify for the role you must have', 'The ability to apply such methods to solve business problems using one or more Azure Data and Analytics services in combination with designing and building AI experiences tailored for a client use case. ', 'Extensive experience connecting to Data Platforms including data lakes, data warehouses, NoSQL databases, and APIs.', 'Fundamental understanding of ETL, data ingestion/cleansing', 'Knowledge and experience with one or more cloud available Machine Learning frameworks and tools such as Tensor Flow, PyTorch, ONNX, Weka, NumPy, PyMongo, etc.']

['', 'Proactively monitor and identify broader, more complex issues across multiple, integrated, connecting technologies and communicate as appropriate.', 'Expert understanding of firewall configuration and maintenance, experience with Palo Alto and CISCO ASA equipment preferred.', 'Industry And Work Experience', 'Ability to engineer, build and test networks for optimum throughput and reliability.', 'Ability to self-manage and prioritize multiple projects with aggressive due dates.', 'Ensure that the technologies are updated with current, stable, and compliant architecture and applications that meet enterprise standards. Resolve alerts and perform remediation activities. Determine migration and upgrade impacts and diagnose/resolve complex technology/ errors.', '10+ years of experience providing support and administration in an environment of mixed network equipment (Juniper, Palo Alto, Cisco, Adtran.)', '7+ years of experience implementing/managing VMware vDS and standard switches.', 'Design, manage, install, provision, configure, optimize, performance tune, integrate, and administer network solution technologies in a production and a lab environment.', 'Strong knowledge packet capture analysis and reporting.', 'Experience with datacenter technologies such as ACI, Nexus, ISE, and wireless controllers', 'Document and explain network topologies, understand and diagram existing network diagram, explain and plan for future growth.', 'Network concepts and advanced working skills with various network technologies', 'Participate in Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity planning and exercises.', '10+ years of experience working with LAN technology and must have experience with Cisco Nexus switches, CISCO ACI.']

You have professional experience building beautiful & interactive web-based front ends from scratch in JavaScript or TypeScript using a modern framework such as React or Vue. staff.\xa0 We build on the grafana.com platform to provide custom solutions and integrate with the many external systems that make up a modern business environment.", 'You have full-stack experience ['', 'Strong experience working with and integrating vendor cloud solutions (and/or producs) with on premise or private cloud solutions', 'Preferred to have implementation experience of online banking platforms based on industry leading platforms.', 'Primary Responsibilities.', 'Drive to learn new things and go above and beyond the call of duty', 'Hands-on development expertise in JAVA, J2EE &amp Enterprise Technologies JMS, JDBC, Web development, Transactions, WS-*, JVM, JSP, Servlets, EJB, JNDI, JMX, JTA.', " Must have technical lead experience for medium to large sized projects. ['', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'As a result of the rapid adoption of our product in the market, we’re currently looking to add a few experienced Software Engineers that have “been there and done that” within the networking, telco, 4G, 5G, and/or IoT space, to help us continue the rapid evolution of our PaaS offering. \xa0', 'If you feel the above resonated with you, and you have what it takes to join our team, reach out, and apply today.', 'If you’d like to be considered to join our team, here’s what we’re hoping to see in you:', '“People want what we do. They just don’t know that it’s possible.”', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', '“There are not many software engineering positions where you get to do heart surgery in a sense. The big carrier networks are closed. You get walls upon walls of security around that stuff. There are very few people who actually get the keys to the kingdom. That’s our gig. We are doing that heart surgery and playing around with stuff that very few people get to do.”', 'We asked a few of our engineers that exact question and here’s what they had to share:', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'Why should you join our team? \xa0', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', 'If you want to help us work smarter and faster than the giants of the private mobile networking and telco world AND be on the cutting edge of IoT…', '“Everyone wants to be a hacker. It is the ones that are actually getting into that code or those APIs, creating them and writing them. That’s what developers want to get at. That’s what we do.”', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Although we’re a fully remote team, our preference is to hire in Canada and/or the USA at this time.\xa0Our engineers are at the top of their field, we provide them with immense challenges to solve, and we compensate accordingly.', 'At Expeto Wireless, we’re solving technical challenges that the networking and telco industry didn’t realize were solvable.\xa0', 'Our software integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for the large enterprise market and we believe that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.']

When making decisions, we always seek to do what is right for our customer first, our company second, our teams third, and individual selves last.', 'Bachelor’s or master’s degree in engineering Computer Science, Software Engineering or equivalent discipline.6-10 years of hands-on development experience, primarily using Java or Kotlin.\xa0Experience and knowledge of databases – both relational and\xa0NoSQLSolid working knowledge distributed messaging and streaming platforms, such as Apache Kafka Streams as well as dealing with unbounded data.Comprehensive understanding of software systems, including the compiler/JVM/garbage collection, distributed systems, optimizers and compilers.Understanding of the TCP stack and MQTT/HTTP based protocols.Knowledge and hands on experience in docker development and deployments such as Kubernetes.Experience use one of the major cloud providers(Azure/AWS/GCP).Experience working with test driven development and TDD based designProficiency with CI/CD based workflowExcellent communication skills (written and verbal)', 'Conduct work with a high level of self-accountability, innovation, problem solving and a passion for customer satisfaction.', 'Understanding of the TCP stack and MQTT/HTTP based protocols.', 'Role and Responsibilities:', 'Experience use one of the major cloud providers(Azure/AWS/GCP).', 'You have Telecom, Automotive or IoT related product experienceSound understanding of object-oriented, functional, and reactive programming principlesExperience in embedded software designDeep understanding of cloud-native application designSelf-starter and ability to project manage when needed', 'Skills that will set you apart:', 'Bachelor’s or master’s degree in engineering Computer Science, Software Engineering or equivalent discipline.', 'Solid working knowledge distributed messaging and streaming platforms, such as Apache Kafka Streams as well as dealing with unbounded data.', 'You have Telecom, Automotive or IoT related product experience', 'Self-starter and ability to project manage when needed', 'In the Connected Car space - Aeris is a valued supplier to automotive OEM’s including Volkswagen and Mitsubishi.\xa0Aeris has been able to enhance connectivity for the\xa0complete vehicle life cycle – changing the business dynamics of their programs. As a result of our\xa0continued success, Aeris’ Connected Car footprint and roadmap is expanding and we are seeking a\xa0Software Engineer to help us on this journey. This new position will play an important role in our automotive R&D team and\xa0will focus on developing state of the art SASS services for Aeris Mobility Platform customers and help the customers integrate with the platform.', 'Participate in architecture definition, product selection, and application design.', '6-10 years of hands-on development experience, primarily using Java or Kotlin.\xa0', 'Experience and knowledge of databases – both relational and\xa0NoSQL', 'We put our customers first. When making decisions, we always seek to do what is right for our customer first, our company second, our teams third, and individual selves last.We do things differently.\xa0As a pioneer in a highly-competitive industry that is poised to reshape every sector of the global economy, we cannot fall back on old models. Rather, we must chart our own path and strive to out-innovate, out-learn, out-maneuver and out-pace the competition on the way.We walk the walk on diversity. We’re a brilliant and eclectic mix of ethnicities, religions, industry experiences, sexual orientations, generations and more – and that’s by design. We see diverse perspectives as a core competitive advantage.Integrity is essential. We believe in doing things well – and doing them right. Integrity is a core value here: you’ll see it embodied in our staff, our management approach and growing social impact work (we have a VP devoted to it).\xa0You’ll also see it embodied in the way we manage people and our HR issues: we expect employees and managers to deal with issues directly, immediately and with the utmost respect for each other and for the Company.We are owners. Strong managers enable and empower their teams to figure out how to solve problems. You will be no exception, and will have the ownership, accountability and autonomy needed to be truly creative.', 'Experience working with test driven development and TDD based design', 'Knowledge and hands on experience in docker development and deployments such as Kubernetes.', 'Skills & Abilities:', 'Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)', 'Deep understanding of cloud-native application design', 'The "Internet of Things" (IoT) is expected to grow to $19 trillion over the next 10 years as 50 billion devices are brought online. Aeris is at the forefront of this industry, building networks and applications to enable Fortune 500 clients to fundamentally improve their businesses. Headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices in Chicago, London, Delhi, and Tokyo as well as other markets, we rank among the top ten cellular providers for the IoT globally. We power critical projects across energy, transportation, retail, healthcare and more.', 'Bridge the gap between internal development design and external customer use case.', 'Design and develop core IoT applications for Fortune 500 Automotive clients.', 'Based on customer experience, review AMP design, and provide improvement insights to AMP development teams.', 'Sound understanding of object-oriented, functional, and reactive programming principles', 'Build cloud-native high performance distributed systems in a dynamic startup environment.', 'Proficiency with CI/CD based workflow', 'Build cloud-native high performance distributed systems in a dynamic startup environment.Design and develop core IoT applications for Fortune 500 Automotive clients.Participate in architecture definition, product selection, and application design.Bridge the gap between internal development design and external customer use case.Drive continuous improvement through failure, defect analysis, code review, bug fixes and add automated critical tests.Based on customer experience, review AMP design, and provide improvement insights to AMP development teams.Conduct work with a high level of self-accountability, innovation, problem solving and a passion for customer satisfaction.', 'We do things differently.\xa0As a pioneer in a highly-competitive industry that is poised to reshape every sector of the global economy, we cannot fall back on old models. Rather, we must chart our own path and strive to out-innovate, out-learn, out-maneuver and out-pace the competition on the way.', '\ufeffAeris is an equal opportunity employer.\xa0All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin, marital status, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected status.', 'Drive continuous improvement through failure, defect analysis, code review, bug fixes and add automated critical tests.', 'We are owners. Strong managers enable and empower their teams to figure out how to solve problems. You will be no exception, and will have the ownership, accountability and autonomy needed to be truly creative.', 'Comprehensive understanding of software systems, including the compiler/JVM/garbage collection, distributed systems, optimizers and compilers.', 'Overview', 'Integrity is essential. We believe in doing things well – and doing them right. Integrity is a core value here: you’ll see it embodied in our staff, our management approach and growing social impact work (we have a VP devoted to it).\xa0You’ll also see it embodied in the way we manage people and our HR issues: we expect employees and managers to deal with issues directly, immediately and with the utmost respect for each other and for the Company.', 'Our company is in an enviable spot. We’re profitable, and both our bottom line and our global reach are growing rapidly. We’re playing in an exploding market where technology evolves daily and acquisitions / consolidations happen left and right. We are continuing to expand our IoT connectivity offerings to not only include all cellular technologies and services, but also a best-in-class IoT device management, services, and application SaaS platform, as well as alternate connectivity options such as low power WAN (LPWA), Wi-Fi and other short-range networking options.', 'Experience in embedded software design', 'The role offers access to some of the most brilliant minds in the industry, and the opportunity to build and elevate a thriving company – in an environment that values innovation, autonomy and integrity.', 'A few things to know about us:', 'We walk the walk on diversity. We’re a brilliant and eclectic mix of ethnicities, religions, industry experiences, sexual orientations, generations and more – and that’s by design. We see diverse perspectives as a core competitive advantage.']

[' Experience with designing, building, and maintaining SOA-based architectures.', "The Abe.ai team focuses on creating simplicity and convenience in everyone's financial lives. We empower financial institution's customers to engage, transact, and self-service on voice-and-messaging channels like web, mobile, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Facebook Messenger, SMS, and IVR. By providing a Conversational AI platform to financial institutions and creating virtual assistants that are communicative, actionable, and insightful, the Abe.ai team is automating and optimizing financial experiences for everyday people.", ' 9+ years of experience in software development. 3+ years of experience in Node.js. Experience with designing, building, and maintaining SOA-based architectures. Experience with Docker, PostgreSQL, and Redis. Experience with macOS as your development environment.', ' Experience with macOS as your development environment.', 'Bird’s eye view of your role –', 'We would love for you to have –', ' To maintain and improve our large existing code-base while ensuring that technical refactorings don’t break existing product functionality.', ' Experience with Elasticsearch.', 'Earn a competitive compensation package with unique benefits.', ' Experience with Docker, PostgreSQL, and Redis.', ' Learn, explore, and contribute toward technologies, organization, and self-growth by working with technology experts, business leaders, and architects within the organization.', 'What you will bring – You are a team player who is genuinely passionate about conversational experiences, AI, Node.js, SOA, and can thrive and make results-oriented decisions with minimal supervision while seeing the big picture. You are able to quickly get familiar with all the technologies and channels our products are using and communicate efficiently with the rest of our teams and clients. You have experience with building and maintaining service-oriented architectures with a large existing code-base and a business-mindset for balancing technical refactorings while delivering customer-relevant work.', ' To implement new and enhance existing product functionality with reusable, testable, and efficient code that adheres to business requirements and standards, including security. To maintain and improve our large existing code-base while ensuring that technical refactorings don’t break existing product functionality. To architect, plan, and execute bigger product initiatives. To work closely with the product and QA team to resolve customer-impacting issues in an efficient and reliable way. To mentor junior developers. To ensure and maintain, together with the product & QA team, high-quality and complete product documentation.', ' Experience with Python and TypeScript. Experience with Elasticsearch. Experience with Fastify and JEST.', 'Bird’s eye view of your role – As part of Abe.ai’s engineering team, your responsibility is to innovate and maintain our Conversational AI platform and the virtual assistants we create. You will work closely with the rest of our engineering team, and our product & QA team to continuously deliver high-quality releases to our customers. While building new and maintaining existing product functionality you will have shared responsibility, together with our product and QA teams, to ensure and maintain high-quality and complete product documentation. With the success of our product portfolio and expansion of the Abe.ai team, you will mentor junior developers and help us scale our engineering department. ', ' Be a member of a leading fintech company, innovators in personal finance management, aggregation, and conversational experiences.', 'What you will bring – ', ' To mentor junior developers.', ' To architect, plan, and execute bigger product initiatives.', ' To work closely with the product and QA team to resolve customer-impacting issues in an efficient and reliable way.', 'What’s in it for you? (EVP – Employee Value Proposition)', 'Your key responsibilities will be –', ' 3+ years of experience in Node.js.', ' 9+ years of experience in software development.', 'You will have –', ' Experience with Python and TypeScript.', ' Learn, explore, and contribute toward technologies, organization, and self-growth by working with technology experts, business leaders, and architects within the organization. Be a member of a leading fintech company, innovators in personal finance management, aggregation, and conversational experiences.Earn a competitive compensation package with unique benefits.', ' To implement new and enhance existing product functionality with reusable, testable, and efficient code that adheres to business requirements and standards, including security.', ' To ensure and maintain, together with the product & QA team, high-quality and complete product documentation.', 'Envestnet | Yodlee is hiring a Senior Software Engineer for the Abe.ai team. We are passionate about: fintech, learning and building genuinely excellent and impactful technology.', ' Experience with Fastify and JEST.', 'Senior Software Engineer']

['', 'Are you interested in logistics data?\xa0', 'The company is offering a competitive salary, plus 401k, health plans, and 75% off meal kits.', 'Check out\xa0www.bigcloud.io/jobs\xa0to see what else we’re recruiting for.', "Would you like to work for one of the world's fastest-growing food tech brands?\xa0", 'You will be responsible for data modeling, data infrastructure (ETLs on Airflow and DataBricks), data cleaning, data transformation, and building data products to automate the supply chain flow.\xa0\xa0', 'Big Cloud is a machine learning recruiting firm. We’re lucky enough to recruit the best candidates in the most exciting companies all over the world. We try to reply to all applications, but we’re only human, for now! So, you may only hear from us if you are successful.', 'Please apply if you have 3-5 years of data engineering experience. You should have strong Python and SQL scripting skills plus experience in job orchestration tools like Airflow, Luigi, or similar. Bonus points for Spark and Databricks plus you should know your way around cloud systems architecture.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Do you want to work with some of the best datasets in the world?\xa0', "I'm hiring for a world-leading meal kit provider that has offices all over the world and delivers meals to millions of people. This is an opportunity to join the company as a senior data engineer.\xa0", 'You will be joining a supply chain analytics team of 7 people across data science, data engineering, and machine learning. You will be reporting to the associate director and mentoring a more junior data engineer. You will take data modeling and automation in the supply chain to the next level, leveraging the best in big data tools.']

['', ' Technical cloud and security certifications highly desirable (e.g. CCSP, CCA, CCP, AWS, Azure, CCSK, CISA, CISSP, GCIH)', ' BS in Computer Science or equivalent. Well versed in working with NIST security framework and Cybersecurity Assessment Tool (CAT) from FFIEC Understanding of controls (e.g. access control, auditing, authentication, encryption, integrity, physical security, and application security). Technical cloud and security certifications highly desirable (e.g. CCSP, CCA, CCP, AWS, Azure, CCSK, CISA, CISSP, GCIH) Expert communicator. Must be well versed in Windows environments, Active Directory, VPN systems, encryption schemas and algorithms, various authorization and authentication mechanisms/software, network monitoring and sniffing, TCP/IP networks and vulnerability and threat management tools (including network based scanners). Beneficial if experienced in Database Activity Monitoring Systems (DAM), and Web Application Firewalls (WAF). job_text: ['', 'Work on a new small team of 3', 'Comprehensive Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance (100% covered)401(k) w/ matching100% Remote work', 'Create applications for Connected TV (CTV) and Over-the-Top (OTT)Work on all major platforms, including Roku, Amazon Fire, Apple TV, Playstation, Xbox etc...Work on a new small team of 3', 'You will:', 'Benefits/Perks:', '$140K-$175K + 15% Bonus + Long Term Incentive Plan', 'Computer Science degree', 'Comprehensive Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance (100% covered)', '100% Remote work', 'Create applications for Connected TV (CTV) and Over-the-Top (OTT)', '5+ years of professional software development experience', 'CTV/OTT development experience (ideally on Roku with BrightScript and/or HTML5)', 'Required:', 'Work on all major platforms, including Roku, Amazon Fire, Apple TV, Playstation, Xbox etc...', 'World leader in the streaming space is seeking a Senior Connected TV Software Engineer. They have been around for over 10 years and have over 3000 employees.\xa0', 'Total Compensation approximation: $200K-$250K', '5+ years of professional software development experienceComputer Science degreeCTV/OTT development experience (ideally on Roku with BrightScript and/or HTML5)', '401(k) w/ matching', 'Compensation:', '$140K-$175K + 15% Bonus + Long Term Incentive PlanTotal Compensation approximation: $200K-$250K']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good understanding of various concepts of testing.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of defect tracking system and change control procedures.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good analytical skills.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in reviews of technical design, code, test cases and other artifacts.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Should have a strong understanding of OOC, and practical experience applying it.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with any Object-Oriented Programming Language (Java, C#, etc.)', 'Location: Greenville, SC ', 'We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on a business philosophy called Market Based Management®\xa0(MBM®). Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, MBM® prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.\xa0', 'Our Guiding Principles set the standard for how we work with one another. They define who we are as an organization and guide everything we do. By applying the same shared values that unleash prosperity in free societies—such as value creation, integrity, responsibility, free speech, and toleration—we encourage one another to take initiative and to challenge the status quo.', 'Title: Software Engineer, Associate', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Willingness to take-up time-critical tasks and provide a consistent update on the progress.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Having 0-2 years of work experience in software development', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good understanding of Object-Oriented Concepts (OOC).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze and debug the product issues.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to break down the tasks, provide programming estimates and tracking the progress.', 'What Will Put You Ahead?', 'What You Will Need:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good understanding of SQL.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure to RESTful web services, XML, JSON, Batch, and Shell scripting.', 'Infor does not discriminate in employment opportunities or practices on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, marital status, age, veteran status, protected veterans, military service obligation, citizenship status, individuals with disabilities, or any other characteristic protected by law applicable to the state in which you work.If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you wish to discuss potential accommodations related to applying for employment at our company, please contact Human Resources at 470-548-7173 and/or ADAAA@infor.com. ', 'This position is on the CloudSuite Portal development team. The developer in this position will be responsible for building automation for provisioning Infor applications on AWS. Components are developed using primarily Infor Mongoose, .Net and AWS technology. Candidate should have good programming, analytical and debugging skills, and will be able to work well both in a team environment and independently.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hands on experience with UNIX operating system is preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Follow best coding standards; write optimized and highly performing code.', 'Infor Values:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure working with AWS services is an advantage.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure in web-based application architecture is an advantage.', 'Applicants to and employees of most United States private employers, state and local governments, educational institutions, employment agencies and labor organizations are protected under Federal law from discrimination. For additional information please see EEO is the Law poster, the EEO Supplemental as well as the Statement of Policy. If you would like to view a copy of the company’s affirmative action plan or policy statement, please email us.hrprograms@infor.com.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Write server-side code for web-based applications, and good exposure to UI design & development.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist other developers, QA with product issues and usage of developed components.', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor's or Master’s degree from Computer Science.", 'A Day in The Life Typically Includes:', 'Pursuant to government requirements tied to FedRAMP, this specific position requires US Citizenship or Perm Resident status.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Should be able to write test cases, and efficiently organizing of test cases under different categories.']

['', 'Strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving ability', 'Experience developing and interfacing with REST APIs', 'Shelf Engine', '\xa0', 'Experience building both web applications and mobile applications', 'Run the full software development lifecycle - problem definition, design, development, testing, demoing, and supporting production use of the features you own', 'And our Ideal Sr. Software Engineer will have:', "At Shelf Engine, you will join an inclusive team of driven, passionate, and caring people hungry for change in an untapped industry. Our founders are well versed in the food industry and have successfully built product and engineering teams. We’re not only solving complex technical problems at scale but tackling key initiatives with large environmental impacts. We're a tight-knit and passionate team that is determined to disrupt a massive industry and leave behind a positive legacy for generations to come.", 'Build efficient and reusable systems that drive complex web and mobile applications', '3+ years of production-level engineering under your belt', ' Software Engineers', 'Knowledge of the following frameworks: Angular, Ionic (front end) and ASP.NET, EntityFramework (back end)', 'As a Sr. Software Engineer at Shelf Engine you will:', 'Shelf Engine is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Bonus Points: Experience in distributed systems, payments systems (e.g. Stripe, Dwolla, etc), logistics, warehousing, or the food (grocery, etc.) industry', 'We are looking for experienced Software Engineers who will play an integral part in designing a system that allows us to scale up our customer base while maintaining an ability to quickly engineer and deploy new features. In this position, you will develop solutions across broad areas, from mobile and desktop UX for our end users, to automated integration with other customer data systems, to our core storage systems and business logic. Our engineering team is small (you’ll be #4), so we’ll need you to flex your skill-set, working across the stack (TypeScript/C#).\xa0', 'Be able to balance immediate business objectives against long-term architectural vision', 'Create software features that are robust, reliable, and user friendly for both internal teams and our customer base', 'About Us:', '3+ years of production-level engineering under your beltExperience developing and interfacing with REST APIsExperience building both web applications and mobile applicationsFamiliar with the Microsoft stack: TypeScript/C#, Azure, MSSQL, etc.Knowledge of the following frameworks: Angular, Ionic (front end) and ASP.NET, EntityFramework (back end)Strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving abilityBonus Points: Experience in distributed systems, payments systems (e.g. Stripe, Dwolla, etc), logistics, warehousing, or the food (grocery, etc.) industry', 'Write scalable/high-performance code on both the frontend and backend, understanding complex technical areas along the way', 'Familiar with the Microsoft stack: TypeScript/C#, Azure, MSSQL, etc.', 'At Shelf Engine, we’re harnessing the power of AI to provide real-time, intelligent forecasting for food retailers like grocery stores, food service, and cafes across the United States. We’re able to drastically reduce the amount of shrink (food waste) which in turn drives profit for retailers, lowers costs for consumers, and reduces the ecological impact of waste. We’re using technology to solve a globally-relevant problem that both creates a positive environmental impact and an exciting (and potentially massive) commercial opportunity.', 'Write scalable/high-performance code on both the frontend and backend, understanding complex technical areas along the wayBuild efficient and reusable systems that drive complex web and mobile applicationsCreate software features that are robust, reliable, and user friendly for both internal teams and our customer baseRun the full software development lifecycle - problem definition, design, development, testing, demoing, and supporting production use of the features you ownBe able to balance immediate business objectives against long-term architectural vision']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer | AWS, Equities, Fixed Income | Elite Hedge Fund in Boston
job_text: ['', 'Leverage streaming, serverless, and AWS technologies to build a next-gen data platform from scratch', 'Leverage streaming, serverless, and AWS technologies to build a next-gen data platform from scratchHelp lead a massive data migration to AWSGain valuable expertise on investment strategies and multi-asset class trading by working directly with quantitative researchers and portfolio mangers', 'BS or equivalent degree4+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experienceExpertise with Python,\xa0SQL/NoSQL and Spark or Hadoop', 'Gain valuable expertise on investment strategies and multi-asset class trading by working directly with quantitative researchers and portfolio mangers', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0', 'Senior Data Engineer | AWS, Equities, Fixed Income | Elite Hedge Fund in Boston', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0', 'BS or equivalent degree', 'In this role, you will design and build cloud-native data pipelines, lakes, and warehouses to massively increase the scale of data that the quantitative research and trading teams are able to leverage. This team has already identified streaming, serverless, and AWS technologies to build initial POCs, but you will have an opportunity to shape the roadmap for additional cutting-edge solutions. This team will support a multi-asset class strategy with a particular focus on fixed income and equities.', 'One of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the business', 'Exposure to a major AWS offering (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation packageOne of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the businessCasual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'Help lead a massive data migration to AWS', "One of the world's most prestigious Hedge Funds is a small, reclusive firm that has been quietly generating more revenue per head than almost any other firm in the industry. They have a rare opportunity for a strong Senior Data Engineer to join the firm, as they begin building out a new cloud team to redefine the scope and performance of their data processing systems. This team will work in a greenfield environment, designing brand new cloud native solutions and migrating data to AWS.", '4+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experience', 'Expertise with Python,\xa0SQL/NoSQL and Spark or Hadoop', 'Exposure to a major AWS offering (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive fixed income or equities trading', 'Capitalize on:', 'Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive fixed income or equities trading', 'Casual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility']

['', "BS/BA degree or equivalent experience Advanced knowledge of application, data, and infrastructure architecture disciplines Understanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance, and software improvement Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc. Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS 'big data' technologies. Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions. Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader. Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems. Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases. Experience building and optimizing 'big data' data pipelines, architectures and data sets. Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement. Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets. Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management. A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets. Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable 'big data' data stores. Strong project management and organizational skills. Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment. ", 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc. Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra. job_title: Data Engineering Manager - AI, Big Data, Machine Learning
job_text: ['', 'Interested in learning more about this new job opportunity? Apply online today!', 'With multi-billion dollar clients relying on this powerhouse for innovative identity management solutions, this company has earned its position as an unstoppable industry leader. Driven by integrity, innovation, and happy employees, our client continues to flourish in the software space with no signs of slowing down.', 'Ensure the timely delivery of high-quality solutions based on the technical roadmap, managing risk and roadblocks accordingly', 'Deliver hands-on technical leadership and coaching to a growing data engineering teamPlay a key role in the hiring process for your team and provide performance managementEnsure the timely delivery of high-quality solutions based on the technical roadmap, managing risk and roadblocks accordinglyCreate plenty of training opportunities to your growing teamCollaborate frequently with various other departments (leadership, product, design, etc.)', 'Several years of experience managing and coaching data engineering team(s) in an Agile environment', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field of study is highly preferred', 'What’s in it for you:', 'Collaborate frequently with various other departments (leadership, product, design, etc.)', 'As our client continues to grow and promote from within, they need an experienced Data Engineering Manager to join the technical team in Austin, Texas!', 'Extensive previous experience as a hands-on software engineer working with Big Data and/or Machine Learning (ML) technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Cassandra, and/or Flink)', 'No sponsorship available. No third-party candidates.', 'What you get to do:', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills as you’ll be regularly interfacing with a variety of teams', 'Several years of experience managing and coaching data engineering team(s) in an Agile environmentExtensive previous experience as a hands-on software engineer working with Big Data and/or Machine Learning (ML) technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Cassandra, and/or Flink)Previous experience hiring, mentoring, and retaining skilled engineersStrong communication and collaboration skills as you’ll be regularly interfacing with a variety of teamsBachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field of study is highly preferred', 'Play a key role in the hiring process for your team and provide performance management', ' Data Engineering Manager', 'Create plenty of training opportunities to your growing team', 'What you need to succeed:', 'With nothing but five star reviews from both current and past employees, it’s easy to see top talent in the Silicon Hills tech hub has nothing but praise for this client’s work environment, leadership, and of course the superior products and services produced. Named one of the “Best Places to Work” year after year by Austin Business Journal, this company has no shortage of awards and accolades for both workplace excellence and top security products. One of our client’s top priorities is work/life balance – and they’re serious about this! In addition to generous PTO, flex hours, and company events, you’ll be eligible for an aggressive pay structure complete with 401k, comprehensive insurance plans, and ample opportunities for career growth.', 'Deliver hands-on technical leadership and coaching to a growing data engineering team', 'Previous experience hiring, mentoring, and retaining skilled engineers']

['', '90% of our paid teams on Slack actively use apps.', 'What You Should Have', 'You are a strong communicator. Explaining complex technical concepts to designers, support, and other engineers is no problem for you.', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'We have 8.8M+ app installations with 155,000 weekly active developers building on the developer platform.', "You'll assist our skilled support team and operations team in triaging and resolving production issues.", ' Users spend over 10 hours connected and 2+ hours active in Slack every work day. 10M+ Daily Active Users in more than 150 countries.  1.5 billion messages are sent per month, half of those outside the United States. Every day we see over 8 million simultaneously connected users, over 3.5 billion web requests, over 42 billion database queries per day, and our systems see over 1 million queries/second in our caching tier. We have 8.8M+ app installations with 155,000 weekly active developers building on the developer platform. 90% of our paid teams on Slack actively use apps. ', 'You have experience with functional or imperative programming languages -- e.g., PHP, Python, Ruby, Go, C, or Java.', 'You’ll actively own features or systems and define their long-term health, while also improving the health of surrounding systems.', " You'll brainstorm with Product Managers, Designers and Frontend Engineers to conceptualize and build new features for our large (and growing!) user base. You’ll produce high-quality results by leading or contributing heavily to large cross-functional projects that have a significant impact on the business. You’ll actively own features or systems and define their long-term health, while also improving the health of surrounding systems. You'll assist our skilled support team and operations team in triaging and resolving production issues. You'll mentor other engineers and deeply review code. You’ll improve engineering standards, tooling, and processes ", '10M+ Daily Active Users in more than 150 countries. ', 'Users spend over 10 hours connected and 2+ hours active in Slack every work day.', "You'll brainstorm with Product Managers, Designers and Frontend Engineers to conceptualize and build new features for our large (and growing!) user base.", 'You’ve been building web applications professionally for 5+ years.', "You have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.", '1.5 billion messages are sent per month, half of those outside the United States.', 'You write understandable, testable code with an eye towards maintainability.', 'You’ll produce high-quality results by leading or contributing heavily to large cross-functional projects that have a significant impact on the business.', 'You can lead technical architecture discussions and help drive technical decisions within your team.', 'You’ll improve engineering standards, tooling, and processes', 'You possess strong computer science fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, programming languages, distributed systems, and information retrieval.', 'A Taste Of Our Scale And Reach', 'Every day we see over 8 million simultaneously connected users, over 3.5 billion web requests, over 42 billion database queries per day, and our systems see over 1 million queries/second in our caching tier.', "You'll mentor other engineers and deeply review code.", " You’ve been building web applications professionally for 5+ years. You have experience with functional or imperative programming languages -- e.g., PHP, Python, Ruby, Go, C, or Java. You can lead technical architecture discussions and help drive technical decisions within your team. You write understandable, testable code with an eye towards maintainability. You are a strong communicator. Explaining complex technical concepts to designers, support, and other engineers is no problem for you. You possess strong computer science fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, programming languages, distributed systems, and information retrieval. You have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience. "]
