['Senior Machine Learning Engineer – NLP ExpertNew York City - NY$150,0000 - 180,000 base + Great Benefit Package\xa0This is an opportunity for a well-rounded Data Scientist to cut their teeth in a data-first, fast paced environment where they are designing unique infrastructure to change B2B data. Working with some the leaders in the industry, you will be responsible for putting your Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning models into production. If you are an NLP, Machine Learning expert, this role could be a great fit.THE COMPANYAs a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, with and NLP focus, you’ll find yourself using machine learning techniques in this B2B powerhouse and the power of data to innovate the way we extract information form the internet.THE ROLE\xa0You will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects.· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop different types of machine learning models from NLP to anomaly detection· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop production level code in Python and deliver high quality solutions· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work cross functionally with the data engineering and research analyst teams· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Present your findings to business leaders and stakeholders within the companyYOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEYou will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. Commercial experience with hands on experience putting Machine Learning projects into production is a must,· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of Deep Learning frameworks· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior exposure to putting Machine Learning and Deep Learning models into production· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior work presenting key findings to stakeholders· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science, Linguistics, Engineering, Stats, or a related field· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Technically sound in NLP, TensorFlow, NLTK, ELMo, GloVe, spaCy, WordNetTHE BENEFITSA base salary of $150,000 - $180,000 + amazing benefitsHOW TO APPLYPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.']

With all the new projects and initiatives, it is an exciting time to be on the team that is helping to make a Better McDonald's!ResponsibilitiesLead all aspects of development, mentoring and training of staff.As a software development engineer on a team, you will play a pivotal role in crafting the definition, vision, design, road map and development of product features from beginning to end.Design, implement, test, deploy and maintain innovative software solutions to transform service performance, durability, cost, and security.Educate and advise Senior Management, comprising resources from the Business and Functional disciplines and IT business and operations functions around data management best practices and resulting benefits, to achieve their objectives; resolve issues called out from all data management partnersWork in an agile, startup-like development environment, where you are always working on the most meaningful priorities.Qualifications</strong2+ years of non-internship professional software development experience.Programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java, C++, or C# including object-oriented design.1+ years of experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems.Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent years of experience.Solid knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals (object-oriented design, data structures and algorithm.Strong verbal and written communication skills, are self-driven and deliver high quality results in a fast-paced environment.Proven leadership abilities in an engineering environment in driving operational excellence and best practices.Highly quantitative with great judgment and passion for building a phenomenal customer experience.Additional Information</strongMcDonald’s is proud to be one of the most recognized brands in the world, with restaurants in over 100 countries that serve 70 million customers daily. As the global leader in the food service industry, our legacy of innovation and hard work continues to drive us.From drive thru updates to delivery to mobile order and pay, we are innovating quickly and growing. Joining McDonald's means thinking big and preparing for a career that can have influence around the world.At McDonald’s, we see every day as a chance to create positive impact. We lead through our values centered on inclusivity, service, integrity, community and family. From support of Ronald McDonald House Charities to our Youth Opportunity project and sustainability initiatives, our values keep us dedicated to using our scale for good: good for our customers, people, industry and planet. We also offer outstanding benefits including a sabbatical program, tuition assistance and flexible work arrangements.It's Set Up To Be a Global Hub That Cultivates CollaborationWhile most of us are working remote during COVID-19, we're excited to get back to our state-of-the-art headquarters in the booming West Loop of downtown Chicago.Take a class at Hamburger UniversitySample future items in our Test KitchenUtilize the latest technology to connect with your team around the globeWe are an equal opportunity employer committed to the diversity of our crew members, staff, operators, and suppliers. We promote an inclusive work environment that creates feel-good moments for everyone. We are interested in people who enhance our company culture: Does this role interest you? We encourage you to apply even if you don’t meet every single requirement!McDonald’s is committed to providing qualified individuals with disabilities reasonable accommodations to perform the essential functions of their jobs. Additionally, if you (or another applicant of whom you are aware) require assistance accessing or reading this job posting or otherwise seek assistance in the application process, please contact recruiting.supportteam@us.mcd.comMcDonald’s provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to sex, sex stereotyping, pregnancy (including pregnancy, childbirth, and medical conditions related to pregnancy, childbirth, or breastfeeding), race, color, religion, ancestry or national origin, age, disability status, medical condition, marital status, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, protected military or veteran status, citizenship status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.Nothing in this job posting or description should be construed as an offer or guarantee of employment."]

['', "Documents and spreadsheets have remained relatively unchanged for the last 40 years and yet these paradigms still largely dominate how businesses and people operate.\xa0We're taking a fresh approach and empowering anyone to start with something as simple as a document and easily evolve this into a powerful, connected application. We believe this will be game-changing and influence the paradigms of the next 40 years.", 'You have excellent written and verbal communication skills and enjoy collaborating with othersYou are driven, can work independently, and thrive when challengedYou have a minimum of 2 years of industry experience in a software engineering role and have a software engineering degree or equivalent experienceYou love programming and have excellent proficiency with JavaScript, TypeScript or NodeJS, or any other modern programming languageYou have worked with any modern UX framework as React, Vue, or similar, production issues", 'Help ensure our customers have an excellent experience using Coda', 'You have excellent written and verbal communication skills and enjoy collaborating with others', "Participate in the engineering teams' on-call rotations for customer support and live production issues", 'Coda is looking for full-stack software engineers to join our growing team as we deliver on the future of We currently have multiple roles open at different levels of experience.', 'You love programming and have excellent proficiency with JavaScript, TypeScript or NodeJS, or any other modern programming language', 'Work closely with the product, design and growth teams to enhance Coda working with new features, APIs, performance, quality, and scale', 'You are driven, can work independently, and thrive when challenged', "Our current stack focuses on React, TypeScript, Python and Node with our server infrastructure running on Kubernetes in Amazon AWS.\xa0We believe in using the best tool for the job in hand, and don't shy away from solving hard problems!", 'You have hands-on experience working building web-based systems on Cloud infrastructures such as AWS, Azure or similar Cloud-based environments', "As a member of Coda’s engineering team, you will operate as a full-stack engineer and have the opportunity to work broadly across our product from our mobile and browser-based clients to our servers and infrastructure.\xa0You’ll work closely with a stellar team of passionate, experienced engineers, designers and product managers who've have been instrumental in building some of the most widely-used technology products in the world, including YouTube, Google Drive/Docs, Amazon AWS, Pinterest, and Microsoft Azure.", 'You may be a great fit for this role if:', 'You have worked with any modern UX framework as React, Vue, or similar, and have created or used internet friendly APIs such as REST or GraphQL']

Gecko’s solutions improve safety and speed (10x) while gathering more data (1000x) to predict infrastructure failures before they happen.', 'Design, implement, and verify new features in a continuous integration environment.', 'Provide and review technical documentation.', 'Demonstrated ability in taking a SaaS product from 0-1 and beyond', 'Dedication to test-driven development and designing production-ready systems', 'Use critical thinking skills to debug problems and develop solutions to challenging technical problems.', 'Deep understanding of a backend web development frameworks (Django, Flask, Node.js, Spring, Ruby, or Laravel)', 'Awareness of best practices for scaling backend architectures', "Gecko Robotics (Gecko) is focused on protecting and maintaining civilizations' most critical infrastructure, with machines and platforms.", 'Develop tests to ensure the integrity and availability of the application.', 'Collaborate and interface heavily with UX and Product to build a brand new product from the ground up.', 'Job At A Glance', 'What Gecko Is Looking For', 'Gecko services customers across the USA and internationally primarily in the Oil & Gas, Power Generation and Pulp & Paper markets.', 'Familiarity with Computer Science fundamentals and ability to apply those fundamentals to code', 'Who We Are', 'Interact with other engineers from multiple disciplines in a team environment.', 'Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree in Computer Science, or equivalent experience', 'What You Will Do', 'Gecko is launching a new SaaS product offering and is seeking a Technical Lead Engineer to join a brand new team! In this role, you will work on a highly collaborative team to design, engineer, and launch this new SaaS product offering and bring it to scale.\xa0You will be one of the founding members of the new software team, building user experiences and APIs that will digitally transform the industries that power our society today. You will have the opportunity to lead integrations and build\xa0"command centers" for our customers, utilizing the first of its kind Robotics-as-a-Service (RaaS) data, and mapping assets to drive decisions for our customers.\xa0This is an opportunity to make a huge impact, solve interesting problems, and grow at an amazing company.\xa0', 'Demonstrated ability in writing performant, scalable code', 'Lead design and code reviews when needed.\xa0', '7+ years experience building fullstack software applications (Python, SQL, Javascript, React preferred) and proven experience leading teams.\xa0']

['', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills', 'Summary', 'Proven track-record of high quality software development (e.g. on GitHub)', '\xa0', 'About the position\xa0As a Sr ML Engineer you will become a core member of the company and execute on ambitious milestones, taking ownership of your own projects. You will work closely with the leadership team within a highly collaborative company culture. You will own the design and implementation of infrastructure for reliable and highly performant deep learning and analytics pipelines with the main focus on the detection and classification of dental conditions from x-ray images. You will further play a critical role in defining and executing processes for managing large amounts of data, defining data sampling approaches and performance evaluations. ', 'You will be able to contribute and grow your technical skills by building end to end highly impactful software medical devices that will ultimately impact the lives of millions of people. Your contributions will play a key role in building a great company from an early stage. We provide a competitive compensation package.', 'Summary\xa0Join VideaHealth as key member of our Artificial Intelligence team to develop complex ML systems that eventually improve dental health of millions of people.', 'Experience with at least one deep learning framework (e.g. PyTorch, TF, Keras)', 'In your role as ML Engineer you will become part of exciting collaborations with researchers, physicians, and regulatory bodies. You will collaborate with company advisors from MIT and Harvard whose expertise span machine learning, medical imaging, and getting products successfully through FDA. We are looking for an individual with a strong Machine Learning background who is not shy to take proactive responsibilities. ', 'Strong software development skills including testing (Python)', 'Experience in Data Analysis (e.g. statistics, performance metrics)', 'M.S. or PhD in Computer Science or related field.Minimum of 3 years of hands-on development building deep learning and/or data pipelinesExperience with at least one deep learning framework (e.g. PyTorch, TF, Keras)Strong software development skills including testing (Python)Experience in reading & implementing technical research papersStrong communication and collaboration skillsProactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'Requirements', 'Proven track-record of high quality software development (e.g. on GitHub)Experience in working with medical images or related Computer Vision problemsExperience in Data Analysis (e.g. statistics, performance metrics)Experience working with cloud based platforms / providers (e.g. AWS)Leadership/Mentorship experience', 'M.S. or PhD in Computer Science or related field.', 'Preferred', 'Experience working with cloud based platforms / providers (e.g. AWS)', 'Leadership/Mentorship experience', 'Proactive, ambitious, and fast learner\xa0', 'Experience in reading & implementing technical research papers', 'Experience in working with medical images or related Computer Vision problems', 'About the position', 'Minimum of 3 years of hands-on development building deep learning and/or data pipelines']

job_title: Lead Software Engineer, Cloud Engineering - Tableau
job_text: ['', 'Guiding the team to a high quality in engineering practices in terms of technical design, code reviews, testing methodologies and root cause analysis.', 'Recruitment: Tableau hires company builders; employees are expected to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board, helping Tableau continue to build one of the best companies in the world.', 'Accommodations ', 'Provide technical leadership at a component or service scope.', 'A True Team Player', 'Posting Statement', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.', 'DevOps Mindset. You are familiar with Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) concepts. You treat operational issues as if they are software problems. You view software as a primary tool to manage, maintain, fix, and extend systems required to support large development environments. You promote operational excellence!', 'DevOps Mindset.', 'Passionate. You are passionate about technology and the work you do; you always want to do your best to delight the customers, help your team, and strive for excellence.', 'Automate infrastructure and application deployments on private and public clouds (preferred: AWS).', 'Deploy and maintain server-side applications and services on AWS development and production environments.', 'Technical', 'Customer Advocate. You understand customer requirements and prioritize for maximum customer/user experience.', 'Who You Are…', 'Educated. Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.', 'Salesforce.com', 'Some of the things you’ll be doing include…', 'Job Details', 'Job Category', 'Salesforce.org', "Experienced. You have experience in coding commercial software, preferably using Java/Python and have a passion for solving complex problems. You are familiar with infrastructure automation, preferably using Terraform, Puppet and Packer. You have worked with deployment and release management technologies like Octopus Deploy or Spinnaker. You have led projects across development teams, particularly using Agile methodologies. Hands-on AWS experience, a plus.Educated. Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.Technical. You're fluent in commonly used design patterns and can constructively review the work of others to ensure high quality. You're familiar with services and different service-oriented architectures. You can quickly see and understand architecture and where your team fits in. You have a keen eye for quality and is a strong advocate for engineering excellence.DevOps Mindset. You are familiar with Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) concepts. You treat operational issues as if they are software problems. You view software as a primary tool to manage, maintain, fix, and extend systems required to support large development environments. You promote operational excellence!A True Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.Customer Advocate. You understand customer requirements and prioritize for maximum customer/user experience.Passionate. You are passionate about technology and the work you do; you always want to do your best to delight the customers, help your team, and strive for excellence.You are a Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders and, in this role, you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world.", 'Design and develop robust services and tools that run securely, are scalable and cost-effective against private and public cloud infrastructure, preferably AWS.', 'Lead projects by guiding team members and working with product managers to ship on-time and with high quality.', 'Provide technical leadership at a component or service scope.Lead projects by guiding team members and working with product managers to ship on-time and with high quality.Guiding the team to a high quality in engineering practices in terms of technical design, code reviews, testing methodologies and root cause analysis.Design and develop robust services and tools that run securely, are scalable and cost-effective against private and public cloud infrastructure, preferably AWS.Automate infrastructure and application deployments on private and public clouds (preferred: AWS).Deploy and maintain server-side applications and services on AWS development and production environments.Evaluate existing processes and tools and implement changdes for better efficiency. Participate in the evolution of the system architecture.Participate in the design and improvement of our development practices.Recruitment: Tableau hires company builders; employees are expected to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board, helping Tableau continue to build one of the best companies in the world.', 'Experienced. You have experience in coding commercial software, preferably using Java/Python and have a passion for solving complex problems. You are familiar with infrastructure automation, preferably using Terraform, Puppet and Packer. You have worked with deployment and release management technologies like Octopus Deploy or Spinnaker. You have led projects across development teams, particularly using Agile methodologies. Hands-on AWS experience, a plus.', 'A True Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.', 'Evaluate existing processes and tools and implement changdes for better efficiency. Participate in the evolution of the system architecture.', 'Customer Advocate', 'Participate in the design and improvement of our development practices.', 'Accommodations  - ', 'You are a Recruiter!', 'Salesfore.com', 'You are a Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders and, in this role, you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world.', 'Passionate.', 'Experienced. ['', 'Excellent problem solving, collaborative, and interpersonal skills. Experience working with international teams preferred.', '3+ years of experience in a related hardware/software position is always a plus.', 'Strong C/C++ knowledge required.', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Strong understanding of algorithms, computer architecture, silicon speed and power, BIOS, drivers, and software applications.', 'Familiarity with multiple parallel programming paradigms and hands-on High Performance Computing experience. Experience with Multi-GPU communications, NICs, and switches would be particularly useful.', 'Familiarity with computer algorithms, object oriented programming, data structures, and design patterns. Ability to divide complex problems into simple sub problems and then reuse available solutions to implement the solutions.', 'What We Need To See', 'Experience creating monitoring, profiling, or optimization software tools for developers working on large scale systems.', "Use your programming skills to design & build the premiere cross CPU/GPU profiling tool in the industry. You will have the opportunity to use your software engineering talents to enable important work to improve computers and computing systems.Design and implement new features as part of an effort to bring profiling tool to HPC scale, including support for NVIDIA's new MagnumIO library as well as various network and GPU communication protocols.Build software tools that enable developers across the spectrum of computing to optimize their workflows; enable complex computer systems doing ongoing work in Deep Learning, High Performance Computing, and Artificial Intelligence; enable work in tiny embedded and automotive systems. Our tools span the gamut.Partner with system architects, product definition engineers, software/firmware engineers, HW/SW applications engineers and operations, in a dynamic, high-energy work environment to bring industry-defining products to market.", 'BS or MS in EE, CE, CS, or Systems Engineering.3+ years of experience in a related hardware/software position is always a plus.Excellent problem solving, collaborative, and interpersonal skills. Experience working with international teams preferred.Strong C/C++ knowledge required.Strong understanding of algorithms, computer architecture, silicon speed and power, BIOS, drivers, and software applications.Familiarity with computer algorithms, object oriented programming, data structures, and design patterns. Ability to divide complex problems into simple sub problems and then reuse available solutions to implement the solutions.', "Design and implement new features as part of an effort to bring profiling tool to HPC scale, including support for NVIDIA's new MagnumIO library as well as various network and GPU communication protocols.", 'Proven track record of crafting engineering designs, driving them to consensus within teams, and bringing them to fruition.', 'Use your programming skills to design & build the premiere cross CPU/GPU profiling tool in the industry. You will have the opportunity to use your software engineering talents to enable important work to improve computers and computing systems.', 'Experience programming for GPUs, optimally for both compute and visualization tasks.', 'Build software tools that enable developers across the spectrum of computing to optimize their workflows; enable complex computer systems doing ongoing work in Deep Learning, High Performance Computing, and Artificial Intelligence; enable work in tiny embedded and automotive systems. Our tools span the gamut.', 'Partner with system architects, product definition engineers, software/firmware engineers, HW/SW applications engineers and operations, in a dynamic, high-energy work environment to bring industry-defining products to market.', 'Experience with multiple architectures (x86, ARM, Power) or multiple operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS).', 'BS or MS in EE, CE, CS, or Systems Engineering.', 'Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd', 'Familiarity with multiple parallel programming paradigms and hands-on High Performance Computing experience. Experience with Multi-GPU communications, NICs, and switches would be particularly useful.Experience programming for GPUs, optimally for both compute and visualization tasks.Experience creating monitoring, profiling, or optimization software tools for developers working on large scale systems.Experience with multiple architectures (x86, ARM, Power) or multiple operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS).Proven track record of crafting engineering designs, driving them to consensus within teams, and bringing them to fruition.']

', ' Minimum 7+ years of relevant industry experience in building large scale distributed systems. ', ' Experience with Azure and/or AWS deployments ', ' Experience with installation and configuration of SAS software in a single and multi-tier environment on various operating systems  Experience with programming languages, such as SAS, Python, SQL and Java. ', ' Advanced problem solving, decision-making, written, oral, interpersonal communication and organizational skills; including the ability to effectively communicate with users with various technical backgrounds ', 'Other Knowledge, Skills, And Abilities', ' Experience with scripting languages (ex: Bash, Perl, etc.) ', ' Assist with special projects, as assigned, in design, implementation, transition and operational roles. ', 'What We’re Looking For', 'What You’ll Do', ' Analyze, install, modify and support operating systems, SAS software, databases and 3 rd party required software.  Assist with the planning, design, setup, maintenance and troubleshooting of operating systems and systems management software.  Participate in usage planning, forecasting/trending reports as well as hardware/software configuration reviews.  Assist with special projects, as assigned, in design, implementation, transition and operational roles.  Provide software support for existing and newly deployed virtualized environments, including installation, maintenance, documentation, customization and utilization based on customer requirements.  Diagnose and resolves user and operational problems with deployed systems.  Prepare and conducts system and programming tests requiring interfacing of hardware and software. ', ' Experience with programming languages, such as SAS, Python, SQL and Java. ', ' Prepare and conducts system and programming tests requiring interfacing of hardware and software. ', ' We love living the #SASlife and believe that happy, healthy people have a passion for life, and bring that energy to work. ', ' Analyze, install, modify and support operating systems, SAS software, databases and 3 rd party required software. ', ' You’re curious, passionate, authentic and accountable. ['', 'Work closely with the core software engineering team to integrate our product with our back end systems.', 'Your job is to write software that makes the company work well at scale. Make our systems work efficiently and reliably.', 'Project management and attention to detail: you’ll need to be able to scope out a project based on requirements outlined by an end user, find all the resources required to complete the project, and push project to completion with 1-4 team members.', 'Decide when to build from scratch and when to use existing tools.', 'Support the business requirements of 5 departments and prioritize work based on impact and costExample projects might include building components to visualize geographic data in Salesforce, or integrating and synchronizing our financial, sales, and fulfillment system databases.', 'Responsibilities', 'Prior tech company or startup experience a plus.', 'Requirements', '2+ years of experience working on the Salesforce platform.', 'About Verkada', 'You like making people work better. If you’re the kind of person that gets satisfaction about building a tool that makes everyone’s life at work just a little better every day, you will love this job.', 'Systems and software development experience: you need to be able to write production code efficiently. You are a hacker.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent field, from a top program preferred.5+ years professional experience, with at least 2 years of software development or engineering experience.Systems and software development experience: you need to be able to write production code efficiently. You are a hacker.You like making people work better. If you’re the kind of person that gets satisfaction about building a tool that makes everyone’s life at work just a little better every day, you will love this job.Design sensibility - we pride ourselves on building an intuitive product. We want our employees’ experience with their internal tools to be the same.Process and operational thinking - you can tackle a problem independently and quickly iterate to a solution, and then also document it in a way that’s easy to understand for all audiences (especially non-technical ones!).Project management and attention to detail: you’ll need to be able to scope out a project based on requirements outlined by an end user, find all the resources required to complete the project, and push project to completion with 1-4 team members.2+ years of experience working on the Salesforce platform.Prior tech company or startup experience a plus.', 'You should be comfortable learning new systems and APIs quickly, e.g., Salesforce Apex, and be comfortable with basic web technologies like HTML, JavaScript, restful APIs, and so forth.', 'Design sensibility - we pride ourselves on building an intuitive product. We want our employees’ experience with their internal tools to be the same.', 'Overview', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent field, from a top program preferred.5+ years professional experience, with at least 2 years of software development or engineering experience.', 'Process and operational thinking - you can tackle a problem independently and quickly iterate to a solution, and then also document it in a way that’s easy to understand for all audiences (especially non-technical ones!).', 'Lead other engineers in team initiatives and projectsWrite software in Apex, Groovy, SuiteScript, Javascript, and Java.', 'Your job is to write software that makes the company work well at scale. ['', ' We were the first movers to a cloud-based platform that has caused mass disruption within our market. Our CEO is a true market visionary. He graduated with a computer science degree at the age of 15 and followed with a JD from Harvard Law School at the age of 19. His unparalleled insights into the fundamental issues in legal and the potential of technology and artificial intelligence to change our market at its core provide the guiding light for DISCO’s long-term strategy. We believe that product delivery professionals including product managers, product designers and engineers differ from one another by at least a factor of 10. At DISCO, we only hire the top 1%, pay them well, and with equity, everyone has effectively been getting a raise each and every day. Given our product first mindset, product professionals are very much stars of the show. Our logo, the circle and square, represents the best lawyers and the best product professionals in the world. We measure product delivery velocity by dollars of revenue per line of code, vs simply lines of code. This drives a very thoughtful and deliberate product design and development process that ensures we’re going to make money when we ship products. We hire many more product managers and designers per engineer than most companies to ensure that our engineers have a disambiguated product intent when they are building. As a rule, we don’t commit to external product delivery dates as we believe that unnecessarily constrains our creativity from both a product and technology point of view. At DISCO respect isn’t earned at DISCO it is assumed. Good humans inherently treat everyone respectfully. This is a very important concept at DISCO. Given the high caliber of talent, the cutting-edge cloud-based technology stack, and thoughtful and novel product and design approach, you’ll find yourself learning at a rate you’ve not likely experienced in your career. Given that we only hire professionals that are passionate about their craft, you’ll truly enjoy building a great software product and get in the best “career shape” of your life. Over the next 4 years, we’ll be growing our product delivery organization. There will be incredible growth opportunities along the way. We use the “2 Pizza Team” organization design where small autonomous teams own a piece of a product or platform and ship software at rates comparable to a very lean and scrappy startup. We achieve consistency across these teams in the areas of design, product-wide use cases and technical concerns through a strategically focused set of overlay functions. Finally, while we’re an incredibly fast-growing organization, as a rule, we do not work crazy long hours. We believe in continuous product delivery, continuous product planning and design, continuous regular sleep schedules, continuous regular vacation, and continuous fun if you’re passionate about your craft. Able to design and communicate external and internal architectural perspectives of well-encapsulated systems (e.g. Service Oriented Architecture, Docker-based Services, micro-services) using patterns and tools such as Architecture/Design Patterns and Sequence Diagrams. job_text: ['', 'Guiding the team to a high quality in engineering practices in terms of technical design, code reviews, testing methodologies and root cause analysis.', 'Recruitment: Tableau hires company builders; employees are expected to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board, helping Tableau continue to build one of the best companies in the world.', 'Accommodations ', 'Provide technical leadership at a component or service scope.', 'A True Team Player', 'Posting Statement', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.', 'DevOps Mindset. You have led projects across development teams, particularly using Agile methodologies. Hands-on AWS experience, a plus.Educated. job_title: Principal Software Engineer - Data Platform, Cloud Data Protection
job_text: ['', 'About The Team', 'Rubrik provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Rubrik complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', 'You will contribute to Rubrik’s platform, a unique approach to SaaS products that enables “Hybrid SaaS”, where the data-plane resides in the customers cloud account (Azure/AWS) while the control-plane is managed by Rubrik and resides in Rubrik’s cloud platform, Polaris.', 'About You', 'You have experience building distributed systems and working with cloud technologies such as Kuberrnetes, gRPC, message queues and object-stores.', 'You have significant prior experience leading teams, delivering complex projects successfully and mentoring and growing those teams.', 'You will collaborate with other engineering teams, with product management and with Rubrik support staff on a weekly basis.', 'You hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field with a minimum of 8+ years of prior experience in a software engineering role.', 'About The Job', 'You will lead the Design and build complex systems software to advance the state of Rubrik’s cloud platform and Cloud Data Protection products (O365/AWS/Azure).', ' You will lead the Design and build complex systems software to advance the state of Rubrik’s cloud platform and Cloud Data Protection products (O365/AWS/Azure). You will contribute to Rubrik’s platform, a unique approach to SaaS products that enables “Hybrid SaaS”, where the data-plane resides in the customers cloud account (Azure/AWS) while the control-plane is managed by Rubrik and resides in Rubrik’s cloud platform, Polaris. You will own the the product end-to-end, from working on product requirements with internal stakeholders, to building, testing, deploying and managing the deployments. You will collaborate with other engineering teams, with product management and with Rubrik support staff on a weekly basis. ', ' You hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field with a minimum of 8+ years of prior experience in a software engineering role. You have experience building distributed systems and working with cloud technologies such as Kuberrnetes, gRPC, message queues and object-stores. You thrive in an entrepreneurial environment and you know how to solve problems with limited resources and time and iteratively improve those solutions over time. You have significant prior experience leading teams, delivering complex projects successfully and mentoring and growing those teams. ', 'You thrive in an entrepreneurial environment and you know how to solve problems with limited resources and time and iteratively improve those solutions over time.', 'About Rubrik', 'You will own the the product end-to-end, from working on product requirements with internal stakeholders, to building, testing, deploying and managing the deployments.']

job_title: Data Developer IV (Contract to Hire SSIS Developer)
job_text: ['', ' Agile methodologies. ', ' Acts as Subject Matter Expert (SME) to architectural review board and technology review committee. ', ' Ability to lead large data driven enterprise projects. ', ' Serves as technical advisor to database administrators in areas of database optimization, indexing and data retention. ', ' Serves as technical lead to strategic and enterprise level data driven projects, collaborates with other areas of ET&S as well as business units. ', '  Actively supports our CO-OP culture and embraces our core values of Work as Partners, Communicate Openly and Honestly, Demonstrate Excellence and Champion Change in all interactions.  ', ' Serves as technical lead to strategic and enterprise level data driven projects, collaborates with other areas of ET&S as well as business units.  Follows and advises on industry standards and advances on data driven technologies and tools.  Designs, implements, and updates best practices for the data development team.  Serves as technical lead and mentor to other less tenured data developers and analysts.  Acts as Subject Matter Expert (SME) to architectural review board and technology review committee.  Creates enterprise level end-to-end data flow diagrams and logical data models.  Develops and reviews complex SQL, T-SQL scripts, stored procedures, SSIS workflows, Azure Data Factory pipelines for various reporting and data development projects.  Creates and maintains documentation related to data development best practices, enterprise level data flow diagrams, and project code promotion.  Provides recommendations to technology tools, products and services in order to help keep our environment on the cutting edge of technology.  Serves as technical advisor to database administrators in areas of database optimization, indexing and data retention.  Serves as lead data developer on key strategic projects.  Develops and designs solutions with security as a critical design requirement for data, systems and applications.  Adheres to development processes and standards including code management.  Responsible for reporting risks that are identified to the appropriate team and/or management. Additionally, responsible for managing, monitoring and reporting risks within the scope of your work area, to include, but not limited to Information Security risks.   Actively supports our CO-OP culture and embraces our core values of Work as Partners, Communicate Openly and Honestly, Demonstrate Excellence and Champion Change in all interactions.  ', ' Great Work/Life Benefits – Paid Time Off (PTO), Maternity, Parental, Family Care, Adoption Leave Programs, Community Volunteer Time Off, and 10 Paid Holidays. ', 'Data Developer IV ', ' Fun, challenging and, collaborative work environment with passionate colleagues that care deeply about the intersection of technology and human-centered financial services. ', ' 401K with generous company match. ', ' Fun, challenging and, collaborative work environment with passionate colleagues that care deeply about the intersection of technology and human-centered financial services.  Great Work/Life Benefits – Paid Time Off (PTO), Maternity, Parental, Family Care, Adoption Leave Programs, Community Volunteer Time Off, and 10 Paid Holidays.  Health benefits – medical, dental, & vision plus wellness programs and gym reimbursements.  401K with generous company match.  Tuition reimbursement. ', 'What You’ll Need To Succeed', ' College degree in CIS, Data Management, Data Analytics, or similar, or equivalent training and/or experience.  10+ years’ experience working in a data function or equivalent position where primary responsibility is working with data, database design and data development is the primary responsibility.  Best practices for data development within a PCI environment.  Ability to analyze enterprise level data sources and determine relationships between disparate sources.  Determine methodologies for integration with 3rd party data sets.  Expertise in data warehousing and data modeling methodologies, tools and best practices.  Financial industry knowledge.  Agile methodologies.  Expert knowledge of Microsoft SQL stack including T-SQL, SSRS, and SSIS.  Excellent communication skills and ability to translate complex concepts to simple and easier terms for business leaders and users of data.  Expert knowledge of MS Office tools including MS Visio.  Ability to review existing processes and identify logic problems to address.  Ability to formulate a plan that aligns and supports to delivery timelines.  Ability to lead large data driven enterprise projects.  Ability to coach, mentor and lead others in the ET&S area.  Ability to identify, recommend and set best practices for the data developer role.  Must be detail focused.  Must possess strong communication skills. ', ' Why Join CO-OP? ', ' Financial industry knowledge. ', ' Actively supports our CO-OP culture and embraces our core values of Work as Partners, Communicate Openly and Honestly, Demonstrate Excellence and Champion Change in all interactions. ', ' Responsible for reporting risks that are identified to the appropriate team and/or management. Additionally, responsible for managing, monitoring and reporting risks within the scope of your work area, to include, but not limited to Information Security risks. ', ' Ability to analyze enterprise level data sources and determine relationships between disparate sources. ', ' Develops and reviews complex SQL, T-SQL scripts, stored procedures, SSIS workflows, Azure Data Factory pipelines for various reporting and data development projects. ', ' Ability to formulate a plan that aligns and supports to delivery timelines. ', ' Designs, implements, and updates best practices for the data development team. ', ' Ability to coach, mentor and lead others in the ET&S area. ', ' Provides recommendations to technology tools, products and services in order to help keep our environment on the cutting edge of technology. ', ' Adheres to development processes and standards including code management. ', ' Creates and maintains documentation related to data development best practices, enterprise level data flow diagrams, and project code promotion. ', ' Ability to review existing processes and identify logic problems to address. ', ' Need help finding the right job? ', ' Must possess strong communication skills. ', ' Ability to identify, recommend and set best practices for the data developer role. ['', 'You are a creative thinker, ', 'You work with confidence and without ego.Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. ', 'Who We Are Looking For: ', "You understand engineering fundamentals.At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don't work. You are able to work from first principles to evaluate solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. ", 'You are a broadly skilled engineer', 'Our Engineers are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, building, and delivering products for our clients.We have dozens of individual, mission-focused teams working across a wide spectrum of technological challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and aptitude, to work on large-scale distributed systems coordinating thousands of servers in cloud and physical data centers around the world, petabyte-scale data challenges, machine learning, advanced visualizations, and interactive user interfaces – to name a few.Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them. ', 'You work with confidence and without ego.', 'You value, seek out, and foster diversity.', 'You are a broadly skilled engineer , accustomed to developing web services. You have experience building always-on systems, working across a variety of technologies and service layers. ', 'You value, seek out, and foster diversity.We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. ', 'We have dozens of individual, mission-focused teams working across a wide spectrum of technological challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and aptitude, to work on large-scale distributed systems coordinating thousands of servers in cloud and physical data centers around the world, petabyte-scale data challenges, machine learning, advanced visualizations, and interactive user interfaces – to name a few.', 'What We Care About: ', 'You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. ', 'About the Role: ', 'Our Engineers are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, building, and delivering products for our clients.', 'You have a product-focused mindset. ', 'You understand engineering fundamentals.', "You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful software projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the 'why' behind what you are doing. ", 'You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done". What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need engineers who know all the answers; we need engineers who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked. ', 'You have a sustained track record ', 'You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful software projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the \'why\' behind what you are doing. You understand engineering fundamentals.At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don\'t work. You are able to work from first principles to evaluate solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. You are a broadly skilled engineer , accustomed to developing web services. You have experience building always-on systems, working across a variety of technologies and service layers. You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. You work with confidence and without ego.Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. You value, seek out, and foster diversity.We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done". What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need engineers who know all the answers; we need engineers who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked. ', 'Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them. ']

We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'At least 3-5 years of SQL DevelopmentCloud Experience – Preferred Google Cloud Platform / Airflow, but AWS experience is welcomed.3-5 years of Java Application DevelopmentAn understanding of a JavaScript frameworks like Node.js', '3-5 years of Java Application Development', 'Develop in a paired/extreme programming environment', 'We are currently seeking a software engineer for our top retail client in Atlanta. job_title: Lead Software Engineer, Cloud Engineering - Tableau
job_text: ['', 'Guiding the team to a high quality in engineering practices in terms of technical design, code reviews, testing methodologies and root cause analysis.', 'Recruitment: Tableau hires company builders; employees are expected to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board, helping Tableau continue to build one of the best companies in the world.', 'Accommodations ', 'Provide technical leadership at a component or service scope.', 'A True Team Player', 'Posting Statement', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.', 'DevOps Mindset. You are familiar with Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) concepts. You treat operational issues as if they are software problems. You view software as a primary tool to manage, maintain, fix, and extend systems required to support large development environments. You promote operational excellence!', 'DevOps Mindset.', 'Passionate. You are passionate about technology and the work you do; you always want to do your best to delight the customers, help your team, and strive for excellence.', 'Automate infrastructure and application deployments on private and public clouds (preferred: AWS).', 'Deploy and maintain server-side applications and services on AWS development and production environments.', 'Technical', 'Customer Advocate. Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.', 'Salesforce.com', 'Some of the things you’ll be doing include…', 'Job Details', 'Job Category', 'Salesforce.org', "Experienced. You have led projects across development teams, particularly using Agile methodologies. Hands-on AWS experience, a plus.Educated. Bachelor degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.Technical. You're fluent in commonly used design patterns and can constructively review the work of others to ensure high quality. You are familiar with infrastructure automation, preferably using Terraform, Puppet and Packer. You have worked with deployment and release management technologies like Octopus Deploy or Spinnaker. You have led projects across development teams, particularly using Agile methodologies. Hands-on AWS experience, a plus.', 'A True Team Player. job_title: Data Scientist - Marcus by Goldman Sachs Decision and Lending
job_text: ['', 'About Goldman Sachs', ' Participate in data architecture decisions and partner with technology teams to implement models/algorithms in production ', ' Rapidly prototype early-stage solutions and design / evaluate predictive models and advanced algorithms to drive business decisions throughout the customer lifecycle (prospecting, acquisition, underwriting, collections, enhancing customer experience) ', ' Carry out data processing including statistical analysis, variable selection, and dimensionality reduction, custom attribute engineering, as well as the evaluation of new data sources ', ' Rapidly prototype early-stage solutions and design / evaluate predictive models and advanced algorithms to drive business decisions throughout the customer lifecycle (prospecting, acquisition, underwriting, collections, enhancing customer experience)  Understand the systems and the business processes that populate those systems with data  Carry out data processing including statistical analysis, variable selection, and dimensionality reduction, custom attribute engineering, as well as the evaluation of new data sources  Leverage methods from diverse disciplines such as traditional modeling, machine learning, deep learning, artificial intelligence, statistical modelling, information theory, information retrieval and other areas to gain customer insights, draw conclusions and work with business partners to put those insights into action  Participate in data architecture decisions and partner with technology teams to implement models/algorithms in production  Help document your assumptions and methodologies, as well as carry out validation and testing to facilitate peer reviews and independent model validation  Think strategically on a higher level, proposing new business metrics or suggesting alternatives, creating highly interpretive models that imply new context and new semantics for data ', 'This Role Entails', ' BS/MS or PhD in a quantitative field - Applied Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, Econometrics and other quantitative fields  0-5 years of prior modeling/data science experience is required preferably in credit risk, marketing response modeling and forecasting.  Strong programming background in compiled or scripting languages (C/C++, Python, R, Java, etc.) as well as experience querying database using SQL  Ability to explain complex models and analysis to diverse audience in a layman intuitive way ', ' Help document your assumptions and methodologies, as well as carry out validation and testing to facilitate peer reviews and independent model validation ', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Understand the systems and the business processes that populate those systems with data ', ' Familiarity with advanced ML models - neural networks (feed forward, CNNs, RNNs, LSTM), Hidden Markov Models, random forests, SVMs, multivariate analysis, clustering, dimensionality reduction or participation in Kaggle data science competitions ', ' GS.com/careers ', ' https:// www.goldmansachs.com/careers/footer/disability-statement.html ', ' RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS ', ' Leverage methods from diverse disciplines such as traditional modeling, machine learning, deep learning, artificial intelligence, statistical modelling, information theory, information retrieval and other areas to gain customer insights, draw conclusions and work with business partners to put those insights into action ', ' Experience with distributed computing (Hadoop and/or Spark) ', ' Ability to explain complex models and analysis to diverse audience in a layman intuitive way ', ' 0-5 years of prior modeling/data science experience is required preferably in credit risk, marketing response modeling and forecasting. ', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Strong programming background in compiled or scripting languages (C/C++, Python, R, Java, etc.) as well as experience querying database using SQL ', ' Think strategically on a higher level, proposing new business metrics or suggesting alternatives, creating highly interpretive models that imply new context and new semantics for data ', ' Familiarity with advanced ML models - neural networks (feed forward, CNNs, RNNs, LSTM), Hidden Markov Models, random forests, SVMs, multivariate analysis, clustering, dimensionality reduction or participation in Kaggle data science competitions  Experience with distributed computing (Hadoop and/or Spark) ', ' BS/MS or PhD in a quantitative field - Applied Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, Econometrics and other quantitative fields ', 'CONSUMER ( MARCUS BY GOLDMAN SACHS ) ', 'Job Summary & Responsibilities']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Supply Chain Analytics (Boulder, CO)
job_text: ['', 'Experience with Dash (and/or Shiny) is a plus', 'Job Description', ' MSc in a STEM discipline 5+ years’ data engineering experience is required Advanced Python (functional and OOP) and SQL skills (DDL, DML, CTEs, query optimization, ...), as well as experience with Apache Spark required Knowledge of data structures (DataFrames, RDDs, Dataclasses) and data formats (CSV, JSON, Parquet, Avro, ORC) Required experience installing data architectures on Cloud providers (e.g. AWS), using DevOps tools and automating data pipelines. The ability to design, implement and deliver maintainable and high-quality code using best practices (e.g. git/github, secrets, configurations, yaml/json) Experience with data modeling, design patterns, building highly scalable and secured solutions preferred 2+ years experience with job orchestration tools like Airflow or similar Experience with end-to-end testing of data pipelines and implementing Data Quality checks (e.g. using frameworks AWS Deequ) is preferred. Experience with Dash (and/or Shiny) is a plus ', 'Design and implement end-to-end data products and Supply Chain automation flows: from data ingestions for data science modeling to creation of automated pipelines to external software (WMS, TMS, SAP etc.)', 'Able to develop an in-depth understanding of HelloFresh’s core product and architecture, and act as an ambassador for state of the art software solutions and industry best practices, offering support and mentorship to colleagues', 'Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company', 'Data modeling: design, extend and update the HelloFresh’s data model (create new schemas, fact tables, (mat) views, etc.)', 'Data Transformations: implement the logic of the data pipeline (aggregations, projections, As such, we are looking for a skilled and motivated QA Engineer to help us ensure the quality of all components developed within the Data Science department.\xa0', 'About the role:', 'We are looking for fearless innovators who have an insatiable appetite for building what no one has built before.', 'Contribute to all phases of development of a mission-critical business function and ensure the quality of the core of the company’s brains (our machine learning & data analytics services)', 'Data analytics/ ML expertise', 'A truly global mission with a passionate community in locations all over the world', 'Comfortable working with Linux and command-line tools', 'Our approach is unique, and it’s validated by our customers who tell us to keep forging ahead because no one else is aggregating, analyzing, and acting on data to uncover opportunities or solve problems quite the way we are.', 'Experience with Python programming', 'Experience with CI tools and processes (Jenkins, TeamCity, Bitbucket pipelines, etc)', '3+ years of experience in software testing', 'A truly global mission with a passionate community in locations all over the worldHuge impact and learning potential as our aspirations require bold innovationHighly competitive compensation with 100% bonus pay already integratedBenefits include fully covered health coverage for employee and familyGenerous time-off policy and flexible work schedule', "What You'll Bring:", 'Participate in feature planning sessions, design and develop test scenarios and datasets, and create QA tools', 'Contribute to a variety of testing activities (from business logic verification, to stability and accuracy verification)', '3+ years of experience in software testingExperience with CI tools and processes (Jenkins, TeamCity, Bitbucket pipelines, etc)Data analytics/ ML expertiseExperience with test automationExperience with Python programmingComfortable working with Linux and command-line tools']

['', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'About You:', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'What We Look For:', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'About Us:', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Our Team:', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.']

['Senior CODER ', '', 'In your career you have explored various technologies and built exceptional applications. You are sufficiently seasoned that the slight nuances and subtleties between tools/languages are well understood. You are focused on crafting unique solutions that offer a quick turn-around.', 'Cloud Services', 'Cloud Services: AWS Lambda/Step Functions, Azure Fabric/Duable Functions/Logic Apps, various IaaS/PaaS/Saas (cloud messaging, claims-based authentication services, data cloud PaaS such as Aurora, S3, SQL Azure, etc.).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Mid-Tier Services/Helper/Management Apps', 'Mid-Tier/App', 'Dev Tools & Devops: Create intelligent and adaptable release scripts and configurations for use everywhere from local development through dev/qa CI and into production using any combination of Chef, Maven, Munin, Ant, Fabric or shell scripts driven by Jenkins. ['', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'About You:', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'What We Look For:', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'About Us:', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Our Team:', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.']

job_text: ['', ' Agile methodologies. ', ' Acts as Subject Matter Expert (SME) to architectural review board and technology review committee. ', ' Ability to lead large data driven enterprise projects. ', ' Serves as technical advisor to database administrators in areas of database optimization, indexing and data retention. ', '  Actively supports our CO-OP culture and embraces our core values of Work as Partners, Communicate Openly and Honestly, Demonstrate Excellence and Champion Change in all interactions. Creates and maintains documentation related to data development best practices, enterprise level data flow diagrams, and project code promotion.  Provides recommendations to technology tools, products and services in order to help keep our environment on the cutting edge of technology. Develops and designs solutions with security as a critical design requirement for data, systems and applications.  Adheres to development processes and standards including code management.  Responsible for reporting risks that are identified to the appropriate team and/or management. Additionally, responsible for managing, monitoring and reporting risks within the scope of your work area, to include, but not limited to Information Security risks. ['', 'You are a creative thinker, ', 'You work with confidence and without ego.Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. ', 'Who We Are Looking For: ', "You understand engineering fundamentals.At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don't work. You are able to work from first principles to evaluate solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. ", 'You are a broadly skilled engineer', 'Our Engineers are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, building, and delivering products for our clients.We have dozens of individual, mission-focused teams working across a wide spectrum of technological challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and aptitude, to work on large-scale distributed systems coordinating thousands of servers in cloud and physical data centers around the world, petabyte-scale data challenges, machine learning, advanced visualizations, and interactive user interfaces – to name a few.Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them.
